create table IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_MONTHLY
(
    PKID                      NUMBER(18)    not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE             DATE          not null,
    MASTERID                  NUMBER(18)    not null,
    MASTER_ACCOUNT_CODE       VARCHAR2(100) not null,
    DATA_SOURCE               VARCHAR2(20),
    GLOBAL_CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME             VARCHAR2(150),
    FACILITY_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER            VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    PREVIOUS_ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS            VARCHAR2(20),
    INTEREST_RATE             NUMBER,
    MARKET_RATE               NUMBER,
    PRODUCT_GROUP             VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_ENTITY            CHAR,
    GL_CONSTNAME              VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE               VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE_OPEN          VARCHAR2(50),
    CURRENCY                  VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE             NUMBER,
    INITIAL_OUTSTANDING       NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING               NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_IDC           NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_JF            NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_BANK          NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_PASTDUE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND                   NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND_CASH              NUMBER(32, 6),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED          NUMBER(32, 6),
    INSTALLMENT_AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    DOWN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    JF_FLAG                   NUMBER(1),
    LOAN_START_DATE           DATE,
    LOAN_DUE_DATE             DATE,
    LOAN_START_AMORTIZATION   DATE,
    LOAN_END_AMORTIZATION     DATE,
    INSTALLMENT_GRACE_PERIOD  DATE,
    NEXT_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE     DATE,
    LAST_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    FIRST_INSTALLMENT_DATE    DATE,
    TENOR                     NUMBER(10),
    REMAINING_TENOR           NUMBER(10),
    PAYMENT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PAYMENT_TERM              VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_CALCULATION_CODE VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_PAYMENT_TERM     VARCHAR2(2),
    RESTRUCTURE_DATE          DATE,
    RESTRUCTURE_FLAG          NUMBER(1),
    POCI_FLAG                 NUMBER(1),
    STAFF_LOAN_FLAG           NUMBER(1),
    BELOW_MARKET_FLAG         NUMBER(1),
    BTB_FLAG                  NUMBER(1),
    COMMITTED_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    REVOLVING_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    IAS_CLASS                 VARCHAR2(10),
    IFRS9_CLASS               VARCHAR2(50),
    BM_RESULT                 VARCHAR2(50),
    SPPI_RESULT               VARCHAR2(50),
    AMORT_TYPE                VARCHAR2(10),
    EIR_STATUS                CHAR,
    ECF_STATUS                CHAR,
    EIR                       NUMBER,
    EIR_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    FAIR_VALUE_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_TXN_COST  NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_ORG_FEE   NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    DAILY_AMORT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_BENEFIT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_AMT_TOTAL_JF      NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_JF        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT_JF       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ORIGINAL_COLLECTABILITY   CHAR,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY         CHAR,
    ORIGINAL_DAY_PAST_DUE     NUMBER(10),
    DAY_PAST_DUE              NUMBER(10),
    DPD_START_DATE            DATE,
    DPD_ZERO_COUNTER          NUMBER(10),
    NPL_DATE                  DATE,
    NPL_FLAG                  NUMBER(1),
    DEFAULT_DATE              DATE,
    DEFAULT_FLAG              NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_FLAG             NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_DATE             DATE,
    OUTSTANDING_WO            NUMBER(32, 6),
    IMPAIRED_FLAG             CHAR,
    IS_IMPAIRED               NUMBER(1),
    GROUP_SEGMENT             VARCHAR2(50),
    SEGMENT                   VARCHAR2(100),
    SUB_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(50),
    CR_STAGE                  CHAR,
    CCF_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    CCF_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    LIFETIME_RULE_ID          NUMBER(18),
    LIFETIME_SEGMENT          VARCHAR2(100),
    LIFETIME                  NUMBER(10),
    EAD_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    EAD_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    EAD_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    LGD_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    LGD_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    PD_RULE_ID                NUMBER(18),
    PD_SEGMENT                VARCHAR2(100),
    RATING_CODE               VARCHAR2(10),
    BUCKET_GROUP              VARCHAR2(30),
    BUCKET_ID                 NUMBER(10),
    ECL_12_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_LIFETIME_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    CA_UNWINDING_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    IA_UNWINDING_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    IA_UNWINDING_SUM_AMOUNT   NUMBER(32, 6),
    BEGINNING_BALANCE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    ENDING_BALANCE            NUMBER(32, 6),
    WRITEBACK_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    CHARGE_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_1        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_2        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_3        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_4        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_5        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_6        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_7        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_8        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_9        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_10       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_11       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_12       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_13       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_14       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_15       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_16       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_17       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_18       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_19       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_20       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_21       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_22       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_23       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_24       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_25       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_26       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_27       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_28       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_29       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_30       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_1         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_2         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_3         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_4         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_5         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_6         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_7         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_8         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_9         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_10        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_11        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_12        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_13        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_14        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_15        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_16        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_17        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_18        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_19        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_20        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_RATE_1           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_2           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_3           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_4           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_5           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_6           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_7           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_8           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_9           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_10          NUMBER,
    RESERVED_FLAG_1           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_2           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_3           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_4           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_5           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_6           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_7           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_8           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_9           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_10          NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_DATE_1           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_2           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_3           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_4           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_5           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_6           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_7           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_8           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_9           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_10          DATE,
    CREATEDBY                 VARCHAR2(36)  not null,
    CREATEDDATE               DATE          not null,
    CREATEDHOST               VARCHAR2(30)  not null,
    UPDATEDBY                 VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE               DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST               VARCHAR2(30),
    SEGMENT_RULE_ID           NUMBER(18),
    PREPAYMENT_SEGMENT        VARCHAR2(100),
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IMA_MONTHLY
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_MONTHLY (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTERID)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IMA_MONTHLY2
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_MONTHLY (DOWNLOAD_DATE, DATA_SOURCE)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IMA_MONTHLY3
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_MONTHLY (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTER_ACCOUNT_CODE)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IMA_MONTHLY4
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_MONTHLY (DOWNLOAD_DATE, CUSTOMER_NUMBER)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IMA_MONTHLY5
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_MONTHLY (DOWNLOAD_DATE, PRODUCT_CODE)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_MONTH
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_MONTHLY
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_MONTH."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.TMP_IFRS_PD_MAA_AVG_MONTH
(
    PD_RULE_ID       NUMBER(18),
    POPULATION_MONTH NUMBER(10)
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_PAYM_SCHD_HIST
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE   DATE,
    MASTERID        NUMBER(18),
    PMTDATE         DATE,
    INTEREST_RATE   NUMBER(12, 6),
    OSPRN           NUMBER(32, 6),
    PRINCIPAL       NUMBER(32, 6),
    INTEREST        NUMBER(32, 6),
    DISB_PERCENTAGE NUMBER(12, 6),
    DISB_AMOUNT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND         NUMBER(32, 6),
    I_DAYS          NUMBER(18),
    COUNTER         NUMBER(18),
    ICC             VARCHAR2(1),
    OUTSTANDING     NUMBER(32, 6),
    SOURCE_PROCESS  VARCHAR2(20),
    SCH_FLAG        VARCHAR2(2),
    GRACE_DATE      DATE
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_PRODUCT_PARAM
(
    DATA_SOURCE         VARCHAR2(20),
    PRD_TYPE            VARCHAR2(50),
    PRD_CODE            VARCHAR2(20),
    PRD_GROUP           VARCHAR2(20),
    MARKET_RATE         NUMBER(12, 6),
    CCY                 VARCHAR2(5),
    AMORT_TYPE          VARCHAR2(10),
    IS_STAF_LOAN        VARCHAR2(3),
    IS_IMPAIRED         VARCHAR2(3),
    PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION VARCHAR2(255),
    FEE_MAT_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    COST_MAT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    EXPECTED_LIFE       NUMBER(10),
    FEE_MAT_TYPE        VARCHAR2(20),
    COST_MAT_TYPE       VARCHAR2(20),
    BISEGMENT           VARCHAR2(10),
    FLAG_AL             CHAR,
    REPAY_TYPE_VALUE    VARCHAR2(10),
    WORKING_PERIOD      NUMBER(10),
    TENOR_TYPE          CHAR,
    CREATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36),
    CREATEDDATE         DATE,
    CREATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(30),
    UPDATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE         DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_BKP
(
    PKID                      NUMBER(18),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE             DATE,
    MASTERID                  NUMBER(18),
    MASTER_ACCOUNT_CODE       VARCHAR2(100),
    DATA_SOURCE               VARCHAR2(20),
    GLOBAL_CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME             VARCHAR2(150),
    FACILITY_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER            VARCHAR2(50),
    PREVIOUS_ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS            VARCHAR2(20),
    INTEREST_RATE             NUMBER,
    MARKET_RATE               NUMBER,
    PRODUCT_GROUP             VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_ENTITY            CHAR,
    GL_CONSTNAME              VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE               VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE_OPEN          VARCHAR2(50),
    CURRENCY                  VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE             NUMBER,
    INITIAL_OUTSTANDING       NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING               NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_IDC           NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_JF            NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_BANK          NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_PASTDUE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND                   NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND_CASH              NUMBER(32, 6),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED          NUMBER(32, 6),
    INSTALLMENT_AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    DOWN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    JF_FLAG                   NUMBER(1),
    LOAN_START_DATE           DATE,
    LOAN_DUE_DATE             DATE,
    LOAN_START_AMORTIZATION   DATE,
    LOAN_END_AMORTIZATION     DATE,
    INSTALLMENT_GRACE_PERIOD  DATE,
    NEXT_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE     DATE,
    LAST_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    FIRST_INSTALLMENT_DATE    DATE,
    TENOR                     NUMBER(10),
    REMAINING_TENOR           NUMBER(10),
    PAYMENT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PAYMENT_TERM              VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_CALCULATION_CODE VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_PAYMENT_TERM     VARCHAR2(2),
    RESTRUCTURE_DATE          DATE,
    RESTRUCTURE_FLAG          NUMBER(1),
    POCI_FLAG                 NUMBER(1),
    STAFF_LOAN_FLAG           NUMBER(1),
    BELOW_MARKET_FLAG         NUMBER(1),
    BTB_FLAG                  NUMBER(1),
    COMMITTED_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    REVOLVING_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    IAS_CLASS                 VARCHAR2(10),
    IFRS9_CLASS               VARCHAR2(50),
    BM_RESULT                 VARCHAR2(50),
    SPPI_RESULT               VARCHAR2(50),
    AMORT_TYPE                VARCHAR2(10),
    EIR_STATUS                CHAR,
    ECF_STATUS                CHAR,
    EIR                       NUMBER,
    EIR_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    FAIR_VALUE_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_TXN_COST  NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_ORG_FEE   NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    DAILY_AMORT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_BENEFIT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_AMT_TOTAL_JF      NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_JF        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT_JF       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ORIGINAL_COLLECTABILITY   CHAR,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY         CHAR,
    ORIGINAL_DAY_PAST_DUE     NUMBER(10),
    DAY_PAST_DUE              NUMBER(10),
    DPD_START_DATE            DATE,
    DPD_ZERO_COUNTER          NUMBER(10),
    NPL_DATE                  DATE,
    NPL_FLAG                  NUMBER(1),
    DEFAULT_DATE              DATE,
    DEFAULT_FLAG              NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_FLAG             NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_DATE             DATE,
    OUTSTANDING_WO            NUMBER(32, 6),
    IMPAIRED_FLAG             CHAR,
    IS_IMPAIRED               NUMBER(1),
    GROUP_SEGMENT             VARCHAR2(50),
    SEGMENT                   VARCHAR2(100),
    SUB_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(50),
    CR_STAGE                  CHAR,
    CCF_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    CCF_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    LIFETIME_RULE_ID          NUMBER(18),
    LIFETIME_SEGMENT          VARCHAR2(100),
    LIFETIME                  NUMBER(10),
    EAD_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    EAD_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    EAD_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    LGD_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    LGD_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    PD_RULE_ID                NUMBER(18),

    RESERVED_RATE_10          NUMBER,
    RESERVED_FLAG_1           NUMBER(1),

    RESERVED_FLAG_4           NUMBER(1),

    PREPAYMENT_SEGMENT        VARCHAR2(100),
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18)
)

    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_BKP (DOWNLOAD_DATE)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_CLOSED_ACV
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE DATE,
    MASTERID      NUMBER(18),
    ACCTNO        VARCHAR2(50),
    FACNO         VARCHAR2(50),
    CIFNO         VARCHAR2(50),
    DATASOURCE    VARCHAR2(20),
    CREATEDDATE   DATE,
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(20)
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_EIR_ACCRU_PREV
(
    ID             NUMBER(18) not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_ACCT_EIR_ACCRU_PREV
            primary key,
    FACNO          VARCHAR2(50),
    CIFNO          VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCTNO         VARCHAR2(70),
    MASTERID       NUMBER(18),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE  DATE,
    ECFDATE        DATE,
    DATASOURCE     VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDTYPE        VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDCODE        VARCHAR2(20),
    TRXCODE        VARCHAR2(20),
    CCY            VARCHAR2(5),
    AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    STATUS         VARCHAR2(20),
    FLAG_CF        VARCHAR2(3),
    FLAG_REVERSE   VARCHAR2(3),
    SRCPROCESS     VARCHAR2(10),
    CREATEDDATE    DATE,
    CREATEDBY      VARCHAR2(20),
    AMORTDATE      DATE,
    ORG_CCY        VARCHAR2(5),
    ORG_CCY_EXRATE NUMBER(32, 6),
    CF_ID          NUMBER(18),
    METHOD         VARCHAR2(10)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_ACCT_EIR_ACCRU_PREV
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_EIR_ACCRU_PREV
    for each row
    when (NEW.ID IS NULL OR NEW.ID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_ACCT_EIR_ACCRU_PREV."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.ID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_EIR_ACF
(
    ID                  NUMBER(18) not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_ACCT_EIR_ACF
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE       DATE,
    MASTERID            NUMBER(18),
    FACNO               VARCHAR2(50),
    CIFNO               VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCTNO              VARCHAR2(70),
    DATASOURCE          VARCHAR2(20),
    N_UNAMORT_COST      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_FEE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMORT_COST        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMORT_FEE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_ACCRU_COST        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_ACCRU_FEE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_ACCRUFULL_COST    NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_ACCRUFULL_FEE     NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECFDATE             DATE,
    CREATEDDATE         DATE,
    CREATEDBY           VARCHAR2(30),
    N_ACCRU_PREV_COST   NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_ACCRU_PREV_FEE    NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMORT_ADJ_COST    NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMORT_ADJ_FEE     NUMBER(32, 6),
    DO_AMORT            VARCHAR2(2),
    BRANCH              VARCHAR2(30),
    ACF_CODE            VARCHAR2(2),
    FLAG_AL             VARCHAR2(2),
    N_ACCRU_NOCF        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_NOCF      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_PREV_NOCF NUMBER(32, 6)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_ACCT_EIR_ACF
    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_EIR_ACF (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTERID)

    AMOUNT_ORG     NUMBER(32, 6),

    CREATEDBY      VARCHAR2(20),
    ISUSED         VARCHAR2(3),
    SEQ            VARCHAR2(3),
    ORG_CCY        VARCHAR2(5),
    ORG_CCY_EXRATE NUMBER(32, 6),
    CF_ID          NUMBER(18),
    SUM_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6)
)

(
    ID                      NUMBER(18) not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_ACCT_EIR_ECF
            primary key,

    N_EFF_INT_RATE          NUMBER,

    ENDAMORTDATE            DATE,
    GRACEDATE               DATE,

    DISB_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND                 NUMBER(32, 6),

    PMT_DATE                DATE,

    I_DAYS2                 NUMBER(10),

    N_INSTALLMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_PRN_PAYMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INT_PAYMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_OSPRN                 NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FAIRVALUE_PREV        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FAIRVALUE             NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMORT_AMT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_AMORT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV  NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_AMORT_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMORTSTOPDATE           DATE,
    AMORTSTOPMSG            VARCHAR2(50),
    N_DAILY_AMORT_COST      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_DAILY_AMORT_FEE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_AMT0          NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_RATE0         NUMBER,
    N_DAILY_INT_ADJ_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INT_ADJ_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_COST             NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_FEE              NUMBER(32, 6),
    NPV_RATE                NUMBER(14, 10),
    NPV_AMOUNT              NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_OSPRN              NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_OSPRN_PREV         NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_INT_RATE           NUMBER,
    NOCF_PRN_PAYMENT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_EFF_INT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV   NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_AMORT_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_UNAMORT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6)
)

create table IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_EIR_GAIN_LOSS
(
    ID             NUMBER(18) not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_ACCT_EIR_GAIN_LOSS
            primary key,
    FACNO          VARCHAR2(50),
    CIFNO          VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCTNO         VARCHAR2(70),
    MASTERID       NUMBER(18),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE  DATE,
    ECFDATE        DATE,
    DATASOURCE     VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDTYPE        VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDCODE        VARCHAR2(20),
    TRXCODE        VARCHAR2(20),
    CCY            VARCHAR2(5),
    AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    STATUS         VARCHAR2(20),
    FLAG_CF        VARCHAR2(3),
    FLAG_REVERSE   VARCHAR2(3),
    SRCPROCESS     VARCHAR2(10),
    CREATEDDATE    DATE,
    CREATEDBY      VARCHAR2(20),
    AMORTDATE      DATE,

    ORG_CCY_EXRATE NUMBER(32, 6),

    METHOD         VARCHAR2(10)
)
/

    N_DAILY_AMORT_FEE  NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMORTENDDATE       DATE,
    PERIOD             NUMBER(10),
    UNAMORT_COST_PREV  NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_PREV   NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_FEE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_COST        NUMBER(32, 6)
)
/

    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_SL_ECF
    for each row
    when (NEW.ID IS NULL OR NEW.ID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_ACCT_SL_ECF."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.ID FROM DUAL;
END;

create table IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_PRODUCT_PARAM
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)                        not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_MASTER_PRODUCT_PARAM
            primary key,
    DATA_SOURCE        VARCHAR2(20),
    PRD_TYPE           VARCHAR2(20),
    PRD_CODE           VARCHAR2(20),
    PRD_GROUP          VARCHAR2(20),
    PRD_DESC           VARCHAR2(255),
    CCY                VARCHAR2(5)   default 'ALL',
    INST_CLS_VALUE     VARCHAR2(10),
    IAS_CLS_VALUE      VARCHAR2(10),
    REPAY_TYPE_VALUE   VARCHAR2(10),
    AMORT_TYPE         VARCHAR2(10),
    EXP_LIFE           NUMBER(10)    default 0,
    ORG_FEE_MAT_TYPE   VARCHAR2(10)  default 'ABS',
    ORG_FEE_MAT_AMT    NUMBER(32, 6) default 0           not null,
    TXN_COST_MAT_TYPE  VARCHAR2(10)  default 'ABS',
    TXN_COST_MAT_AMT   NUMBER(32, 6) default 0           not null,
    MKT_INT_RATE       NUMBER        default 0           not null,
    STAFF_LOAN_IND     NUMBER(1)     default 0           not null,
    WORKING_PERIOD     NUMBER(10)    default 0,
    PRD_CATEGORY       VARCHAR2(100),
    IS_IMPAIRED        NUMBER(1),
    TENOR_TYPE         CHAR,
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36)  default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE          default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36)  default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_1 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_2 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_3 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_4 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_1  NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_2  NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_3  NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_FLAG_1    NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_2    NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_3    NUMBER(1)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_MASTER_PRODUCT_PARAM
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_PRODUCT_PARAM
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
 SELECT SEQ_IFRS_MASTER_PRODUCT_PARAM .NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_IMA_AMORT_PREV
(
    ID                            NUMBER(18) not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_IMA_AMORT_PREV
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE                 DATE       not null,

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_IMA_AMORT_PREV
    on IFRS.IFRS_IMA_AMORT_PREV (MASTERID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_IMA_AMORT_PREV
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_IMA_AMORT_PREV
    for each row
    when (NEW.ID IS NULL OR NEW.ID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_IMA_AMORT_PREV."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.ID FROM DUAL;
  END;
/

create table IFRS.R_ARIMA_MODEL_FCST
(
    PKID            NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_ARIMA_MODEL_FCST
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID        NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    MODEL_SEQ       NUMBER(10),
    MODEL_NAME      VARCHAR2(255),
    VARIABLE_NAME   VARCHAR2(50),
    FCST_PERIOD     DATE,
    FCST_VALUE      NUMBER,
    FCST_LOWER80    NUMBER,
    FCST_UPPER80    NUMBER,
    FCST_LOWER95    NUMBER,
    FCST_UPPER95    NUMBER,
    FCST_PERCENTAGE NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE     DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE     DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    before insert
    on IFRS.R_ARIMA_MODEL_FCST
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_R_ARIMA_MODEL_FCST."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_ECF
(
    ID                      NUMBER(18) not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_ECF
            primary key,
    MASTERID                NUMBER(18),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE           DATE,
    N_LOAN_AMT              NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INT_RATE              NUMBER(18, 10),
    N_EFF_INT_RATE          NUMBER(18, 10),
    STARTAMORTDATE          DATE,
    ENDAMORTDATE            DATE,
    GRACEDATE               DATE,
    DISB_PERCENTAGE         NUMBER(18, 10),
    DISB_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND                 NUMBER(32, 6),
    PAYMENTCODE             VARCHAR2(3),
    INTCALCCODE             VARCHAR2(3),
    PAYMENTTERM             VARCHAR2(3),
    ISGRACE                 VARCHAR2(3),
    PREV_PMT_DATE           DATE,
    PMT_DATE                DATE,
    I_DAYS                  NUMBER(10),
    I_DAYS2                 NUMBER(10),
    N_OSPRN_PREV            NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INSTALLMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_PRN_PAYMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INT_PAYMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_OSPRN                 NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FAIRVALUE_PREV        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FAIRVALUE             NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMORT_AMT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_AMORT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV  NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_AMORT_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMORTSTOPDATE           DATE,
    AMORTSTOPMSG            VARCHAR2(50),
    N_DAILY_AMORT_COST      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_DAILY_AMORT_FEE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_AMT0          NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_RATE0         NUMBER(18, 10),
    N_DAILY_INT_ADJ_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INT_ADJ_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_COST             NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_FEE              NUMBER(32, 6),
    NPV_RATE                NUMBER(14, 10),
    NPV_AMOUNT              NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_OSPRN              NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_OSPRN_PREV         NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_INT_RATE           NUMBER(18, 10),
    NOCF_PRN_PAYMENT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_EFF_INT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV   NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_AMORT_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_UNAMORT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_ECF
    on IFRS.IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_ECF (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTERID)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_ECF_2
    on IFRS.IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_ECF (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTERID, PMT_DATE)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_ECF
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_ECF
    for each row
    when (NEW.ID IS NULL OR NEW.ID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_ECF."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.ID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_ECF1
(
    ID                      NUMBER(18) not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_ECF1
            primary key,
    MASTERID                NUMBER(18),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE           DATE,
    N_LOAN_AMT              NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INT_RATE              NUMBER(18, 10),
    N_EFF_INT_RATE          NUMBER(18, 10),
    STARTAMORTDATE          DATE,
    ENDAMORTDATE            DATE,
    GRACEDATE               DATE,
    DISB_PERCENTAGE         NUMBER(18, 10),
    DISB_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND                 NUMBER(32, 6),
    PAYMENTCODE             VARCHAR2(3),
    INTCALCCODE             VARCHAR2(3),
    PAYMENTTERM             VARCHAR2(3),
    ISGRACE                 VARCHAR2(3),
    PREV_PMT_DATE           DATE,
    PMT_DATE                DATE,
    I_DAYS                  NUMBER(10),
    I_DAYS2                 NUMBER(10),
    N_OSPRN_PREV            NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INSTALLMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_PRN_PAYMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INT_PAYMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_OSPRN                 NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FAIRVALUE_PREV        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FAIRVALUE             NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMORT_AMT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_AMORT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV  NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_AMORT_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMORTSTOPDATE           DATE,
    AMORTSTOPMSG            VARCHAR2(50),
    N_DAILY_AMORT_COST      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_DAILY_AMORT_FEE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_AMT0          NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_RATE0         NUMBER(18, 10),
    N_DAILY_INT_ADJ_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INT_ADJ_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_AMT               NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_AMT              NUMBER(32, 6)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_ECF1
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_ECF1
    for each row
    when (NEW.ID IS NULL OR NEW.ID = 0)

  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_ECF1."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.ID FROM DUAL;
END;

    DOWNLOAD_DATE           DATE,

    N_EFF_INT_RATE          NUMBER(18, 10),
    STARTAMORTDATE          DATE,
    ENDAMORTDATE            DATE,
    GRACEDATE               DATE,
    DISB_PERCENTAGE         NUMBER(18, 10),
    DISB_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND                 NUMBER(32, 6),

    PMT_DATE                DATE,
    I_DAYS                  NUMBER(10),
    I_DAYS2                 NUMBER(10),
    N_OSPRN_PREV            NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INSTALLMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_PRN_PAYMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INT_PAYMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_OSPRN                 NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FAIRVALUE_PREV        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FAIRVALUE             NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMORT_AMT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_AMORT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV  NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_AMORT_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMORTSTOPDATE           DATE,
    AMORTSTOPMSG            VARCHAR2(50),
    N_DAILY_AMORT_COST      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_DAILY_AMORT_FEE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_AMT0          NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_RATE0         NUMBER(18, 10),
    N_DAILY_INT_ADJ_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INT_ADJ_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_COST             NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_FEE              NUMBER(32, 6),

)

create table IFRS.IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_GAIN_LOSS
(
    ID             NUMBER(18) not null,
    FACNO          VARCHAR2(50),
    CIFNO          VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCTNO         VARCHAR2(70),
    MASTERID       NUMBER(18),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE  DATE,
    ECFDATE        DATE,
    DATASOURCE     VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDTYPE        VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDCODE        VARCHAR2(20),
    TRXCODE        VARCHAR2(20),
    CCY            VARCHAR2(5),
    AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    STATUS         VARCHAR2(20),
    FLAG_CF        VARCHAR2(3),
    FLAG_REVERSE   VARCHAR2(3),
    SRCPROCESS     VARCHAR2(10),
    CREATEDDATE    DATE,
    CREATEDBY      VARCHAR2(20),
    AMORTDATE      DATE,
    ORG_CCY        VARCHAR2(5),
    ORG_CCY_EXRATE NUMBER(32, 6),
    CF_ID          NUMBER(18),
    METHOD         VARCHAR2(10)
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_LBM_ACCT_SWITCH
(
    ID              NUMBER(18) not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_LBM_ACCT_SWITCH
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE   DATE,
    FACNO           VARCHAR2(50),
    CIFNO           VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCTNO          VARCHAR2(70),
    BRCODE          VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDTYPE         VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDCODE         VARCHAR2(20),
    DATASOURCE      VARCHAR2(20),
    MASTERID        NUMBER(18),
    PREV_ACCTNO     VARCHAR2(50),
    PREV_FACNO      VARCHAR2(50),
    PREV_CIFNO      VARCHAR2(50),
    PREV_BRCODE     VARCHAR2(20),
    PREV_PRDTYPE    VARCHAR2(20),
    PREV_PRDCODE    VARCHAR2(20),
    PREV_DATASOURCE VARCHAR2(20),
    PREV_MASTERID   VARCHAR2(70),
    PREV_SL_ECF     VARCHAR2(3),
    PREV_EIR_ECF    VARCHAR2(3),
    METHOD          VARCHAR2(10),
    CCY             VARCHAR2(5),
    LOAN_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND         NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_FEE      NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_COST     NUMBER(32, 6),
    CREATEDDATE     DATE,
    CREATEDBY       VARCHAR2(50)
)
/

    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_LBM_ACCT_SWITCH
    for each row
    when (NEW.ID IS NULL OR NEW.ID = 0)

  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_LBM_ACCT_SWITCH."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.ID FROM DUAL;
END;

create table IFRS.IFRS_LBM_EVENT_CHANGES
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE  DATE         not null,
    MASTERID       NUMBER(18)   not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER VARCHAR2(70),
    EFFECTIVE_DATE DATE,
    BEFORE_VALUE   VARCHAR2(30) not null,
    AFTER_VALUE    VARCHAR2(30) not null,
    EVENT_ID       NUMBER(10)   not null,
    REMARKS        VARCHAR2(100),
    CREATEDBY      VARCHAR2(50),
    CREATED_DATE   DATE default SYSDATE
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_LBM_PAYM_CORE
(
    MASTERID        NUMBER(18),
    ACCTNO          VARCHAR2(70),
    PREV_PMT_DATE   DATE,
    PMT_DATE        DATE,
    INT_RATE        NUMBER(12, 6),
    I_DAYS          NUMBER(10),
    COUNTER         NUMBER(10),
    OS_PRN_PREV     NUMBER(32, 6),
    PRN_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    INT_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    OS_PRN          NUMBER(32, 6),
    DISB_PERCENTAGE NUMBER(12, 6),
    DISB_AMOUNT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND         NUMBER(32, 6),
    EIRAMT1         NUMBER(32, 6),
    EIRAMT2         NUMBER(32, 6),
    EIR1            NUMBER(18, 10),
    EIR2            NUMBER(18, 10),
    OSPREV1         NUMBER(32, 6),
    OSPREV2         NUMBER(32, 6),
    PRIN1           NUMBER(32, 6),
    PRIN2           NUMBER(32, 6),
    OS1             NUMBER(32, 6),
    OS2             NUMBER(32, 6),
    ICC             VARCHAR2(10),
    LOAN_START_DATE DATE,
    GRACE_DATE      DATE
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_LBM_PAYM_CORE_SRC
(
    MASTERID        NUMBER(18),
    ACCTNO          VARCHAR2(70),
    PREV_PMT_DATE   DATE,
    PMT_DATE        DATE,
    INTEREST_RATE   NUMBER(12, 6),
    I_DAYS          NUMBER(18),
    OS_PRN_PREV     NUMBER(32, 6),
    PRN_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    INT_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    OS_PRN          NUMBER(32, 6),
    DISB_PERCENTAGE NUMBER(12, 6),
    DISB_AMOUNT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND         NUMBER(32, 6),
    COUNTER         NUMBER(10),
    ICC             NUMBER(10),
    GRACE_DATE      DATE
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_LBM_REPORT_RECON
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE                DATE         not null,
    MASTERID                     NUMBER(18)   not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER               VARCHAR2(70) not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME                VARCHAR2(100),
    FACILITY_NUMBER              VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE                  VARCHAR2(20),
    DATA_SOURCE                  VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE                 VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE                 VARCHAR2(50),
    TRANSACTION_CODE             VARCHAR2(20),
    JF_FLAG                      VARCHAR2(1),
    FINANCING_TYPE               VARCHAR2(70),
    FINANCING_SCHEME             VARCHAR2(70),
    MASKAPAI_CODE                VARCHAR2(30),
    MASKAPAI_DESC                VARCHAR2(100),
    PACKAGE_CODE                 VARCHAR2(30),
    CCY                          VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE                NUMBER,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY            CHAR,
    DAY_PAST_DUE                 NUMBER(10),
    INTEREST_RATE                NUMBER(32, 6),
    EIR                          NUMBER,
    LOAN_START_DATE              DATE,
    LOAN_DUE_DATE                DATE,
    OUTSTANDING                  NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_JF               NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_BANK             NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND                      NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_GL_BENEFIT_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_GL_FAIRVALUE_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_MASTER_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_GL_BENEFIT_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_GL_FAIRVALUE_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMORT_GL_BENEFIT_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    DAILY_AMORT_GL_BENEFIT_AMT   NUMBER(32, 6),
    MTD_AMORT_GL_BENEFIT_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    YTD_AMORT_GL_BENEFIT_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMORT_GL_FAIRVALUE_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    DAILY_AMORT_GL_FAIRVALUE_AMT NUMBER(32, 6),
    MTD_AMORT_GL_FAIRVALUE_AMT   NUMBER(32, 6),
    YTD_AMORT_GL_FAIRVALUE_AMT   NUMBER(32, 6),
    COUNTER_CHECK_BENEFIT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    COUNTER_CHECK_FAIRVALUE      NUMBER(32, 6),
    METHOD                       VARCHAR2(10)
)
/

    PAYMENTCODE             VARCHAR2(3),
    INTCALCCODE             VARCHAR2(3),
    PAYMENTTERM             VARCHAR2(3),
    ISGRACE                 VARCHAR2(3),
    PREV_PMT_DATE           DATE,
    PMT_DATE                DATE,
    I_DAYS                  NUMBER(10),
    I_DAYS2                 NUMBER(10),
    N_OSPRN_PREV            NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INSTALLMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_PRN_PAYMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INT_PAYMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_OSPRN                 NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FAIRVALUE_PREV        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FAIRVALUE             NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMORT_AMT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_AMORT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV  NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_AMORT_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMORTSTOPDATE           DATE,
    AMORTSTOPMSG            VARCHAR2(50),
    N_DAILY_AMORT_COST      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_DAILY_AMORT_FEE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_AMT0          NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_RATE0         NUMBER(18, 10),
    N_DAILY_INT_ADJ_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INT_ADJ_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_COST             NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_FEE              NUMBER(32, 6),
    NPV_RATE                NUMBER(14, 10),
    NPV_AMOUNT              NUMBER(32, 6)
)

    N_AMORT_COST       NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMORT_FEE        NUMBER(32, 6),
    CREATEDDATE        DATE,
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(20),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDDBY         VARCHAR2(20),
    STATUS             VARCHAR2(20),
    AMORTSTOPDATE      DATE,
    AMORTSTOPREASON    VARCHAR2(50),
    MASTERID           NUMBER(18),
    N_DAILY_AMORT_COST NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_DAILY_AMORT_FEE  NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMORTENDDATE       DATE,
    PERIOD             NUMBER(10),
    UNAMORT_COST_PREV  NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_PREV   NUMBER(32, 6),
    START_AMORT_DATE   DATE
)
/

    PROJECT_LOCATION_DESC         VARCHAR2(100),
    RELATION_STATUS               VARCHAR2(50),
    BILL_NO_SRC                   VARCHAR2(100),
    PRODUCT_TYPE_GROUP            VARCHAR2(100),
    SRC_IMPAIR_GROUP              VARCHAR2(100),
    SRC_FILE                      VARCHAR2(100),
    CREDIT_TYPE                   VARCHAR2(30),
    CREDIT_TYPE_DESC              VARCHAR2(100),
    CREDIT_QUALITY                VARCHAR2(30),
    CREDIT_QUALITY_DESC           VARCHAR2(100),
    JENIS_PENGGUNAAN              VARCHAR2(30),
    JENIS_PENGGUNAAN_DESC         VARCHAR2(100),
    ORIENTASI_PENGGUNAAN          VARCHAR2(30),
    ORIENTASI_PENGGUNAAN_DESC     VARCHAR2(100),
    MEASUREMENT_CATEGORY          VARCHAR2(30),
    MEASUREMENT_CATEGORY_DESC     VARCHAR2(100),
    PRODUCT_CODE_SRC              VARCHAR2(100),
    FIRST_OVERDUE_DATE            DATE,
    NPL_DATE                      DATE,
    NPL_FLAG                      VARCHAR2(5),
    BRANCH_CODE_OPEN              VARCHAR2(50),
    COMMITED_FLAG                 VARCHAR2(10),
    COMPOUND_FLAG                 VARCHAR2(10),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS_SRC            VARCHAR2(10),
    AREA_CODE                     VARCHAR2(100),
    PRODUCT_CODE2                 VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_NAME2                 VARCHAR2(100),
    UNAMORT_AMT_TOTAL_JF          NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_JF            NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT_JF           NUMBER(32, 6),
    MASKAPAI_CODE                 VARCHAR2(30),
    MASKAPAI_DESC                 VARCHAR2(100),
    DEAL_CODE                     VARCHAR2(30),
    DEAL_DESC                     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESIDUAL_VALUE_AMT            NUMBER(32, 6),
    PACKAGE_CODE                  VARCHAR2(30),
    TAGIHAN_BRUTO_ORG             NUMBER(32, 6),
    TAGIHAN_BRUTO_EQV             NUMBER(32, 6),
    PPAP_AMOUNT                   NUMBER(32, 6),
    PPAP_RATE                     NUMBER(32, 6),
    GL_CONSTNAME                  VARCHAR2(50),
    WA_OEIR                       NUMBER,
    APPLICATION_NO                VARCHAR2(50),
    IFRS9_CLASS                   VARCHAR2(50)
)

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_LI_IMA_AMORT_CURR
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_LI_IMA_AMORT_CURR
    for each row
    when (NEW.ID IS NULL OR NEW.ID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_LI_IMA_AMORT_CURR."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.ID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE                  DATE         not null,
    MASTERID                       NUMBER(18)   not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER                 VARCHAR2(70) not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME                  VARCHAR2(100),
    FACILITY_NUMBER                VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE                    VARCHAR2(20),
    DATA_SOURCE                    VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE                   VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE                   VARCHAR2(50),
    TRANSACTION_CODE               VARCHAR2(20),
    JF_FLAG                        VARCHAR2(1),
    FINANCING_TYPE                 VARCHAR2(70),
    FINANCING_SCHEME               VARCHAR2(70),
    MASKAPAI_CODE                  VARCHAR2(30),
    MASKAPAI_DESC                  VARCHAR2(100),
    PACKAGE_CODE                   VARCHAR2(30),
    CCY                            VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE                  NUMBER(19, 6) default 0,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY              CHAR,
    DAY_PAST_DUE                   NUMBER(10),
    INTEREST_RATE                  NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    EIR                            FLOAT,
    LOAN_START_DATE                DATE,
    LOAN_DUE_DATE                  DATE,
    OUTSTANDING                    NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    OUTSTANDING_JF                 NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    OUTSTANDING_BANK               NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    PLAFOND                        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_TRX_FEE_AMT            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_TRX_FEE_GL             NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_TRX_COST_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,

    INITIAL_GL_FEE_GL              NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_COST_AMT            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_NE_COST_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_COST_GL             NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_MASTER_FEE_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,

    UNAMORT_GL_COST_ACT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_NE_COST_ACT_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_COST_ACT_GL         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,

    UNAMORT_GL_COST_CLS_GL         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_FEE_AMT               NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_NE_FEE_AMT            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_FEE_GL                NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,

    YTD_AMORT_GL_NE_COST_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,

create table IFRS.IFRS_LI_MASTER
(
    PKID                      NUMBER(18)    not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE             DATE          not null,
    MASTERID                  NUMBER(18)    not null,
    MASTER_ACCOUNT_CODE       VARCHAR2(100) not null,
    DATA_SOURCE               VARCHAR2(20),
    GLOBAL_CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME             VARCHAR2(150),
    FACILITY_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER            VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    PREVIOUS_ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS            VARCHAR2(20),
    INTEREST_RATE             NUMBER,
    MARKET_RATE               NUMBER,
    PRODUCT_GROUP             VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_ENTITY            CHAR,
    GL_CONSTNAME              VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE               VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE_OPEN          VARCHAR2(50),
    CURRENCY                  VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE             NUMBER,
    INITIAL_OUTSTANDING       NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING               NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_IDC           NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_JF            NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_BANK          NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_PASTDUE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND                   NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND_CASH              NUMBER(32, 6),
    TOPUP                     NUMBER(32, 6),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED          NUMBER(32, 6),
    INSTALLMENT_AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    DOWN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    JF_FLAG                   NUMBER(1),
    LOAN_START_DATE           DATE,
    LOAN_DUE_DATE             DATE,
    LOAN_START_AMORTIZATION   DATE,
    LOAN_END_AMORTIZATION     DATE,
    INSTALLMENT_GRACE_PERIOD  DATE,
    NEXT_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE     DATE,
    LAST_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    FIRST_INSTALLMENT_DATE    DATE,
    TENOR                     NUMBER(10),
    REMAINING_TENOR           NUMBER(10),
    PAYMENT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PAYMENT_TERM              VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_CALCULATION_CODE VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_PAYMENT_TERM     VARCHAR2(2),
    RESTRUCTURE_DATE          DATE,
    RESTRUCTURE_FLAG          NUMBER(1),
    POCI_FLAG                 NUMBER(1),
    STAFF_LOAN_FLAG           NUMBER(1),
    BELOW_MARKET_FLAG         NUMBER(1),
    BTB_FLAG                  NUMBER(1),
    COMMITTED_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    REVOLVING_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    IAS_CLASS                 VARCHAR2(10),
    IFRS9_CLASS               VARCHAR2(50),
    AMORT_TYPE                VARCHAR2(10),
    COMPOUND_FLAG             NUMBER(1),
    EIR_STATUS                CHAR,
    ECF_STATUS                CHAR,
    EIR                       NUMBER,
    EIR_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    FAIR_VALUE_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_TXN_COST  NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_ORG_FEE   NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    DAILY_AMORT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_AMT_TOTAL_JF      NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_JF        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT_JF       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ORIGINAL_COLLECTABILITY   NUMBER(10),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY         NUMBER(10),
    DAY_PAST_DUE              NUMBER(10),
    DPD_START_DATE            DATE,
    DPD_ZERO_COUNTER          NUMBER(10),
    NPL_DATE                  DATE,
    NPL_FLAG                  VARCHAR2(5),
    DEFAULT_DATE              DATE,
    DEFAULT_FLAG              NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_FLAG             NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_DATE             DATE,
    OUTSTANDING_WO            NUMBER(32, 6),
    IMPAIRED_FLAG             CHAR,
    IS_IMPAIRED               NUMBER(1),
    GROUP_SEGMENT             VARCHAR2(50),
    SEGMENT                   VARCHAR2(100),
    SUB_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(50),
    CR_STAGE                  CHAR,
    LIFETIME                  NUMBER(10),

create table IFRS.IFRS_LI_MASTER_ACCOUNT
(
    PKID                      NUMBER(18)    not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_LI_MASTER_ACCOUNT
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE             DATE          not null,
    MASTERID                  NUMBER(18)    not null,
    MASTER_ACCOUNT_CODE       VARCHAR2(100) not null,
    DATA_SOURCE               VARCHAR2(20),
    GLOBAL_CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME             VARCHAR2(150),
    FACILITY_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER            VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    PREVIOUS_ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS            VARCHAR2(20),
    INTEREST_RATE             NUMBER,
    MARKET_RATE               NUMBER,
    PRODUCT_GROUP             VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_ENTITY            CHAR,
    GL_CONSTNAME              VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE               VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE_OPEN          VARCHAR2(50),
    CURRENCY                  VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE             NUMBER,
    INITIAL_OUTSTANDING       NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING               NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_IDC           NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_JF            NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_BANK          NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_PASTDUE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND                   NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND_CASH              NUMBER(32, 6),
    TOPUP                     NUMBER(32, 6),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED          NUMBER(32, 6),
    INSTALLMENT_AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    DOWN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    JF_FLAG                   NUMBER(1),
    LOAN_START_DATE           DATE,
    LOAN_DUE_DATE             DATE,
    LOAN_START_AMORTIZATION   DATE,
    LOAN_END_AMORTIZATION     DATE,
    INSTALLMENT_GRACE_PERIOD  DATE,
    NEXT_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE     DATE,
    LAST_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    FIRST_INSTALLMENT_DATE    DATE,
    TENOR                     NUMBER(10),
    REMAINING_TENOR           NUMBER(10),
    PAYMENT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PAYMENT_TERM              VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_CALCULATION_CODE VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_PAYMENT_TERM     VARCHAR2(2),
    RESTRUCTURE_DATE          DATE,
    RESTRUCTURE_FLAG          NUMBER(1),
    POCI_FLAG                 NUMBER(1),
    STAFF_LOAN_FLAG           NUMBER(1),
    BELOW_MARKET_FLAG         NUMBER(1),
    BTB_FLAG                  NUMBER(1),
    COMMITTED_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    REVOLVING_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    IAS_CLASS                 VARCHAR2(10),
    IFRS9_CLASS               VARCHAR2(50),
    AMORT_TYPE                VARCHAR2(10),
    COMPOUND_FLAG             NUMBER(1),
    EIR_STATUS                CHAR,
    ECF_STATUS                CHAR,
    EIR                       NUMBER,
    EIR_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    FAIR_VALUE_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_TXN_COST  NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_ORG_FEE   NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    DAILY_AMORT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_AMT_TOTAL_JF      NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_JF        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT_JF       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ORIGINAL_COLLECTABILITY   NUMBER(10),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY         NUMBER(10),
    DAY_PAST_DUE              NUMBER(10),
    DPD_START_DATE            DATE,
    DPD_ZERO_COUNTER          NUMBER(10),
    NPL_DATE                  DATE,
    NPL_FLAG                  VARCHAR2(5),
    DEFAULT_DATE              DATE,
    DEFAULT_FLAG              NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_FLAG             NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_DATE             DATE,
    OUTSTANDING_WO            NUMBER(32, 6),
    IMPAIRED_FLAG             CHAR,
    IS_IMPAIRED               NUMBER(1),
    GROUP_SEGMENT             VARCHAR2(50),
    SEGMENT                   VARCHAR2(100),
    SUB_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(50),
    CR_STAGE                  CHAR,
    LIFETIME                  NUMBER(10),
    EAD_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    EAD_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    EAD_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    LGD_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    LGD_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    PD_RULE_ID                NUMBER(18),
    PD_SEGMENT                VARCHAR2(100),
    BUCKET_GROUP              VARCHAR2(30),
    BUCKET_ID                 NUMBER(10),
    ECL_12_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_LIFETIME_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    CA_UNWINDING_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    IA_UNWINDING_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    IA_UNWINDING_SUM_AMOUNT   NUMBER(32, 6),
    BEGINNING_BALANCE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    ENDING_BALANCE            NUMBER(32, 6),
    WRITEBACK_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    CHARGE_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_1       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_2       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_3       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_4       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_5       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_6       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_7       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_8       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_9       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_10      VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_11      VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_12      VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_13      VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_14      VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR2_15      VARCHAR2(100),

    RESERVED_AMOUNT_1         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_2         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_3         NUMBER(32, 6),

    RESERVED_AMOUNT_7         NUMBER(32, 6),

    RESERVED_AMOUNT_10        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_11        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_12        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_13        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_14        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_15        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_16        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_17        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_18        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_19        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_20        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_RATE_1           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_2           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_3           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_4           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_5           NUMBER,

    RESERVED_RATE_7           NUMBER,

    RESERVED_FLAG_6           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_7           NUMBER(1),

    UPDATEDDATE               DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST               VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_LI_MASTER_ACCOUNT
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_LI_MASTER_ACCOUNT
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_LI_MASTER_ACCOUNT."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE    DATE,
    MASTERID         NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),

    COMPONENT_STATUS VARCHAR2(1),
    FREQUENCY        VARCHAR2(1),
    INCREMENTS       NUMBER(10),
    AMOUNT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    TIMES_ORG        NUMBER(10),
    TIMES_USED       NUMBER(10),
    DATE_START       DATE,
    DATE_END         DATE,
    PMT_DATE         VARCHAR2(2),
    IS_INSERTED      VARCHAR2(1) default 'N'
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_LI_STG_MASTER_ACCOUNT
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE             VARCHAR2(20),
    DATA_SOURCE               VARCHAR2(20),
    BRANCH_CODE               VARCHAR2(20),
    MASTER_ACCOUNT_ID         VARCHAR2(100),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER            VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME             VARCHAR2(100),
    COUNTRY_ID                CHAR(3),
    PRODUCT_ENTITY            CHAR,
    PRODUCT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    CURRENCY                  CHAR(3),
    EXCHANGE_RATE             VARCHAR2(50),
    INITIAL_OUTSTANDING       VARCHAR2(50),
    INTEREST_RATE             VARCHAR2(50),
    OUTSTANDING               VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS            CHAR,
    START_DATE                VARCHAR2(20),
    END_DATE                  VARCHAR2(20),
    INTEREST_CALCULATION_CODE CHAR,
    DEPT_UNIT                 VARCHAR2(20),
    RESIDENT_GROUP            VARCHAR2(20),
    BI_CODE                   VARCHAR2(20),
    SOURCE_PROCESS            VARCHAR2(70),
    ECONOMIC_SECTOR           VARCHAR2(20),
    FILENAME                  VARCHAR2(100)
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_LI_STG_TRANSACTION_DAILY
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE                VARCHAR2(20),
    DATA_SOURCE                  VARCHAR2(20),
    BRANCH_CODE                  VARCHAR2(20),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER               VARCHAR2(50),
    PRD_CODE                     VARCHAR2(20),
    TRX_CODE                     VARCHAR2(20),
    TRANSACTION_REFERENCE_NUMBER VARCHAR2(50),
    TRANSACTION_DATE             VARCHAR2(20),
    EFFECTIVE_DATE               VARCHAR2(20),
    POSTING_DATE                 VARCHAR2(20),
    START_DATE                   VARCHAR2(20),
    DUE_DATE                     VARCHAR2(20),
    CURRENCY                     CHAR(3),
    AL_FLAG                      CHAR,

    TERMINATE_FLAG               CHAR,

    INITIAL_COST_AMOUNT          VARCHAR2(50),
    TRX_SEQUENCE                 VARCHAR2(20),
    FILENAME                     VARCHAR2(100)
)
/

(
    PKID        NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_MACRO_ECONOMIC
            primary key,
    HEADERID    NUMBER(18),
    UPLOADID    NUMBER(18),

    ME_PERIOD   DATE,
    ME_VAL      NUMBER,

    CREATEDHOST VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY   VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_MACRO_ECONOMIC
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_MACRO_ECONOMIC."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,

    RESERVED_AMOUNT_3  NUMBER(32, 6),

    RESERVED_FLAG_2    NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_3    NUMBER(1)
)

    FREQUENCY        CHAR(5),
    INCREMENTS       NUMBER(10),
    AMOUNT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    TIMES_ORG        NUMBER(10),
    TIMES_USED       NUMBER(10),
    DATE_START       DATE,
    DATE_END         DATE,
    PMT_DATE         CHAR(2),
    IS_INSERTED      NUMBER(1)
)
/

(

    RESERVED_VARCHAR_2  VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_3  VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_4  VARCHAR2(100),

    RESERVED_VARCHAR_6  VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_7  VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_8  VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_9  VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_10 VARCHAR2(100),

    RESERVED_AMOUNT_2   NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_3   NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_4   NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_5   NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_RATE_1     NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_2     NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_3     NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_4     NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_5     NUMBER,

    RESERVED_FLAG_2     NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_3     NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_4     NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_5     NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_DATE_1     DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_2     DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_3     DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_4     DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_5     DATE,
    CREATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE         DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(30) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE         DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_RECOVERY (PKID)
/

    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_RECOVERY
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_MASTER_RECOVERY."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36)  default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE          default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36)  default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_1 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_2 VARCHAR2(100),

    RESERVED_AMOUNT_3  NUMBER(32, 6),

    RESERVED_FLAG_3    NUMBER(1)
)

create table IFRS.IFRS_PRC_DATE
(
    PKID              NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_PRC_DATE
            primary key,
    CURRDATE          DATE                             not null,
    PREVDATE          DATE                             not null,
    BATCH_STATUS      VARCHAR2(50),
    REMARK            VARCHAR2(4000),
    LAST_PROCESS_DATE DATE,
    SESSIONID         VARCHAR2(50),
    CREATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE       DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE       DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_PRC_DATE_01
    before update of CURRDATE
    on IFRS.IFRS_PRC_DATE
    for each row
DECLARE
BEGIN

  :new.SESSIONID := SYS_GUID();
  :new.PREVDATE := :new.CURRDATE - 1;

END;
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_PRC_DATE_02
    before update of CURRDATE
    on IFRS.IFRS_PRC_DATE
    for each row
DECLARE
BEGIN
  IF :new.CURRDATE < ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1) THEN
    RAISE_APPLICATION_ERROR (-20002, 'ERROR MESSAGE : CURRDATE MUST BE GREATER THAN LAST MONTH ' || DBMS_UTILITY.FORMAT_ERROR_BACKTRACE);
  END IF;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_PRC_DATE_TEST
(
    PKID              NUMBER(18),
    CURRDATE          DATE         not null,
    PREVDATE          DATE         not null,
    BATCH_STATUS      VARCHAR2(50),
    REMARK            VARCHAR2(250),
    LAST_PROCESS_DATE DATE,
    SESSIONID         VARCHAR2(50),
    CREATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    CREATEDDATE       DATE         not null,
    CREATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPDATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE       DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_STAFF_BENEFIT_SUMM
(
    ID            NUMBER(18) not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_STAFF_BENEFIT_SUMM
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE DATE,
    MASTERID      NUMBER(18),
    BRCODE        VARCHAR2(20),
    CIFNO         VARCHAR2(50),
    FACNO         VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCTNO        VARCHAR2(70),
    DATASOURCE    VARCHAR2(20),
    CCY           VARCHAR2(5),
    AMOUNT_FEE    NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMOUNT_COST   NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMORT_FEE     NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMORT_COST    NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_MASTERID   VARCHAR2(70),
    CREATEDDATE   DATE,
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(50)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_STAFF_BENEFIT_SUMM
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_STAFF_BENEFIT_SUMM
    for each row
    when (NEW.ID IS NULL OR NEW.ID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_STAFF_BENEFIT_SUMM."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.ID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_STATISTIC
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE        DATE,
    SP_NAME              VARCHAR2(100),
    START_DATE           TIMESTAMP(6),
    END_DATE             TIMESTAMP(6),
    COUNTER              NUMBER(18),
    SESSIONID            VARCHAR2(100),
    ISCOMPLETE           VARCHAR2(2),
    PRC_NAME             VARCHAR2(100),
    PRC_PROCESS_TIME     VARCHAR2(30),
    SESSION_PROCESS_TIME VARCHAR2(30),
    REMARK               VARCHAR2(4000),
    PKID                 NUMBER(18) not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_STATISTIC
            primary key
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_STATISTIC
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_STATISTIC
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_STATISTIC."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

    NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE       DATE,
    ILS_ACCRUAL_CODE            NUMBER,

    WRITEOFF_DATE               DATE,

    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_ILS         NUMBER(32, 6),

    USER_CODE_1_ILS             CHAR,
    USER_CODE_2_ILS             CHAR,
    USER_CODE_3_ILS             CHAR,
    USER_CODE_4_ILS             CHAR,
    USER_CODE_5_ILS             CHAR,
    USER_STATUS_ILS             VARCHAR2(5),
    FIRST_NPL_DATE              DATE,
    OUTSTANDING_FIRST_NPL       NUMBER(32, 6),
    LAST_NPL_DATE               DATE,
    OUTSTANDING_LAST_NPL        NUMBER(32, 6),
    REPAYMENT_AMOUNT_PRINCIPAL  NUMBER(32, 6),
    REPAYMENT_AMOUNT_INT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    SECTOR_ECONOMIC             VARCHAR2(30),
    GOL_DEB_REK                 CHAR,

    NEXT_RATE_CHANGE            DATE,
    VAR_PLAN                    NUMBER(32, 6),
    JENIS_KREDIT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    CABANG_SENTRA               NUMBER(32, 6),
    LAST_PAYMENT_DATE           DATE,
    LAST_PAYMENT_DATE_INT       DATE,
    SWIFT_CODE                  VARCHAR2(20),
    COVID_FLAG                  VARCHAR2(1)
)
/

(
    PKID            NUMBER(10)  not null,
    REVID           NUMBER(10),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE   DATE,
    TRX_DATE        DATE,

    GL_CONSTNAME    VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE     VARCHAR2(15),
    TRX_CODE        VARCHAR2(50),
    DATA_SOURCE     VARCHAR2(50),
    PRD_TYPE        VARCHAR2(50),
    PRD_CODE        VARCHAR2(50),
    TRX_DR_CR       VARCHAR2(8) not null,
    CCY             VARCHAR2(5),
    MATURITY_DATE   DATE,
    EXCHANGE_RATE   NUMBER(32, 6),
    METHOD          VARCHAR2(10),
    STATUS          VARCHAR2(10),
    FLAG_CF         VARCHAR2(3),
    PLAFOND         NUMBER(32, 6),
    TRX_AMOUNT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    ALOC            NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNALOC          NUMBER(32, 6),

    CREATEDDATE     DATE,
    CREATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(30),
    UPDATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE     DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_MACRO_ECONOMIC_FORECAST
(
    PKID                NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_ME_FORECAST
            primary key,
    EFF_DATE            DATE,
    ME_CODE             VARCHAR2(100),
    ME_PERIOD           DATE,
    ME_VAL              NUMBER,
    SCENARIO_NAME       VARCHAR2(50),
    SCENARIO_PERCENTAGE NUMBER,
    DATA_SOURCE         VARCHAR2(50),
    CREATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE         DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE         DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_ME_FORECAST
    on IFRS.IFRS_MACRO_ECONOMIC_FORECAST (ME_CODE, ME_PERIOD, SCENARIO_NAME)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_ME_FORECAST
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_MACRO_ECONOMIC_FORECAST
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_ME_FORECAST."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_CCF_RULES_CONFIG
(
    PKID            NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_CCF_RULES_CONFIG
            primary key,
    CCF_RULE_NAME   VARCHAR2(150),
    SEGMENTATION_ID NUMBER(18),
    CALC_METHOD     VARCHAR2(50),
    AVERAGE_METHOD  VARCHAR2(50),
    CUT_OFF_DATE    DATE,
    CCF_OVERRIDE    NUMBER,
    ACTIVE_FLAG     NUMBER(1)    default 1           not null,
    SEPARATED_FLAG  NUMBER(1),
    IS_DELETE       NUMBER(1)    default 0           not null,
    CREATEDBY       VARCHAR2(50) default 'ADMIN'     not null,
    CREATEDDATE     DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(50) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY       VARCHAR2(50),
    UPDATEDDATE     DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(50)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_CCF_RULES_CONFIG
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_CCF_RULES_CONFIG
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_CCF_RULES_CONFIG."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.R_LINREG_STATS
(
    PKID             NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_LINREG_STATS
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID         NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    MODEL_SEQ        NUMBER(10),
    TEST_NAME        VARCHAR2(255),
    TEST_DESCR       VARCHAR2(255),
    STATS_VALUE      NUMBER,
    P_VALUE          NUMBER,
    NULL_HYPOTHESIS  VARCHAR2(255),
    ALTER_HYPOTHESIS VARCHAR2(255),
    FINAL_RESULT     VARCHAR2(255),
    CREATEDBY        VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE      DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST      VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY        VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE      DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST      VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_R_LINREG_STATS_01
    on IFRS.R_LINREG_STATS (MODEL_ID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_R_LINREG_STATS
    before insert
    on IFRS.R_LINREG_STATS
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_R_LINREG_STATS."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.R_MULT_LINEAR_REGR_COEF
(
    PKID         NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_MULT_LINEAR_REGR_COEF
            primary key,

    CREATEDDATE  DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST  VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY    VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE  DATE,

)

create table IFRS.R_MULT_LINEAR_REGR_RESULT
(
    PKID                 NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_MULT_LINEAR_REGR_RESULT
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID             NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    MODEL_SEQ            NUMBER(10),
    RESIDUAL_STD_ERR     NUMBER,
    DEG_OF_FREEDOM       NUMBER(10),
    MULT_R_SQUARED       NUMBER,
    ADJ_R_SQUARED        NUMBER,
    F_STATISTIC          NUMBER,
    P_VALUE              NUMBER,
    RESIDUAL_MIN         NUMBER,
    RESIDUAL_1Q          NUMBER,
    RESIDUAL_MEDIAN      NUMBER,
    RESIDUAL_3Q          NUMBER,
    RESIDUAL_MAX         NUMBER,
    DF_REGR              NUMBER(10),
    DF_RESD              NUMBER(10),
    DF_TOTAL             NUMBER(10),
    SUM_OF_SQR_REGR      NUMBER,
    SUM_OF_SQR_RESD      NUMBER,
    SUM_OF_SQR_TOTAL     NUMBER,
    MEAN_SUM_OF_SQR_REGR NUMBER,
    MEAN_SUM_OF_SQR_RESD NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY            VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE          DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST          VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY            VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE          DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST          VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_R_MULT_LINEAR_REGR_RESULT
    on IFRS.R_MULT_LINEAR_REGR_RESULT (MODEL_ID, MODEL_SEQ)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_LIN_REGR_RES_01
    on IFRS.R_MULT_LINEAR_REGR_RESULT (MODEL_ID)
/

    before insert
    on IFRS.R_MULT_LINEAR_REGR_RESULT
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_R_MULT_LINEAR_REGR_RESULT."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;

            primary key,

    BASE_DATE       DATE                             not null,
    PD_RULE_ID      NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    PROJECTION_DATE DATE                             not null,

    BUCKET_FROM     NUMBER(10),
    BUCKET_TO       NUMBER(10),
    MMULT           NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE     DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE     DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

)

create table IFRS.TMP_LI_LOAN_REPORT_RECON
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE                  DATE         not null,
    MASTERID                       NUMBER(18)   not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER                 VARCHAR2(70) not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME                  VARCHAR2(100),
    FACILITY_NUMBER                VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE                    VARCHAR2(20),
    DATA_SOURCE                    VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE                   VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE                   VARCHAR2(50),
    TRANSACTION_CODE               VARCHAR2(20),
    JF_FLAG                        VARCHAR2(1),
    FINANCING_TYPE                 VARCHAR2(70),
    FINANCING_SCHEME               VARCHAR2(70),
    MASKAPAI_CODE                  VARCHAR2(30),
    MASKAPAI_DESC                  VARCHAR2(100),
    PACKAGE_CODE                   VARCHAR2(30),
    CCY                            VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE                  NUMBER(19, 6) default 0,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY              CHAR,
    DAY_PAST_DUE                   NUMBER(10),
    INTEREST_RATE                  NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    EIR                            FLOAT,
    LOAN_START_DATE                DATE,
    LOAN_DUE_DATE                  DATE,
    OUTSTANDING                    NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    OUTSTANDING_JF                 NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    OUTSTANDING_BANK               NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    PLAFOND                        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_TRX_FEE_AMT            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_TRX_FEE_GL             NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_TRX_COST_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_TRX_COST_GL            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_FEE_AMT             NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_NE_FEE_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_FEE_GL              NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_COST_AMT            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_NE_COST_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_COST_GL             NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_MASTER_FEE_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_MASTER_FEE_NONEIR_AMT  NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_MASTER_COST_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_MASTER_COST_NONEIR_AMT NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_FEE_AMT             NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_NE_FEE_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_FEE_GL              NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_COST_AMT            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_NE_COST_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_COST_GL             NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_FEE_ACT_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_NE_FEE_ACT_AMT      NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_FEE_ACT_GL          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_COST_ACT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_NE_COST_ACT_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_COST_ACT_GL         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_FEE_CLS_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_NE_FEE_CLS_AMT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_GL_FEE_CLS_GL          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_COST_CLS_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_NE_COST_CLS_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_COST_CLS_GL         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_FEE_AMT               NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_NE_FEE_AMT            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_FEE_GL                NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    DAILY_AMORT_GL_FEE_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    DAILY_AMORT_GL_NE_FEE_AMT      NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    MTD_AMORT_GL_FEE_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    MTD_AMORT_GL_NE_FEE_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    YTD_AMORT_GL_FEE_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    YTD_AMORT_GL_NE_FEE_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_COST_AMT              NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_NE_COST_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_COST_GL               NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    DAILY_AMORT_GL_COST_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    DAILY_AMORT_GL_NE_COST_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    MTD_AMORT_GL_COST_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    MTD_AMORT_GL_NE_COST_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    YTD_AMORT_GL_COST_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    YTD_AMORT_GL_NE_COST_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_FEE_ACT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_NE_FEE_ACT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_FEE_ACT_GL            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_COST_ACT_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_NE_COST_ACT_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_COST_ACT_GL           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_FEE_CLS_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_NE_FEE_CLS_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_FEE_CLS_GL            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_COST_CLS_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_NE_COST_CLS_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_COST_CLS_GL           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    COUNTER_CHECK_FEE              NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    COUNTER_CHECK_COST             NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    METHOD                         VARCHAR2(10),
    AMORT_OTH_GL_FEE_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    DAILY_AMORT_OTH_GL_FEE_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    MTD_AMORT_OTH_GL_FEE_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
