create table IFRS.TMP_LI_SW0
(
    FACNO                    VARCHAR2(50),
    CIFNO                    VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCTNO                   VARCHAR2(70),
    BRCODE                   VARCHAR2(20),
    DATASOURCE               VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDTYPE                  VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDCODE                  VARCHAR2(20),
    MASTERID                 NUMBER(18),
    PREV_ACCTNO              VARCHAR2(70),
    PREV_FACNO               VARCHAR2(50),
    PREV_CIFNO               VARCHAR2(50),
    PREV_BRCODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PREV_DATASOURCE          VARCHAR2(20),
    PREV_PRDTYPE             VARCHAR2(20),
    PREV_PRDCODE             VARCHAR2(20),
    PREV_MASTERID            VARCHAR2(100),
    PREV_SL_ECF              VARCHAR2(3),
    PREV_EIR_ECF             VARCHAR2(3),
    METHOD                   VARCHAR2(10),
    CCY                      VARCHAR2(5),
    GLNOPREVCR               VARCHAR2(20),
    GLNOPREVDR               VARCHAR2(20),
    GLNOCURRCR               VARCHAR2(20),
    GLNOCURRDR               VARCHAR2(20),
    GLNOPREVCR2              VARCHAR2(20),
    GLNOPREVDR2              VARCHAR2(20),
    GLNOCURRCR2              VARCHAR2(20),
    GLNOCURRDR2              VARCHAR2(20),
    GL_INTERNAL_CODE_REVCR   VARCHAR2(100),
    GL_INTERNAL_CODE_PREVDR  VARCHAR2(100),
    GL_INTERNAL_CODE_CURRCR  VARCHAR2(100),
    GL_INTERNAL_CODE_CURRDR  VARCHAR2(100),
    GL_INTERNAL_CODE_PREVCR2 VARCHAR2(100),
    GL_INTERNAL_CODE_PREVDR2 VARCHAR2(100),
    GL_INTERNAL_CODE_CURRCR2 VARCHAR2(100),
    GL_INTERNAL_CODE_CURRDR2 VARCHAR2(100),
    COSTCENTER               VARCHAR2(20)
)
/

    INITIAL_COST_MTD     NUMBER(32, 6),

)

create table IFRS.TMP_LOAN_REPORT_RECON
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE                  DATE         not null,
    MASTERID                       NUMBER(18)   not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER                 VARCHAR2(70) not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME                  VARCHAR2(100),
    FACILITY_NUMBER                VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE                    VARCHAR2(20),
    DATA_SOURCE                    VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE                   VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE                   VARCHAR2(50),
    TRANSACTION_CODE               VARCHAR2(20),
    JF_FLAG                        VARCHAR2(1),
    FINANCING_TYPE                 VARCHAR2(70),
    FINANCING_SCHEME               VARCHAR2(70),
    MASKAPAI_CODE                  VARCHAR2(30),
    MASKAPAI_DESC                  VARCHAR2(100),
    PACKAGE_CODE                   VARCHAR2(30),
    CCY                            VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE                  NUMBER(19, 6) default 0,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY              CHAR,
    DAY_PAST_DUE                   NUMBER(10),
    INTEREST_RATE                  NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    EIR                            FLOAT,
    LOAN_START_DATE                DATE,
    LOAN_DUE_DATE                  DATE,
    OUTSTANDING                    NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    OUTSTANDING_JF                 NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    OUTSTANDING_BANK               NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    PLAFOND                        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_TRX_FEE_AMT            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_TRX_FEE_GL             NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_TRX_COST_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_TRX_COST_GL            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_FEE_AMT             NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_NE_FEE_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_FEE_GL              NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_COST_AMT            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_NE_COST_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INITIAL_GL_COST_GL             NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_MASTER_FEE_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_MASTER_FEE_NONEIR_AMT  NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_MASTER_COST_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_MASTER_COST_NONEIR_AMT NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_FEE_AMT             NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_NE_FEE_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_FEE_GL              NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_COST_AMT            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_NE_COST_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_COST_GL             NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_FEE_ACT_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_NE_FEE_ACT_AMT      NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_FEE_ACT_GL          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_COST_ACT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_NE_COST_ACT_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_COST_ACT_GL         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_FEE_CLS_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_NE_FEE_CLS_AMT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_GL_FEE_CLS_GL          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_COST_CLS_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_NE_COST_CLS_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_GL_COST_CLS_GL         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_FEE_AMT               NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_NE_FEE_AMT            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_FEE_GL                NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    DAILY_AMORT_GL_FEE_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    DAILY_AMORT_GL_NE_FEE_AMT      NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    MTD_AMORT_GL_FEE_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    MTD_AMORT_GL_NE_FEE_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    YTD_AMORT_GL_FEE_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    YTD_AMORT_GL_NE_FEE_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_COST_AMT              NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_NE_COST_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_COST_GL               NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    DAILY_AMORT_GL_COST_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    DAILY_AMORT_GL_NE_COST_AMT     NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    MTD_AMORT_GL_COST_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    MTD_AMORT_GL_NE_COST_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    YTD_AMORT_GL_COST_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    YTD_AMORT_GL_NE_COST_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_FEE_ACT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_NE_FEE_ACT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_FEE_ACT_GL            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_COST_ACT_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_NE_COST_ACT_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_COST_ACT_GL           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_FEE_CLS_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_NE_FEE_CLS_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_FEE_CLS_GL            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_COST_CLS_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_NE_COST_CLS_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    AMORT_GL_COST_CLS_GL           NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    COUNTER_CHECK_FEE              NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    COUNTER_CHECK_COST             NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    METHOD                         VARCHAR2(10)
)
/

    DISB_AMOUNT      NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    PLAFOND          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    I_DAYS           NUMBER(18)    default 0,
    COUNTER          NUMBER(10)    default 0,
    DATE_START       DATE,
    DATE_END         DATE,
    TENOR            NUMBER(10)    default 0,

    SCH_FLAG         VARCHAR2(2),

)

create table IFRS.TMP_SCHEDULE_PREV
(
    MASTERID         NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(70),
    INTEREST_RATE    NUMBER(12, 6) default 0,
    PMTDATE          DATE,
    OSPRN            NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    PRINCIPAL        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    INTEREST         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    DISB_PERCENTAGE  NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    DISB_AMOUNT      NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    PLAFOND          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    I_DAYS           NUMBER(10)    default 0,
    COUNTER          NUMBER(10)    default 0,
    DATE_START       DATE,
    DATE_END         DATE,
    TENOR            NUMBER(10)    default 0,
    PAYMENT_CODE     VARCHAR2(20),
    ICC              VARCHAR2(1),
    NEXT_PMTDATE     DATE,
    NEXT_COUNTER_PAY NUMBER(10)    default 0,
    SCH_FLAG         VARCHAR2(2),
    GRACE_DATE       DATE
)
/

create table IFRS.R_MODEL_FILTER_CORTEST
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_MODEL_FILTER_CORTEST
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID           NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    CORRELATION_VAL    NUMBER,
    VARIABLENAME       VARCHAR2(255),
    EXPECTED_TREND     VARCHAR2(20),
    IN_SAMPLE_SET      NUMBER(10),
    CORR_SIGN          CHAR,
    CORR_GT_FLG        CHAR,
    PASS               NUMBER(10),
    VARIABLE_SELECTION NUMBER(1),
    LOOKUPINITIAL      VARCHAR2(20),
    CORRTEST_STAT      NUMBER,
    CORRTEST_PVAL      NUMBER,
    TRANSFORM_C        NUMBER(10),
    TRANSFORM_M        NUMBER(10),
    SUM_TRANSFORM      NUMBER(10),
    ABS_CORRELATION    NUMBER,
    ADJ_CORRELATION    NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_R_MODEL_FILTER_CORTEST
    before insert
    on IFRS.R_MODEL_FILTER_CORTEST
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_R_MODEL_FILTER_CORTEST."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    MASTERID NUMBER(18)
)
/

create table IFRS.R_MODEL_FILTER_DTL_FULL
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_MODEL_FILTER_DTL_FULL
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID           NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    CORRELATION_VAL    NUMBER,
    VARIABLENAME       VARCHAR2(255),
    EXPECTED_TREND     VARCHAR2(20),
    IN_SAMPLE_SET      NUMBER(10),
    CORR_SIGN          CHAR,
    CORR_GT_FLG        CHAR,
    PASS               NUMBER(10),
    VARIABLE_SELECTION NUMBER(1),
    LOOKUPINITIAL      VARCHAR2(20),
    CORRTEST_STAT      NUMBER,
    CORRTEST_PVAL      NUMBER,
    TRANSFORM_C        NUMBER(10),
    TRANSFORM_M        NUMBER(10),
    SUM_TRANSFORM      NUMBER(10),
    ABS_CORRELATION    NUMBER,
    ADJ_CORRELATION    NUMBER,
    ADF_STATISTIC_NC   NUMBER,
    ADF_PVALUE_NC      NUMBER,
    ADF_STATISTIC_C    NUMBER,
    ADF_PVALUE_C       NUMBER,
    ADF_STATISTIC_CT   NUMBER,
    ADF_PVALUE_CT      NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_R_MODEL_FLTR_DTL_FULL
    before insert
    on IFRS.R_MODEL_FILTER_DTL_FULL
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_R_MODEL_FLTR_DTL_FULL."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.R_MODEL_FILTER_DTL
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_MODEL_FILTER_DTL
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID           NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    CORRELATION_VAL    NUMBER,
    VARIABLENAME       VARCHAR2(255),
    EXPECTED_TREND     VARCHAR2(20),
    IN_SAMPLE_SET      NUMBER,
    CORR_SIGN          CHAR,
    CORR_GT_FLG        CHAR,
    PASS               NUMBER,
    VARIABLE_SELECTION NUMBER(1),
    LOOKUPINITIAL      VARCHAR2(20),
    TRANSFORM_C        NUMBER(10),
    TRANSFORM_M        NUMBER(10),
    SUM_TRANSFORM      NUMBER(10),
    ABS_CORRELATION    NUMBER,
    ADJ_CORRELATION    NUMBER,
    ADF_STATISTIC_NC   NUMBER,
    ADF_PVALUE_NC      NUMBER,
    ADF_STATISTIC_C    NUMBER,
    ADF_PVALUE_C       NUMBER,
    ADF_STATISTIC_CT   NUMBER,
    ADF_PVALUE_CT      NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_R_MODEL_FILTER_DTL
    before insert
    on IFRS.R_MODEL_FILTER_DTL
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_R_MODEL_FILTER_DTL."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

            primary key,

    CNTMAX         NUMBER(10) not null,

    NEXT_EIR       NUMBER,
    EIR_NOCF       NUMBER,
    NEXT_EIR_NOCF  NUMBER,
    UNAMORT        NUMBER,
    UNAMORT_NOCF   NUMBER,
    FINAL_EIR      NUMBER,
    FINAL_EIR_NOCF NUMBER,
    NEXT_UNAMORT   NUMBER,
    FINAL_UNAMORT  NUMBER,
    UNAMORT_GLOSS  NUMBER
)
/

    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_PAYM_GS_DATE
    for each row
    when (NEW.ID IS NULL OR NEW.ID = 0)
begin
  select SEQ_IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIRPYM_GS_DT."NEXTVAL" into :new.id from dual;
END;

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_PAYM_GS
    on IFRS.IFRS_LBM_ACCT_EIR_PAYM_GS (MASTERID, COUNTER)

END;

create table IFRS.R_BACKTEST_OUT_SAMPLE
(
    PKID                NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_BACKTEST_OUT_SAMPLE
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID            NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    MODEL_SEQ           NUMBER(10),
    SUM_PDLOG_SQRD_ERR  NUMBER,
    SUM_PDRATE_SQRD_ERR NUMBER,
    AVG_PDLOG_SQRD_ERR  NUMBER,
    AVG_PDRATE_SQRD_ERR NUMBER,
    AVG_PDLOG_MAPE      NUMBER,
    AVG_PDRATE_MAPE     NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE         DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE         DATE,

    on IFRS.R_BACKTEST_OUT_SAMPLE (MODEL_ID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_R_BACKTEST_OUT_SAMPLE
    before insert
    on IFRS.R_BACKTEST_OUT_SAMPLE
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_R_BACKTEST_OUT_SAMPLE."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_PD_MAA_ENR
(
    PKID         NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_PD_MAA_ENR
            primary key,
    EFF_DATE     DATE                             not null,
    BASE_DATE    DATE                             not null,
    PD_RULE_ID   NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    BUCKET_GROUP VARCHAR2(30)                     not null,
    BUCKET_FROM  NUMBER(10),
    BUCKET_TO    NUMBER(10),
    CALC_AMOUNT  NUMBER(32, 6),
    CREATEDBY    VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE  DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST  VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY    VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE  DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST  VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_PD_MAA_ENR (EFF_DATE, PD_RULE_ID, BUCKET_FROM, BUCKET_TO)

    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_PD_MAA_ENR."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;

    PREVIOUS_ACCOUNT_NUMBER       VARCHAR2(50),

    OUTSTANDING_LCY               NUMBER(32, 6),

    OUTSTANDING_JF_LCY            NUMBER(32, 6),

    OUTSTANDING_PREVIOUS_LCY      NUMBER(32, 6),

    OUTSTANDING_IDC_LCY           NUMBER(32, 6),

    PLAFOND_IDC                   NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND_IDC_LCY               NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND_CASH                  NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND_CASH_LCY              NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMOUNT                 NUMBER(32, 6),

create table IFRS.R_TIMESERIES_MODEL_ERROR
(
    PKID          NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_TIMESERIES_MODEL_ERR
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID      NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    MODEL_SEQ     NUMBER(10),
    MACRO_VARNAME VARCHAR2(50),
    ERROR_MSG     VARCHAR2(1024),
    ERROR_REMARKS VARCHAR2(1024),
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE   DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE   DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_R_TIMESERIES_MODEL_ERR
    before insert
    on IFRS.R_TIMESERIES_MODEL_ERROR
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_R_TIMESERIES_MODEL_ERR."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.R_TIMESERIES_MODEL
(
    PKID            NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_TIMESERIES_MODEL
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID        NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    MODEL_SEQ       NUMBER(10),
    MACRO_VARNAME   VARCHAR2(50),
    MACRO_DESCR     VARCHAR2(255),
    DATA_FREQ       NUMBER(10),
    FORECAST_PERIOD NUMBER(10),
    CREATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE     DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE     DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_R_TIMESERIES_MODEL
    before insert
    on IFRS.R_TIMESERIES_MODEL
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_R_TIMESERIES_MODEL."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_COST_FEE
(
    ID              NUMBER(18) not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_ACCT_COST_FEE
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE   DATE,
    MASTERID        NUMBER(18),
    BRCODE          VARCHAR2(10),
    CIFNO           VARCHAR2(100),
    FACNO           VARCHAR2(100),
    ACCTNO          VARCHAR2(70),
    DATASOURCE      VARCHAR2(20),
    PRD_TYPE        VARCHAR2(20),
    PRD_CODE        VARCHAR2(20),
    TRX_CODE        VARCHAR2(20),
    CCY             VARCHAR2(5),
    FLAG_CF         CHAR,
    FLAG_REVERSE    CHAR,
    METHOD          VARCHAR2(10),
    STATUS          VARCHAR2(10),
    SRCPROCESS      VARCHAR2(10),
    AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    POS_AMOUNT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    ORG_CCY         VARCHAR2(5),
    ORG_CCY_EXRATE  NUMBER(32, 6),
    CF_ID           NUMBER(18),
    CREATEDDATE     DATE,
    CREATEDBY       VARCHAR2(20),
    FLAG_AL         CHAR,
    TRX_REFF_NUMBER VARCHAR2(100),
    CF_ID_REV       NUMBER(18),
    SOURCE_TABLE    VARCHAR2(100),
    TRX_LEVEL       VARCHAR2(5)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_ACCT_COST_FEE
    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_COST_FEE (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTERID)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_ACCT_COST_FEE_02
    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_COST_FEE (DOWNLOAD_DATE, FLAG_REVERSE, CF_ID_REV)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_ACCT_COST_FEE
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_COST_FEE
    for each row
    when (NEW.ID IS NULL OR NEW.ID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_ACCT_COST_FEE."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.ID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.TMP_MHD
(
    MID       NUMBER(18),
    STAFFLOAN NUMBER(10),
    PKID      NUMBER(18),
    NPVRATE   NUMBER(18, 10)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_TMP_MHD_01
    on IFRS.TMP_MHD (MID)
/

create table IFRS.TMP_T7_2
(
    MID       NUMBER(18),
    STAFFLOAN NUMBER(10),
    PKID      NUMBER(18),
    NPVRATE   NUMBER(18, 10)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_TMP_T7_2_01
    on IFRS.TMP_T7_2 (MID)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_TMP_T7_2_02
    on IFRS.TMP_T7_2 (MID, STAFFLOAN, PKID, NPVRATE)
/

create table IFRS.TMP_T7
(
    MASTERID  NUMBER(18),
    STAFFLOAN NUMBER(10),
    PKID      NUMBER(18),
    NPVRATE   NUMBER(18, 10)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_TMP_T7_01
    on IFRS.TMP_T7 (MASTERID)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_EVENT_CHANGES
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE  DATE         not null,
    MASTERID       NUMBER(18)   not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER VARCHAR2(70),
    EFFECTIVE_DATE DATE,
    BEFORE_VALUE   VARCHAR2(30) not null,
    AFTER_VALUE    VARCHAR2(30) not null,
    EVENT_ID       NUMBER(10)   not null,
    REMARKS        VARCHAR2(100),
    CREATEDBY      VARCHAR2(50),
    CREATED_DATE   DATE default SYSDATE
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_EVENT_CHANGES
    on IFRS.IFRS_EVENT_CHANGES (DOWNLOAD_DATE, EVENT_ID)
/

(
    NMBR NUMBER(10)
)

create table IFRS.IFRS_AC_RESULT_HIST
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint IFRS_AC_RESULT_HIST
            primary key,
    BMID               NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    SPPIID             NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    BMRESULT           VARCHAR2(10)                     not null,
    SPPIRESULT         VARCHAR2(10)                     not null,
    ASSETCLASS         VARCHAR2(10)                     not null,
    FAIRVALUEOPTION    NUMBER(1)                        not null,
    EFFECTIVE_DATE     DATE                             not null,
    VALID_DATE         DATE                             not null,
    ASSETCLASSOVERRIDE VARCHAR2(10),
    REMARKS            VARCHAR2(500),
    STATUS             NUMBER(10),
    REFPKID            NUMBER(18),
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30),
    REVIEWEDBY         VARCHAR2(36),
    REVIEWEDDATE       DATE,
    REVIEWEDHOST       VARCHAR2(30),
    REVIEWEDREMARK     VARCHAR2(1000)                   not null
)
/

    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_AC_RESULT_HIST
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_AC_RESULT_HIST."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;

    PKID           NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_AC_SPPI_HEADER
            primary key,

    STATUS         NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    OVERRIDEFLAG   NUMBER(1)                        not null,
    OVERRIDERESULT VARCHAR2(50),
    REMARK         VARCHAR2(4000),
    CREATEDBY      VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE    DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST    VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY      VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE    DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST    VARCHAR2(36),
    REVIEWEDBY     VARCHAR2(36),
    REVIEWEDDATE   DATE,
    REVIEWEDHOST   VARCHAR2(36)
)
/

    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)

    before insert

    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)

  INTO :new.PKID
  FROM dual;
END;

(
    PKID                NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_AC_OVERRIDE
            primary key,

    DOWNLOAD_DATE       DATE                             not null,
    EFFECTIVE_DATE      DATE                             not null,
    MASTER_ACCOUNT_CODE VARCHAR2(100)                    not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER      VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER     VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME       VARCHAR2(150),
    PRODUCT_DESC        VARCHAR2(255),
    SPPIRESULT          VARCHAR2(20)                     not null,
    BMRESULT            VARCHAR2(20)                     not null,
    ASSETCLASS          VARCHAR2(20)                     not null,
    STATUS              NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    OVERRIDEFLAG        NUMBER(1),
    OVERRIDERESULT      VARCHAR2(50),
    REMARK              VARCHAR2(4000),
    CREATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE         DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE         DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(36),
    REVIEWEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    REVIEWEDDATE        DATE,
    REVIEWEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36)
)
/

    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_AC_OVERRIDE
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)

END;

create table IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_SECID
(
    PKID        NUMBER(18) not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_MASTER_SECID
            primary key,
    SEC_ID      VARCHAR2(50),
    SEC_NAME    VARCHAR2(150),
    ISIN        VARCHAR2(50),
    DATA_SOURCE VARCHAR2(20)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_MASTER_SECID
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_SECID
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_MASTER_SECID."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE DATE                             not null,
    CURRENCY      VARCHAR2(3)                      not null,
    CURRENCY_DESC VARCHAR2(100)                    not null,
    RATE_AMOUNT   NUMBER(32, 6)                    not null,
    MAINTAIN_DATE TIMESTAMP(3)                     not null,
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE   DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE   DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_EXCEPTION_CODE
(
    PKID           NUMBER(18) not null,
    EXCEPTION_CODE VARCHAR2(36),
    EXCEPTION_TYPE VARCHAR2(100),
    DESCRIPTION    VARCHAR2(1000),
    TABLE_NAME     VARCHAR2(50),
    FIELD_NAME     VARCHAR2(50),
    HANDLING_DESC  VARCHAR2(2000),
    DEFAULT_ACTION NUMBER(10),
    IS_ACTIVE      NUMBER(1),
    CREATEDBY      VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM',
    CREATEDDATE    DATE         default SYSDATE,
    CREATEDHOST    VARCHAR2(30),
    UPDATEDBY      VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE    DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST    VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_EXCEPTION_CODE.DEFAULT_ACTION is '0 = Warning/ Passthrough, 1 = Block'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_EXCEPTION_CODE.IS_ACTIVE is '0 = Rule Inactive, 1 = Rule Active'
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_EXCEPTION_CODE_001
    on IFRS.IFRS_EXCEPTION_CODE (PKID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_EXCEPTION_CODE
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_EXCEPTION_CODE
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL)
BEGIN
 SELECT SEQ_IFRS_EXCEPTION_CODE.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_PREPAYMENT_HDR
(
    PKID            NUMBER(18),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE   DATE,
    TAHUN           NUMBER,
    SEGMENTATION    VARCHAR2(100),
    AVERAGE_SMM     NUMBER(32, 6),
    PREPAYMENT_RATE NUMBER(32, 6),
    CREATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36) default 'ADMIN'     not null,
    CREATEDDATE     DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(30) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE     DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    RESERVED_DATE_2        DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_3        DATE,

    UPLOADID            NUMBER(18),
    UPLOADBY            VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPLOADDATE          DATE         not null,
    UPLOADHOST          VARCHAR2(30) not null,
    APPROVEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    APPROVEDDATE        DATE,
    APPROVEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_TBLU_DCF_BULK
    on IFRS.TBLU_DCF_BULK (CUSTOMER_NUMBER, EXPECTED_PERIOD, EFFECTIVE_DATE)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TBLU_DCF_BULK
    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLU_DCF_BULK
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_TBLU_DCF_BULK."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

    RUN_ID                         VARCHAR2(1),
    REPORT_DATE                    DATE,

    DEFFERED_INCOME_FILTERED_LCL   FLOAT,

create table IFRS.IFRS_ME_DERIVED_FORCST_VAR_PEN
(
    PKID        NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_ME_DRV_FCST_VAR_PEN
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID    NUMBER(18),
    ME_PERIOD   DATE,
    ME_CODE     VARCHAR2(50),
    ME_VALUE    NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY   VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY   VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_FORCST_VAR_PEN_01
    on IFRS.IFRS_ME_DERIVED_FORCST_VAR_PEN (MODEL_ID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_ME_DRV_FCST_VAR_PEN
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_ME_DERIVED_FORCST_VAR_PEN
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_ME_DRV_FCST_VAR_PEN."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_ME_DERIVED_FORCST_VAR
(
    PKID        NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_ME_DRV_FCST_VAR
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID    NUMBER(18),
    ME_PERIOD   DATE,
    ME_CODE     VARCHAR2(50),
    ME_VALUE    NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY   VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY   VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_DERIVED_FORCST_VAR_01
    on IFRS.IFRS_ME_DERIVED_FORCST_VAR (MODEL_ID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_ME_DRV_FCST_VAR
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_ME_DERIVED_FORCST_VAR
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_ME_DRV_FCST_VAR."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(

    ESTIMATED_PRIN_AMOUNT  NUMBER(32, 6),
    ESTIMATED_INT_AMOUNT   NUMBER(32, 6),
    ESTIMATED_COLL_AMOUNT  NUMBER(32, 6),

    DISCOUNT_RATE          NUMBER,
    EIR                    NUMBER,
    INTEREST_RATE          NUMBER,
    PV_MONTH               NUMBER(10),
    PV_AMOUNT              NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    BEGIN_BALANCE          NUMBER(32, 6),
    INTEREST_UNWINDING     NUMBER(32, 6),
    ENDING_BALANCE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNWIND_BALANCE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_1     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_2     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_3     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_4     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_5     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_1      NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_2      NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_3      NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_4      NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_5      NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_RATE_1        NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_2        NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_3        NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_4        NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_5        NUMBER,
    RESERVED_FLAG_1        NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_2        NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_3        NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_4        NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_5        NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_DATE_1        DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_2        DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_3        DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_4        DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_5        DATE,
    CREATEDBY              VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE            DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST            VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY              VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE            DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST            VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLT_PAYMENTEXPECTED
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_TBLT_PAYMENTEXPECTED."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;

(
    RECOVERY_ID                 VARCHAR2(10),
    START_VALIDITY_DATE         DATE,
    END_VALIDITY_DATE           DATE,
    LOSS_EVENT_ID               VARCHAR2(10),
    LOSS_EFFECT_ID              VARCHAR2(10),
    RECOVERY_DESC               VARCHAR2(100),
    RECOVERY_TYPE               VARCHAR2(5),
    RECOVERY_DATE               DATE,
    RECOVERY_CURRENCY           VARCHAR2(5),
    RECOVERY_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOVERY_PROBABILITY        NUMBER(32, 6),
    IS_EFFECTIVE                VARCHAR2(2),
    PROVISION_OBJECT_ORIGIN     VARCHAR2(10),
    PROVISION_OBJECT_KEY_TYPE   VARCHAR2(2),
    PROVISION_OBJECT_KEY_VALUE  VARCHAR2(10),
    WRITE_OFF_OBJECT_ORIGIN     VARCHAR2(10),
    WRITE_OFF_OBJECT_KEY_TYPE   VARCHAR2(10),
    WRITE_OFF_OBJECT_KEY_VALUE  VARCHAR2(10),
    SOURCE_SYSTEM               VARCHAR2(10),
    RECOVERY_EXTERNAL_REFERENCE VARCHAR2(20),
    CHAR_CUST_ELEMENT1          VARCHAR2(10),
    CHAR_CUST_ELEMENT2          VARCHAR2(10),
    CHAR_CUST_ELEMENT3          VARCHAR2(10),
    CHAR_CUST_ELEMENT4          VARCHAR2(10),
    CHAR_CUST_ELEMENT5          VARCHAR2(10),
    NUM_CUST_ELEMENT1           NUMBER(32, 6),
    NUM_CUST_ELEMENT2           NUMBER(32, 6),
    NUM_CUST_ELEMENT3           NUMBER(32, 6),
    NUM_CUST_ELEMENT4           NUMBER(32, 6),
    NUM_CUST_ELEMENT5           NUMBER(32, 6),
    LAST_MODIFIED               DATE,
    MODIFIED_BY                 VARCHAR2(20)
)
/

    N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV  NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_AMORT_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_COST             NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_FEE              NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV   NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_AMORT_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),

)

create table IFRS.TMP_IFRS_ACCT_EIR_ACF
(
    ID                      NUMBER(18),
    MASTERID                NUMBER(18),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE           DATE,
    PREV_PMT_DATE           DATE,
    I_DAYS2                 NUMBER(10),
    N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_AMORT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV  NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_AMORT_AMT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_COST             NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_ADJ_FEE              NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_UNAMORT_AMT_PREV   NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_AMORT_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    NOCF_UNAMORT_AMT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    PREV_N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT NUMBER(32, 6),
    PREV_N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT  NUMBER(32, 6),
    FACILITY_NUMBER         VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER         VARCHAR2(50),
    DATA_SOURCE             VARCHAR2(20),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER          VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE             VARCHAR2(20),
    FLAG_AL                 VARCHAR2(10),
    DATASOURCE              VARCHAR2(20),
    N_UNAMORT_FEE           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_COST          NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECFDATE                 DATE
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_JOURNAL_DATA_SUMM
(
    ID            NUMBER(19),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE DATE,
    MASTERID      NUMBER(18),
    FACNO         VARCHAR2(50),
    CIFNO         VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCTNO        VARCHAR2(70),
    DATASOURCE    VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDTYPE       VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDCODE       VARCHAR2(20),
    BRANCH        VARCHAR2(20),
    METHOD        VARCHAR2(10),
    CCY           VARCHAR2(10),
    JOURNALCODE2  VARCHAR2(10),
    FLAG_CF       VARCHAR2(3),
    GLNO          VARCHAR2(20),
    N_AMOUNT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    CREATEDDATE   DATE,
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_ACCT_JOURNAL_DATA_SUM
    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_JOURNAL_DATA_SUMM (DOWNLOAD_DATE, JOURNALCODE2, N_AMOUNT)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_ACCT_JOURNAL_DATA_SUMM
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_JOURNAL_DATA_SUMM
    for each row
    when (NEW.ID IS NULL)
BEGIN
 SELECT SEQ_ACCT_JOURNAL_DATA_SUMM.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.ID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_INDEPENDENT_VARIABLE_PEN
(
    PKID                NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_INDEPENDENT_VAR_PEN
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID            NUMBER(18),
    ME_CODE             VARCHAR2(50),
    EXPECTED_TREND      VARCHAR2(50),
    TRANSFORMATION_TYPE VARCHAR2(250),
    CREATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE         DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE         DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(30),
    REFPKID             NUMBER(18),
    REVIEWEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    REVIEWEDDATE        DATE,
    REVIEWEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_INDEPENDENT_VAR_PEN
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_INDEPENDENT_VARIABLE_PEN
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_INDEPENDENT_VAR_PEN."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_PD_MAA_ODR
(
    PKID        NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_PD_MAA_ODR
            primary key,
    EFF_DATE    DATE                             not null,
    BASE_DATE   DATE                             not null,
    PD_RULE_ID  NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    ODR         NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY   VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY   VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_PD_MAA_ODR (EFF_DATE, PD_RULE_ID)

END;

(
    PKID                       NUMBER(18) not null
        constraint PK_TMP_IFRS_ME_MODEL
            primary key,
    MODEL_NAME                 VARCHAR2(100),
    PRC_DATE                   DATE,
    REGRESSION_TYPE            VARCHAR2(50),
    EXPONENT_VALUE             NUMBER(10),
    CUT_OFF_DATE               DATE,
    CORRELATION_TYPE           VARCHAR2(50),
    CORRELATION_FILTER_VALUE   NUMBER,
    MAX_CLUSTER                NUMBER(10),
    EIGEN_VALUE_THRESHOLD      NUMBER,
    SIGNIFICANT_VARIABLE_VALUE NUMBER,
    ADJUSTED_R_SQUARE_VALUE    NUMBER,
    VIF_VALUE                  NUMBER,
    BACK_TEST_TOP_N_RESULT     NUMBER(10),
    ARIMA_THRESHOLD            NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY                  VARCHAR2(36),
    CREATEDDATE                DATE,
    CREATEDHOST                VARCHAR2(30),
    UPDATEDBY                  VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE                DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST                VARCHAR2(30),
    STATUS                     CHAR,
    IS_DELETED                 NUMBER(1),
    AVG_RMSE_FILTER            NUMBER,
    MAPE_FILTER                NUMBER,
    QTR_MOVEMENT_FILTER        NUMBER,
    CORRELATION_ADJ_FACTOR     NUMBER,
    OUT_OF_SAMPLE_LASTDT       DATE,
    START_CUT_OFF_DATE         DATE,
    START_TEST_DATE            DATE,
    END_TEST_DATE              DATE
)
/

create table IFRS.TBLS_GRIDCOLUMNS
(
    PKID              NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_TBLS_GRIDCOLUMNS
            primary key,
    GRIDID            VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    FIELDNAME         VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    FIELDLENGTH       NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    CAPTION           VARCHAR2(100),
    SEQUENCE          NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    COLUMNTYPE        VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    DISPLAYFORMAT     VARCHAR2(50),
    SUMMARYTYPE       VARCHAR2(50),
    SHOWSELECT        NUMBER(1)                        not null,
    SHOWINSERT        NUMBER(1)                        not null,
    SHOWUPDATE        NUMBER(1)                        not null,
    SHOWEXPORT        NUMBER(1)                        not null,
    KEYSELECT         NUMBER(1)                        not null,
    KEYDELETE         NUMBER(1)                        not null,
    MANDATORY         NUMBER(1),
    READONLY          NUMBER(1),
    DEFAULTVALUE      NVARCHAR2(50),
    DATASOURCEID      VARCHAR2(50),
    LOOKUPFILTER      VARCHAR2(100),
    PARAMTYPESELECT   VARCHAR2(20),
    LINKURL           VARCHAR2(200),
    MINVALUE          NUMBER(10),
    MAXVALUE          NUMBER(10),
    TOOLTIPS          VARCHAR2(50),
    READONLYFIELDNAME VARCHAR2(50),
    CLIENTSCRIPT      VARCHAR2(100),
    SELECTEDINDEX     NUMBER(10),
    LINKIMAGE         VARCHAR2(200),
    BACKCOLOR         VARCHAR2(100),
    CREATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE       DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE       DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(36)
)
/

create table IFRS.TBLT_PAYMENTEXPECTEDH
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)                        not null
        constraint PK_TBLT_PAYMENTEXPECTEDH
            primary key,
    OVERRIDEID         NUMBER(18)                        not null,
    EFFECTIVE_DATE     DATE                              not null,
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50)                      not null,
    FACILITY_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER     VARCHAR2(50)                      not null,
    CURRENCY           VARCHAR2(5)                       not null,
    OUTSTANDING        NUMBER(32, 6) default 0           not null,
    EAD                NUMBER(32, 6) default 0           not null,
    COLLATERAL_AMOUNT  NUMBER(32, 6) default 0           not null,
    PV_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6) default 0           not null,
    ECL_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6) default 0           not null,
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_1 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_2 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_3 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_4 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_5 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_1  NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_2  NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_3  NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_4  NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_5  NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_RATE_1    NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_2    NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_3    NUMBER,

)

        constraint PK_R_MODEL_FILTER_DTL_FULL_PEN
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID           NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    CORRELATION_VAL    NUMBER,
    VARIABLENAME       VARCHAR2(255),
    EXPECTED_TREND     VARCHAR2(20),
    IN_SAMPLE_SET      NUMBER(10),
    CORR_SIGN          CHAR,
    CORR_GT_FLG        CHAR,
    PASS               NUMBER(10),
    VARIABLE_SELECTION NUMBER(1),
    LOOKUPINITIAL      VARCHAR2(20),
    CORRTEST_STAT      NUMBER,
    CORRTEST_PVAL      NUMBER,
    TRANSFORM_C        NUMBER(10),
    TRANSFORM_M        NUMBER(10),
    SUM_TRANSFORM      NUMBER(10),
    ABS_CORRELATION    NUMBER,
    ADJ_CORRELATION    NUMBER,
    ADF_STATISTIC_NC   NUMBER,
    ADF_PVALUE_NC      NUMBER,
    ADF_STATISTIC_C    NUMBER,
    ADF_PVALUE_C       NUMBER,
    ADF_STATISTIC_CT   NUMBER,
    ADF_PVALUE_CT      NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    on IFRS.R_MODEL_FILTER_DTL_FULL_PEN (MODEL_ID)

    before insert
    on IFRS.R_PD_PIT_PEN
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_R_PD_PIT_PEN."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;

create table IFRS.R_PD_PIT
(
    PKID         NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_PD_PIT
            primary key,
    EFF_DATE     DATE                             not null,
    BASE_DATE    DATE                             not null,
    PD_RULE_ID   NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    MODEL_ID     NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    MODEL_SEQ    NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    BUCKET_GROUP VARCHAR2(30)                     not null,
    BUCKET_ID    NUMBER(10),
    FL_YEAR      NUMBER(10),
    PIT          NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY    VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE  DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST  VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY    VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE  DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST  VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    on IFRS.R_PD_PIT (EFF_DATE, PD_RULE_ID, MODEL_ID, MODEL_SEQ, BUCKET_ID, FL_YEAR)

    on IFRS.R_PD_PIT (MODEL_ID)

    for each row

BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_R_PD_PIT."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;

    UPDATEDBY                VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE              DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST              VARCHAR2(30),

)

create index IFRS.IDX_TMP_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT
    on IFRS.TMP_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTERID)
/

    on IFRS.TMP_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT (DOWNLOAD_DATE, DATA_SOURCE)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_TMP_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT3
    on IFRS.TMP_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTER_ACCOUNT_CODE)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_TMP_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT4
    on IFRS.TMP_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT (DOWNLOAD_DATE, CUSTOMER_NUMBER)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_TMP_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT5
    on IFRS.TMP_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT (DOWNLOAD_DATE, PRODUCT_CODE)
/

create table IFRS.TBLM_JOBSACTIVATOR
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)   not null
        constraint PK_TBLM_JOBSACTIVATOR
            primary key,
    NAME               VARCHAR2(50) not null,
    ASSEMBLYNAME       VARCHAR2(100),
    TYPENAME           VARCHAR2(200),
    JOBMONITORING_FLAG NUMBER(1)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TBLM_JOBSACTIVATOR
    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLM_JOBSACTIVATOR
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_TBLM_JOBSACTIVATOR."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

)

create table IFRS.IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE
(
    PKID            NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE
            primary key,
    MASTERID        NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER VARCHAR2(100),
    CUSTOMER_NAME   VARCHAR2(150),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER  VARCHAR2(100),
    STAGE           CHAR,
    STAGE_OVERRIDE  CHAR,
    OVERRIDE_LEVEL  VARCHAR2(25),
    OVERRIDE_DATE   DATE,
    REMARKS         VARCHAR2(4000),
    CREATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE     DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE     DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.R_ARIMA_MODEL_STATS_PEN
(
    PKID          NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_ARIMA_MODEL_STATS_PEN
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID      NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    MODEL_SEQ     NUMBER(10),
    METHOD_DESCR  VARCHAR2(255),
    VARIABLENAME  VARCHAR2(50),
    ARIMAORDER    VARCHAR2(20),
    SEASONALARIMA VARCHAR2(20),
    SIGMASQEST    NUMBER,
    LOGLIK        NUMBER,
    AIC           NUMBER,
    ERR_ME        NUMBER,
    ERR_RMSE      NUMBER,
    ERR_MAE       NUMBER,
    ERR_MPE       NUMBER,
    ERR_MAPE      NUMBER,
    ERR_MASE      NUMBER,
    ERR_ACF1      NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE   DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE   DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_R_ARIMA_MODEL_STATS_PEN
    before insert
    on IFRS.R_ARIMA_MODEL_STATS_PEN
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_R_ARIMA_MODEL_STATS_PEN."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.R_ARIMA_MODEL_COEFF_PEN
(
    PKID         NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_ARIMA_MODEL_COEFF_PEN
            primary key,
    MODEL_ID     NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    MODEL_SEQ    NUMBER(10),
    METHOD_DESCR VARCHAR2(255),
    VARIABLENAME VARCHAR2(50),
    ARCOEFFNAME  VARCHAR2(20),
    ARCOEFFVAL   NUMBER,
    ARCOEFFSE    NUMBER,
    MACOEFFNAME  VARCHAR2(20),
    MACOEFFVAL   NUMBER,
    MACOEFFSE    NUMBER,
    SARCOEFFNAME VARCHAR2(20),
    SARCOEFFVAL  NUMBER,
    SARCOEFFSE   NUMBER,
    SMACOEFFNAME VARCHAR2(20),
    SMACOEFFVAL  NUMBER,
    SMACOEFFSE   NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY    VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE  DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST  VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY    VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE  DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST  VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_R_ARIMA_MODEL_COEFF_PEN
    before insert
    on IFRS.R_ARIMA_MODEL_COEFF_PEN
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_R_ARIMA_MODEL_COEFF_PEN."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE      DATE,
    MASTERID           NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER     VARCHAR2(50),
    EAD_BALANCE        VARCHAR2(250),
    NUNAMORT_FEE_AMT   NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT   NUMBER(32, 6),
    CCF_RULE_ID        VARCHAR2(50),
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_ID VARCHAR2(50),
    EAD_RULE_ID        VARCHAR2(50),
    SEGMENTATION_ID    NUMBER(18),
    EAD_SEGMENT        NUMBER(18),
    CCF_RATE           NUMBER,
    UNUSED_AMOUNT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INT_RATE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_EFF_INT_RATE     NUMBER(32, 6),
    PMTDATE            DATE,
    N_INSTALLMENT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_PRN_PAYMENT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_INT_PAYMENT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_OSPRN            NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FAIRVALUE        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_AMT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_COST_UNAMORT_AMT NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_FEE_UNAMORT_AMT  NUMBER(32, 6),
    PREPAYMENT_RATE    NUMBER,
    CCF_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    EAD_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6)
)
/

    COUNTER         NUMBER(18),
    ICC             VARCHAR2(1),
    OUTSTANDING     NUMBER(32, 6),
    SOURCE_PROCESS  VARCHAR2(20),
    SCH_FLAG        VARCHAR2(2),
    GRACE_DATE      DATE
)

create table IFRS.R_PD_CUMULATIVE
(
    PKID          NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_PD_CUMULATIVE
            primary key,
    EFF_DATE      DATE                             not null,
    BASE_DATE     DATE                             not null,
    PD_RULE_ID    NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    MODEL_ID      NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    MODEL_SEQ     NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    BUCKET_GROUP  VARCHAR2(30)                     not null,
    BUCKET_ID     NUMBER(10),
    FL_YEAR       NUMBER(10),
    CUMULATIVE_PD NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE   DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE   DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_R_PD_CUMULATIVE
    on IFRS.R_PD_CUMULATIVE (EFF_DATE, PD_RULE_ID, MODEL_ID, MODEL_SEQ, BUCKET_ID, FL_YEAR)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_R_PD_CUMULATIVE_01
    on IFRS.R_PD_CUMULATIVE (MODEL_ID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_R_PD_CUMULATIVE
    before insert
    on IFRS.R_PD_CUMULATIVE
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_R_PD_CUMULATIVE."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    PKID          NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_PD_TERM_STRUCTURE
            primary key,
    EFF_DATE      DATE                             not null,
    BASE_DATE     DATE                             not null,
    PD_RULE_ID    NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    PD_RULE_NAME  VARCHAR2(150),
    MODEL_ID      NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    MODEL_SEQ     NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    BUCKET_GROUP  VARCHAR2(30)                     not null,
    BUCKET_ID     NUMBER(10),
    FL_SEQ        NUMBER(10),
    FL_YEAR       NUMBER(10),
    FL_MONTH      NUMBER(10),
    FL_DATE       DATE,
    PD            NUMBER,
    PRODUCTION_PD NUMBER,
    OVERRIDE_PD   NUMBER,
    PRC_FLAG      VARCHAR2(1),
    TM_TYPE       VARCHAR2(10),
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE   DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE   DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_R_PD_TERM_STRUCTURE
    on IFRS.R_PD_TERM_STRUCTURE (EFF_DATE, PD_RULE_ID, MODEL_ID, MODEL_SEQ, BUCKET_ID, FL_DATE, PRC_FLAG)

    on IFRS.R_PD_TERM_STRUCTURE (MODEL_ID)

create table IFRS.IFRS_PREPAYMENT_UNPROCESS
(
    PKID                 NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_PREPAYMENT_UNPROCESS
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE        DATE                             not null,
    REPORT_DATE          DATE,
    MASTERID             NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER       VARCHAR2(30)                     not null,
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER      VARCHAR2(30)                     not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME        VARCHAR2(150),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS       VARCHAR2(20),
    PREPAYMENT_SEGMENT   VARCHAR2(100),
    SEGMENTATION_ID      NUMBER(18),
    SEGMENTATION_NAME    VARCHAR2(100),
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_ID   NUMBER(18),
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_NAME VARCHAR2(150),
    CURRENCY             VARCHAR2(5),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY    VARCHAR2(10),
    OUTSTANDING          NUMBER(32, 6),
    PREPAYMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    SCHEDULE             NUMBER(32, 6),
    ACTUAL               NUMBER(32, 6),
    RATE_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    SMM                  NUMBER(32, 6),
    REVOLVING_FLAG       NUMBER(1),
    PRODUCT_CODE         VARCHAR2(10),
    DATA_SOURCE          VARCHAR2(20),
    LATE_PAYMENT_FLAG    NUMBER(1),
    INCREMENTS           NUMBER(10),
    COMPONENT_TYPE       CHAR,
    CREATEDBY            VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE          DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST          VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY            VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE          DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST          VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_PREPAYMENT_UNPROCESS
    on IFRS.IFRS_PREPAYMENT_UNPROCESS (DOWNLOAD_DATE, REPORT_DATE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, SEGMENTATION_ID)
/

    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)

  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_PREPAYMENT_UNPROCESS."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;

    STATIONARY_MIN_P_VALUE  NUMBER(32, 6) not null,
    STATIONARY_TEST_METHOD  VARCHAR2(50),
    STATIONARY_APPLY_TO     VARCHAR2(20),

    DEPENDENT_VAR_VALUE     VARCHAR2(50),
    REGRESSION_TYPE         VARCHAR2(50),
    IN_SAMPLE_START_DATE    DATE,
    IN_SAMPLE_END_DATE      DATE,
    OUT_SAMPLE_START_DATE   DATE,
    OUT_SAMPLE_END_DATE     DATE,
    MAX_VAR_COMBINATION     NUMBER(10)    not null,
    TOP_N_MODEL             NUMBER(10)    not null,
    SIGNIFICANT_P_VALUE     NUMBER(32, 6) not null,
    ADJUSTED_R_SQUARE_VALUE NUMBER(32, 6) not null,
    RUN_STATUS              NUMBER(10)    not null,
    STATUS                  NUMBER(10)    not null,
    REMARK                  VARCHAR2(100),
    INTERCEPT_FLAG          NUMBER(1)     not null,
    CREATEDBY               VARCHAR2(36)  not null,
    CREATEDDATE             DATE          not null,
    CREATEDHOST             VARCHAR2(36)  not null,
    UPDATEDBY               VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE             DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST             VARCHAR2(30),

)

    UPDATEDDATE    DATE,

create table IFRS.IFRS_ECL_MODEL_HEADER_PEND
(
    PKID           NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_ECL_MODEL_HEADER_PEND
            primary key,
    ECL_MODEL_NAME VARCHAR2(50),
    ACTIVE_FLAG    NUMBER(1)    default 0           not null,
    EFFECTIVE_DATE DATE                             not null,
    RUN_STATUS     VARCHAR2(50),
    LAST_RUN_DATE  DATE,
    REFPKID        NUMBER(18),
    STATUS         NUMBER(10),
    ACTION         VARCHAR2(10),
    CREATEDBY      VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE    DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST    VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY      VARCHAR2(36),

)

    ME_TIME_SERIES          VARCHAR2(100),
    ME_PERIOD_START         DATE,
    ME_PERIOD_END           DATE,
    CREATEDBY               VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE             DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST             VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY               VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE             DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST             VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_PREPAYMENT_PROCESS
(
    PKID                 NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_PREPAYMENT_PROCESS
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE        DATE,
    REPORT_DATE          DATE,
    MASTERID             NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER       VARCHAR2(30),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER      VARCHAR2(30),
    CUSTOMER_NAME        VARCHAR2(150),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS       VARCHAR2(20),
    PREPAYMENT_SEGMENT   VARCHAR2(100),
    SEGMENTATION_ID      NUMBER(18),
    SEGMENTATION_NAME    VARCHAR2(100),
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_ID   NUMBER(18),
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_NAME VARCHAR2(150),
    CURRENCY             VARCHAR2(5),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY    VARCHAR2(10),
    OUTSTANDING          NUMBER(32, 6),
    PREPAYMENT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    SCHEDULE             NUMBER(32, 6),
    ACTUAL               NUMBER(32, 6),
    RATE_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    SMM                  NUMBER(32, 6),
    REVOLVING_FLAG       NUMBER(1),
    PRODUCT_CODE         VARCHAR2(10),
    DATA_SOURCE          VARCHAR2(20),
    LATE_PAYMENT_FLAG    NUMBER(1),
    INCREMENTS           NUMBER(10),
    COMPONENT_TYPE       CHAR,
    CREATEDBY            VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE          DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST          VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY            VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE          DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST          VARCHAR2(30),
    SEGMENTATION         VARCHAR2(20),
    RESTRUCTURE_FLAG     NUMBER(1),
    LOAN_DUE_DATE        DATE
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_PREPAYMENT_DETAIL
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_PREPAYMENT_DETAIL
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE      DATE                             not null,
    REPORT_DATE        DATE                             not null,
    MASTERID           NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER     VARCHAR2(20)                     not null,
    SEGMENTATION_ID    NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    PREPAYMENT_SEGMENT VARCHAR2(100)                    not null,
    CURRENCY           VARCHAR2(5)                      not null,
    OUTSTANDING        NUMBER(32, 6)                    not null,
    PREPAYMENT         NUMBER(32, 6)                    not null,
    SCHEDULE           NUMBER(32, 6)                    not null,
    ACTUAL             NUMBER(32, 6)                    not null,
    RATE_AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6)                    not null,
    SMM                NUMBER(32, 6)                    not null,
    INCREMENTS         NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    DURATION           NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    COMPONENT_TYPE     CHAR                             not null,
    DATA_SOURCE        VARCHAR2(20)                     not null,
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) default 'ADMIN'     not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME      VARCHAR2(50)
)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_PREPAYMENT_DETAIL (DOWNLOAD_DATE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, SEGMENTATION_ID, DURATION)

create table IFRS.IFRS_EXCEPTION_DETAILS
(
    PKID           NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    SESSION_ID     VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE  DATE                             not null,
    UNIQUE_ID      VARCHAR2(100)                    not null,
    EXCEPTION_CODE VARCHAR2(36)                     not null,
    VALUE          VARCHAR2(1000)                   not null,
    ACTION         NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    ACTION_DATE    DATE                             not null,
    CREATEDBY      VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE    DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST    VARCHAR2(30) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY      VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE    DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST    VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_EXCEPTION_DETAILS.SESSION_ID is 'SESSION_ID from IFRS_PRC_DATE.SESSION_ID'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_EXCEPTION_DETAILS.UNIQUE_ID is 'e.g. ACC001-IDR-CORPORATE'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_EXCEPTION_DETAILS.ACTION is '0 = Warning/ Passthrough, 1 = Block'
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_EXCEPTION_DETAILS_001
    on IFRS.IFRS_EXCEPTION_DETAILS (PKID)
/

alter table IFRS.IFRS_EXCEPTION_DETAILS
    add constraint IFRS_EXCEPTION_DETAILS_PK
        primary key (PKID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_EXCEPTION_DETAILS
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_EXCEPTION_DETAILS
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL)
BEGIN
 SELECT SEQ_IFRS_EXCEPTION_DETAILS.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_FL_MODEL_VAR_PEN
(
    PKID                    NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_FL_MODEL_VAR_PEN
            primary key,
    FL_MODEL_NAME           VARCHAR2(50),
    SELECTION_METHOD        VARCHAR2(50),
    FILTER_METHOD           VARCHAR2(50),
    CORRELATION_THRESHOLD   NUMBER                           not null,
    TOP_N_VARIABLES         NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    EIGEN_VALUE_THRESHOLD   NUMBER                           not null,
    MAX_CLUSTER             NUMBER                           not null,
    STATIONARY_TEST_FLAG    NUMBER(1)                        not null,
    STATIONARY_MIN_P_VALUE  NUMBER(32, 6)                    not null,
    STATIONARY_TEST_METHOD  VARCHAR2(50),
    STATIONARY_APPLY_TO     VARCHAR2(20),
    DEPENDENT_VAR_TYPE      VARCHAR2(10),
    DEPENDENT_VAR_VALUE     VARCHAR2(50),
    REGRESSION_TYPE         VARCHAR2(50),
    IN_SAMPLE_START_DATE    DATE,
    IN_SAMPLE_END_DATE      DATE,
    OUT_SAMPLE_START_DATE   DATE,
    OUT_SAMPLE_END_DATE     DATE,
    TOP_N_MODEL             NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    SIGNIFICANT_P_VALUE     NUMBER(32, 6)                    not null,
    ADJUSTED_R_SQUARE_VALUE NUMBER(32, 6)                    not null,
    APPLY_LOGIT_FLAG        NUMBER(1)    default 1           not null,
    APPLY_DIFFERENCING_FLAG NUMBER(1)    default 1           not null,
    BLUE_TEST_COUNT         NUMBER(10)   default 4           not null,
    SELECTED_MODEL_SEQ      NUMBER(10)   default 0           not null,
    RUN_STATUS              NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    STATUS                  NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    REMARK                  VARCHAR2(100),
    INTERCEPT_FLAG          NUMBER(1),
    CREATEDBY               VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE             DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST             VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY               VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE             DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST             VARCHAR2(30),
    REVIEWEDBY              VARCHAR2(36),
    REVIEWEDDATE            DATE,
    REVIEWEDHOST            VARCHAR2(36)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_FL_MODEL_VAR_PEN
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_FL_MODEL_VAR_PEN
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_FL_MODEL_VAR_PEN."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.R_LGD_TERM_STRUCTURE_PEN
(
    PKID           NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_R_LGD_TERM_STRUCTURE_PEN
            primary key,
    EFF_DATE       DATE                             not null,
    LGD_RULE_ID    NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    LGD_RULE_NAME  VARCHAR2(150),
    MODEL_ID       NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    MODEL_SEQ      NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    FL_SEQ         NUMBER(10),
    FL_YEAR        NUMBER(10),
    FL_MONTH       NUMBER(10),
    FL_DATE        DATE,
    LGD            NUMBER,
    PRODUCTION_LGD NUMBER,
    OVERRIDE_LGD   NUMBER,
    PRC_FLAG       VARCHAR2(1),
    CREATEDBY      VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE    DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST    VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY      VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE    DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST    VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    OBJECT_TYPE       VARCHAR2(30),

    PARENT_ID         NUMBER,

    POSITION          NUMBER,
    COST              NUMBER,
    CARDINALITY       NUMBER,
    BYTES             NUMBER,

    PARTITION_START   VARCHAR2(255),
    PARTITION_STOP    VARCHAR2(255),
    PARTITION_ID      NUMBER,
    OTHER             LONG,
    DISTRIBUTION      VARCHAR2(30),
    CPU_COST          NUMBER,
    IO_COST           NUMBER,
    TEMP_SPACE        NUMBER,
    ACCESS_PREDICATES VARCHAR2(4000),

)

create table IFRS.TBLT_APPROVALHEADER
(
    PKID             NUMBER(18)                             not null
        primary key,
    MASTERID         NUMBER(18)         default (0)         not null,
    SCREENID         VARCHAR2(50 char)                      not null,
    PARENTFIELDNAME  VARCHAR2(50),
    ACTION           VARCHAR2(10 char),
    STATUS           VARCHAR2(10 char)                      not null,
    NOTE             VARCHAR2(100 char) default (' ')       not null,
    OLDBINARY        BLOB,
    QUERY            CLOB                                   not null,
    MODULEID         VARCHAR2(50 char),
    COUNTRYID        VARCHAR2(10 char),
    REFPKID          VARCHAR2(100 char),
    PENDING_MODEL_ID NUMBER(18)                             not null,
    ASSEMBLY_NAME    VARCHAR2(30),
    TYPENAME         VARCHAR2(30),
    CREATEDBY        VARCHAR2(36)       default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE      DATE               default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST      VARCHAR2(36)       default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY        VARCHAR2(36 char)  default (' '),
    UPDATEDDATE      DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST      VARCHAR2(30 char)  default (' ')
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TBLT_APPROVALHEADER
    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLT_APPROVALHEADER
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_TBLT_APPROVALHEADER.NEXTVAL
  INTO   :new.pkid
  FROM   dual;
END;
/

    RESERVED_AMOUNT_17        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_18        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_19        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_20        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_RATE_1           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_2           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_3           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_4           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_5           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_6           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_7           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_8           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_9           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_10          NUMBER,
    RESERVED_FLAG_1           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_2           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_3           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_4           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_5           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_6           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_7           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_8           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_9           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_10          NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_DATE_1           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_2           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_3           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_4           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_5           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_6           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_7           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_8           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_9           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_10          DATE,
    CREATEDBY                 VARCHAR2(36),
    CREATEDDATE               DATE,
    CREATEDHOST               VARCHAR2(30),
    UPDATEDBY                 VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE               DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST               VARCHAR2(30),
    SEGMENT_RULE_ID           NUMBER(18),
    PREPAYMENT_SEGMENT        VARCHAR2(100),
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18)
)
    on commit preserve rows
/

    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_LIFETIME_RULES_CONFIG
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_LIFETIME_RULES_CONFIG."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;

    RESERVED_DATE_3    DATE,

    RESERVED_DATE_5    DATE,
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_IA_OVERRIDED
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_IA_OVERRIDED
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_IA_OVERRIDED."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.TBLU_RATING_BANK
(
    PKID          NUMBER(18)    not null
        constraint PK_TBLU_RATING_BANK
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE DATE          not null,
    SWIFT_CODE    VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    BANK_NAME     VARCHAR2(100) not null,
    COUNTRY       VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    RATING_SOURCE VARCHAR2(20)  not null,
    RATING        VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_FINAL  VARCHAR2(10),
    DATE_RANK     DATE,
    UPLOADID      NUMBER(18)    not null,
    UPLOADBY      VARCHAR2(36)  not null,
    UPLOADDATE    DATE          not null,
    UPLOADHOST    VARCHAR2(30)  not null,
    APPROVEDBY    VARCHAR2(36),
    APPROVEDDATE  DATE,
    APPROVEDHOST  VARCHAR2(30),
    MULTIPLIER    NUMBER
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_TBLU_RATING_BANK
    on IFRS.TBLU_RATING_BANK (DOWNLOAD_DATE, RATING_SOURCE, SWIFT_CODE)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TBLU_RATING_BANK
    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLU_RATING_BANK
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_TBLU_RATING_BANK."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_UPDATE_EIR_DAY1
(
    MASTERID NUMBER(18) not null,
    MAX_EIR  NUMBER
)
/

create table IFRS.TMP_PD_TERM_STRUCTURE_TEST
(
    EFF_DATE     DATE,
    BASE_DATE    DATE,
    PD_RULE_ID   NUMBER(18),
    MODEL_ID     NUMBER(18),
    BUCKET_GROUP VARCHAR2(30),
    BUCKET_ID    NUMBER(10),
    FL_SEQ       NUMBER(10),
    FL_YEAR      NUMBER(10),
    FL_DATE      DATE,
    FL_MONTH     NUMBER,
    PD           NUMBER
)
/

create table IFRS.TMP_PD_TERM_STRUCTURE
(
    EFF_DATE     DATE,
    BASE_DATE    DATE,
    PD_RULE_ID   NUMBER(18),
    MODEL_ID     NUMBER(18),
    BUCKET_GROUP VARCHAR2(30),
    BUCKET_ID    NUMBER(10),
    FL_SEQ       NUMBER(10),
    FL_YEAR      NUMBER(10),
    FL_DATE      DATE,
    FL_MONTH     NUMBER,
    PD           NUMBER
)
/

create table IFRS.TMP_IFRS_EAD_RESULT
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE      DATE             not null,
    MASTERID           NUMBER(18)       not null,
    CURRENCY           VARCHAR2(5)      not null,
    EXCHANGE_RATE      NUMBER default 1 not null,
    ECL_MODEL_ID       NUMBER(18)       not null,
    CR_STAGE           CHAR,
    EAD_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18)       not null,
    EAD_SEGMENT        VARCHAR2(100)    not null,
    CCF_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18),
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_ID NUMBER(18),
    UNUSED_AMOUNT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    REVOLVING_FLAG     NUMBER(1),
    MARKET_AMOUNT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED   NUMBER(32, 6),
    CCF_RATE           NUMBER,
    CCF_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    PREPAYMENT_RATE    NUMBER,
    PREPAYMENT_AMOUNT  NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_COST   NUMBER(32, 6),
    FAIRVALUE          NUMBER(32, 6),
    PMTDATE            DATE,
    EAD_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    COUNTER            NUMBER(10),
    MAX_COUNTER        NUMBER(10),
    SOURCE             VARCHAR2(100),
    INCREMENTS         NUMBER(10)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_TMP_IFRS_EAD_RESULT
    on IFRS.TMP_IFRS_EAD_RESULT (DOWNLOAD_DATE, ECL_MODEL_ID, EAD_RULE_ID, MASTERID, COUNTER)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_ECL_DKP
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE     DATE,
    DATA_SOURCE       VARCHAR2(20),
    ECL_MODEL_ID      NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    PRODUCT_CODE      VARCHAR2(20),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME     VARCHAR2(150),
    SUB_SEGMENT       VARCHAR2(50),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY CHAR,
    CURRENCY          VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE     NUMBER,
    CR_STAGE          VARCHAR2(5),
    BUCKET_GROUP      VARCHAR2(30),
    BUCKET_ID         NUMBER(10),
    OUTSTANDING       NUMBER(32, 6),
    FAIR_VALUE_AMOUNT NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_COST  NUMBER,
    FL_YEAR           NUMBER(10),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED  NUMBER(32, 6),
    CCF_RATE          NUMBER,
    CCF_AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    PREPAYMENT_RATE   NUMBER,
    PREPAYMENT_AMOUNT NUMBER(32, 6),
    EAD_AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    LIFETIME_PERIOD   NUMBER(10),
    PD_RATE           NUMBER,
    LGD_RATE          NUMBER,
    DISCOUNT_RATE     NUMBER,
    DAY_PAST_DUE      NUMBER(10),
    IMPAIRED_FLAG     CHAR,
    SPECIAL_REASON    VARCHAR2(4000),
    ECL_AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMOUNT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    INTEREST_RATE     NUMBER,
    EIR               NUMBER,
    COUNTER_PAYSCHD   NUMBER(10),
    SWIFT_CODE        VARCHAR2(15)
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_ECL_RESULT_HEADER_BR
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE      DATE,
    ECL_MODEL_ID       NUMBER(18),
    PF_SEGMENT_ID      NUMBER(18),
    GROUP_SEGMENT      VARCHAR2(50),
    SEGMENT            VARCHAR2(50),
    SUB_SEGMENT        VARCHAR2(50),
    DATA_SOURCE        VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_GROUP      VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE       VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE       VARCHAR2(20),
    OUTSTANDING        NUMBER(32, 6),
    BUCKET_GROUP       VARCHAR2(30),
    BUCKET_ID          NUMBER(10),
    CR_STAGE           CHAR,
    EAD_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    PREPAYMENT_AMOUNT  NUMBER(32, 6),
    CCF_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30),
    BRANCH_CODE        VARCHAR2(10),
    FAIR_VALUE_AMOUNT  NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_4 VARCHAR2(10),
    EXCHANGE_RATE      NUMBER,
    CURRENCY           VARCHAR2(10),
    IFRS9_CLASS        VARCHAR2(10),
    ECL_OFF_BS         NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_ON_BS          NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_AMOUNT_FINAL   NUMBER(32, 6)
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_JOURNAL_DATA_ACV
(
    ID                 NUMBER(18) not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE      DATE,
    MASTERID           NUMBER(18),
    FACNO              VARCHAR2(50),
    CIFNO              VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCTNO             VARCHAR2(70),
    DATASOURCE         VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDTYPE            VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDCODE            VARCHAR2(20),
    TRXCODE            VARCHAR2(20),
    CCY                VARCHAR2(10),
    JOURNALCODE        VARCHAR2(20),
    JOURNALCODE2       VARCHAR2(10),
    STATUS             VARCHAR2(20),
    REVERSE            VARCHAR2(3),
    FLAG_CF            VARCHAR2(3),
    DRCR               VARCHAR2(2),
    GLNO               VARCHAR2(20),
    N_AMOUNT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMOUNT_IDR       NUMBER(32, 6),
    SOURCEPROCESS      VARCHAR2(20),
    INTMID             NUMBER(18),
    BRANCH             VARCHAR2(20),
    NOREF              VARCHAR2(20),
    VALCTR_CODE        VARCHAR2(50),
    JOURNAL_DESC       VARCHAR2(200),
    CREATEDDATE        DATE,
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(30),
    GL_INTERNAL_CODE   VARCHAR2(100),
    METHOD             VARCHAR2(10),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_1 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_2 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_3 VARCHAR2(100),
    GL_COSTCENTER      VARCHAR2(10)
)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_JOURNAL_DATA_ACV (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTERID)

/
