create table IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_ACV
(
    PKID                      NUMBER(18)    not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE             DATE          not null,
    MASTERID                  NUMBER(18)    not null,
    MASTER_ACCOUNT_CODE       VARCHAR2(100) not null,
    DATA_SOURCE               VARCHAR2(20),
    GLOBAL_CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME             VARCHAR2(150),
    FACILITY_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER            VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    PREVIOUS_ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS            VARCHAR2(20),
    INTEREST_RATE             NUMBER,
    MARKET_RATE               NUMBER,
    PRODUCT_GROUP             VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_ENTITY            CHAR,
    GL_CONSTNAME              VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE               VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE_OPEN          VARCHAR2(50),
    CURRENCY                  VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE             NUMBER,
    INITIAL_OUTSTANDING       NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING               NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_IDC           NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_JF            NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_BANK          NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_PASTDUE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND                   NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND_CASH              NUMBER(32, 6),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED          NUMBER(32, 6),
    INSTALLMENT_AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    DOWN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    JF_FLAG                   NUMBER(1),
    LOAN_START_DATE           DATE,
    LOAN_DUE_DATE             DATE,
    LOAN_START_AMORTIZATION   DATE,
    LOAN_END_AMORTIZATION     DATE,
    INSTALLMENT_GRACE_PERIOD  DATE,
    NEXT_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE     DATE,
    LAST_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    FIRST_INSTALLMENT_DATE    DATE,
    TENOR                     NUMBER(10),
    REMAINING_TENOR           NUMBER(10),
    PAYMENT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PAYMENT_TERM              VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_CALCULATION_CODE VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_PAYMENT_TERM     VARCHAR2(2),
    RESTRUCTURE_DATE          DATE,
    RESTRUCTURE_FLAG          NUMBER(1),
    POCI_FLAG                 NUMBER(1),
    STAFF_LOAN_FLAG           NUMBER(1),
    BELOW_MARKET_FLAG         NUMBER(1),
    BTB_FLAG                  NUMBER(1),
    COMMITTED_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    REVOLVING_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    IAS_CLASS                 VARCHAR2(10),
    IFRS9_CLASS               VARCHAR2(50),
    BM_RESULT                 VARCHAR2(50),
    SPPI_RESULT               VARCHAR2(50),
    AMORT_TYPE                VARCHAR2(10),
    EIR_STATUS                CHAR,
    ECF_STATUS                CHAR,
    EIR                       NUMBER,
    EIR_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    FAIR_VALUE_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_TXN_COST  NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_ORG_FEE   NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    DAILY_AMORT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_BENEFIT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_AMT_TOTAL_JF      NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_JF        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT_JF       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ORIGINAL_COLLECTABILITY   CHAR,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY         CHAR,
    ORIGINAL_DAY_PAST_DUE     NUMBER(10),
    DAY_PAST_DUE              NUMBER(10),
    DPD_START_DATE            DATE,
    DPD_ZERO_COUNTER          NUMBER(10),
    NPL_DATE                  DATE,
    NPL_FLAG                  NUMBER(1),
    DEFAULT_DATE              DATE,
    DEFAULT_FLAG              NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_FLAG             NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_DATE             DATE,
    OUTSTANDING_WO            NUMBER(32, 6),
    IMPAIRED_FLAG             CHAR,
    IS_IMPAIRED               NUMBER(1),
    GROUP_SEGMENT             VARCHAR2(50),
    SEGMENT                   VARCHAR2(100),
    SUB_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(50),
    CR_STAGE                  CHAR,
    CCF_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    CCF_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    LIFETIME_RULE_ID          NUMBER(18),
    LIFETIME_SEGMENT          VARCHAR2(100),
    LIFETIME                  NUMBER(10),
    EAD_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    EAD_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    EAD_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    LGD_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    LGD_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    PD_RULE_ID                NUMBER(18),
    PD_SEGMENT                VARCHAR2(100),
    RATING_CODE               VARCHAR2(10),
    BUCKET_GROUP              VARCHAR2(30),
    BUCKET_ID                 NUMBER(10),
    ECL_12_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_LIFETIME_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    CA_UNWINDING_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    IA_UNWINDING_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    IA_UNWINDING_SUM_AMOUNT   NUMBER(32, 6),

    WRITEOFF_FLAG     NUMBER(1),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    ACCOUNT_STATUS    VARCHAR2(20),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME     VARCHAR2(150),
    EXCHANGE_RATE     NUMBER,
    IMPAIRED_FLAG     CHAR,
    OUTSTANDING       NUMBER(32, 6),
    DATA_SOURCE       VARCHAR2(20),
    KEY_TMP_IMA       VARCHAR2(100)                    not null,
    CREATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE       DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE       DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(30)
)
    on commit preserve rows

create table IFRS.IFRS_BTRD_UPLOAD
(
    PKID             NUMBER(18)   not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_BTRD_UPLOAD
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE    DATE,
    DATA_SOURCE      VARCHAR2(20),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(100),
    PRODUCT_CODE     VARCHAR2(20),
    BRANCH_CODE      VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER  VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME    VARCHAR2(150),
    SWIFT_CODE       VARCHAR2(100),
    CCY              VARCHAR2(10),
    AMOUNT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    START_DATE       DATE,
    MATURITY_DATE    DATE,
    INTEREST_RATE    NUMBER,
    INTEREST_ACCRUED NUMBER(32, 6),
    BI_CODE          NUMBER(10),
    BS_FLAG          NUMBER(1),
    PRINCIPAL_AMOUNT NUMBER(32, 6),
    UPLOADID         NUMBER(18),
    UPLOADBY         VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPLOADDATE       DATE         not null,
    UPLOADHOST       VARCHAR2(30) not null,
    APPROVEDBY       VARCHAR2(36),
    APPROVEDDATE     DATE,
    APPROVEDHOST     VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_BTRD_UPLOAD
    on IFRS.IFRS_BTRD_UPLOAD (DOWNLOAD_DATE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_BTRD_UPLOAD
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_BTRD_UPLOAD
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_BTRD_UPLOAD."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    PKID              NUMBER(18)   not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE     DATE,
    ECL_MODEL_ID      NUMBER(18),
    MASTERID          NUMBER(18),
    PF_SEGMENT_ID     NUMBER(18),
    GROUP_SEGMENT     VARCHAR2(50),
    SEGMENT           VARCHAR2(50),
    SUB_SEGMENT       VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME     VARCHAR2(150),
    DATA_SOURCE       VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_GROUP     VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE      VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE      VARCHAR2(20),
    CURRENCY          VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE     NUMBER,
    EIR               NUMBER,
    INTEREST_RATE     NUMBER,
    OUTSTANDING       NUMBER(32, 6),
    FAIR_VALUE_AMOUNT NUMBER(32, 6),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED  NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMOUNT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY CHAR,
    DAY_PAST_DUE      NUMBER(10),
    BUCKET_GROUP      VARCHAR2(30),
    BUCKET_ID         NUMBER(10),
    CR_STAGE          CHAR,
    IMPAIRED_FLAG     CHAR,
    LIFETIME_PERIOD   NUMBER(10),
    PREPAYMENT_AMOUNT NUMBER(32, 6),
    CCF_AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    SPECIAL_REASON    VARCHAR2(4000),
    CREATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    CREATEDDATE       DATE         not null,
    CREATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPDATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE       DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_PD_VIN_MATURITY (EFF_DATE, PD_RULE_ID, YEARS)

    on IFRS.IFRS_PD_VIN_MATURITY (PKID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_PD_VIN_MATURITY
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_PD_VIN_MATURITY
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_PD_VIN_MATURITY."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_CCF_DETAIL
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE      DATE                             not null,
    CURRENT_DATE       DATE                             not null,
    PREVIOUS_DATE      DATE,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER     VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME      VARCHAR2(150),
    FACILITY_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS     VARCHAR2(1),
    SEGMENTATION_ID    NUMBER,
    CCF_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18),
    FIRST_NPL_DATE     DATE,
    CURRENCY           VARCHAR2(10),
    OS_CUR             NUMBER(32, 6),
    OS_PREV            NUMBER(32, 6),
    LIMIT_CUR          NUMBER,
    LIMIT_PREV         NUMBER,
    USED_AMOUNT_CUR    NUMBER,
    USED_AMOUNT_PREV   NUMBER,
    AVAILABLE_AMT_CUR  NUMBER,
    AVAILABLE_AMT_PREV NUMBER,
    REVOLVING_FLAG_L   NUMBER(1),
    REVOLVING_FLAG_I   NUMBER(1),
    PRODUCT_CODE_L     VARCHAR2(50),
    PRODUCT_CODE_I     VARCHAR2(50),
    OS_SELISIH         NUMBER(32, 6),
    LIMIT_SELISIH      NUMBER(32, 6),
    CCF_RESULT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_CCF_DETAIL
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_CCF_DETAIL
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_CCF_DETAIL."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_CCF_DETAIL_PROCESS
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_CCF_DETAIL_PROCESS
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE      DATE                             not null,
    CURRENT_DATE       DATE                             not null,
    PREVIOUS_DATE      DATE,
    FACILITY_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME      VARCHAR2(150),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS     VARCHAR2(1),
    SEGMENTATION_ID    NUMBER(18),
    CCF_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18),
    FIRST_NPL_DATE     DATE,
    CURRENCY           DATE,
    OS_CUR             NUMBER(32, 6),
    OS_PREV            NUMBER(32, 6),
    LIMIT_CUR          NUMBER,
    LIMIT_PREV         NUMBER,
    USED_AMOUNT_CUR    NUMBER,
    USED_AMOUNT_PREV   NUMBER,
    AVAILABLE_AMT_CUR  NUMBER,
    AVAILABLE_AMT_PREV NUMBER,
    REVOLVING_FLAG_L   NUMBER(1),
    REVOLVING_FLAG_I   NUMBER(1),
    PRODUCT_CODE_L     VARCHAR2(50),
    PRODUCT_CODE_I     VARCHAR2(50),
    OS_SELISIH         NUMBER(32, 6),
    LIMIT_SELISIH      NUMBER(32, 6),
    CCF_RESULT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    DAY_PAST_DUE_DATE  DATE,
    SICR_DATE          DATE,
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_CCF_DETAIL_PROCESS
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_CCF_DETAIL_PROCESS
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_CCF_DETAIL_PROCESS."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

    OUTSTANDING_PRINCIPAL_CCY  NUMBER(32, 6),

    SALDO_YADIT_LCL            NUMBER(32, 6),

    ECL_ON_BS_LCL              NUMBER(32, 6),

create table IFRS.IFRS_LIFETIME_DETAIL_P
(
    PKID              NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_LIFETIME_DETAIL_P
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE     DATE                             not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    ACCOUNT_STATUS    VARCHAR2(5),
    CUSTOMER_NAME     VARCHAR2(150),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    DATA_SOURCE       VARCHAR2(20),
    LOAN_DUE_DATE     DATE,
    LOAN_START_DATE   DATE,
    END_DATE          DATE,
    LIFETIME_PERIOD   NUMBER,
    GOL_DEB           VARCHAR2(10),
    SEGMENTATION_ID   NUMBER(10),
    REVOLVING_FLAG    NUMBER(1),
    DAY_PAST_DUE_DATE DATE,
    NPL_DATE          DATE,
    PRODUCT_CODE      VARCHAR2(10),
    CREATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE       DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE       DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_LIFETIME_DETAIL_P
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_LIFETIME_DETAIL_P
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_LIFETIME_DETAIL_P."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

    OS_PREV            NUMBER(32, 6),

    LIMIT_PREV         NUMBER,

    USED_AMOUNT_PREV   NUMBER,
    AVAILABLE_AMT_CUR  NUMBER,
    AVAILABLE_AMT_PREV NUMBER,
    REVOLVING_FLAG_L   NUMBER(1),
    REVOLVING_FLAG_I   NUMBER(1),
    PRODUCT_CODE_L     VARCHAR2(50),
    PRODUCT_CODE_I     VARCHAR2(50),
    OS_SELISIH         NUMBER(32, 6),
    LIMIT_SELISIH      NUMBER(32, 6),
    CCF_RESULT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    DAY_PAST_DUE_DATE  DATE,

)

create table IFRS.IFRS_LIFETIME_DETAIL_PF
(
    PKID              NUMBER(18),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE     DATE         not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50) not null,
    ACCOUNT_STATUS    VARCHAR2(5),
    CUSTOMER_NAME     VARCHAR2(150),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50) not null,
    DATA_SOURCE       VARCHAR2(20),
    LOAN_DUE_DATE     DATE,
    LOAN_START_DATE   DATE,
    END_DATE          DATE,
    LIFETIME_PERIOD   NUMBER,
    GOL_DEB           VARCHAR2(10),
    SEGMENTATION_ID   NUMBER(10),
    REVOLVING_FLAG    NUMBER(1),
    DAY_PAST_DUE_DATE DATE,
    NPL_DATE          DATE,
    PRODUCT_CODE      VARCHAR2(10),
    CREATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    CREATEDDATE       DATE         not null,
    CREATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPDATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE       DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(30),
    FACILITY_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50)
)
/

create global temporary table IFRS.GTMP_IFRS_ECL_MOVEMENT_DTL
(
    REPORT_DATE       DATE          not null,
    MASTERID          NUMBER(18)    not null,
    DATA_SOURCE       VARCHAR2(20),
    SUB_SEGMENT       VARCHAR2(100),

    IMP_CHANGE_REASON VARCHAR2(250) not null,

    CURRENCY          VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE     NUMBER,
    STAGE             CHAR,
    WRITEOFF_FLAG     NUMBER(1),
    SPECIAL_REASON    VARCHAR2(250)
)
    on commit preserve rows
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE_H
(
    PKID            NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE_H
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE   DATE,
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER VARCHAR2(100)                    not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME   VARCHAR2(150)                    not null,
    OVERRIDE_DATE   DATE                             not null,
    IGNORE_OVERRIDE NUMBER(1)                        not null,
    CREATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE     DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE     DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE_H
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE_H."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;

    RESERVED_DATE_4           DATE,

    RESERVED_DATE_10          DATE,
    CREATEDBY                 VARCHAR2(36)  not null,
    CREATEDDATE               DATE          not null,
    CREATEDHOST               VARCHAR2(30)  not null,
    UPDATEDBY                 VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE               DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST               VARCHAR2(30),
    SEGMENT_RULE_ID           NUMBER(18),
    PREPAYMENT_SEGMENT        VARCHAR2(100),
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18)
)
/

(
    AAK_JOURNAL_VLJ_ID VARCHAR2(20),
    AAK_JOURNAL_HEADER VARCHAR2(20),
    AAK_JOURNAL_DATE   VARCHAR2(28),

    AAK_VLMKEY_SEQ     VARCHAR2(20),
    AAK_VLMKEY_FILLER  VARCHAR2(20),
    AAK_CURRCD         VARCHAR2(20),
    AAK_SLID           VARCHAR2(20),
    AAK_SLAC           VARCHAR2(20),
    AAK_SOURCE         VARCHAR2(20),
    AAK_DESC           VARCHAR2(100),
    AAK_JA             VARCHAR2(20),
    AAK_JT             VARCHAR2(20),
    AAK_DCCD           VARCHAR2(20),
    AAK_RP_SIGN        VARCHAR2(20),
    AAK_AMT_RP         VARCHAR2(20),
    AAK_VA_SIGN        VARCHAR2(20),

)

    OUTSTANDING               NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_IDC           NUMBER(32, 6),

    OUTSTANDING_PASTDUE       NUMBER(32, 6),

    REMAINING_TENOR           NUMBER(10),

    BELOW_MARKET_FLAG         NUMBER(1),

    UNAMORT_COST_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),

    UNAMORT_BENEFIT           NUMBER(32, 6),

    UNAMORT_COST_AMT_JF       NUMBER(32, 6),

create table IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_LBU
(
    PKID                           NUMBER(18),
    REPORT_DATE                    DATE,
    APLIKASI                       VARCHAR2(5),
    NOREK_LBU                      VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH                         VARCHAR2(10),
    LBU_FORM                       VARCHAR2(5),
    MU                             VARCHAR2(5),
    STAGE                          VARCHAR2(5),
    BS_FLAG                        VARCHAR2(5),
    PORTFOLIO                      VARCHAR2(10),
    INSTRUMENT                     VARCHAR2(15),
    UNUSED_CCY_SIGN                VARCHAR2(1),
    UNUSED_CCY                     NUMBER(15, 2),
    UNUSED_LCL_SIGN                VARCHAR2(1),
    UNUSED_LCL                     NUMBER(15, 2),
    EAD_OFF_BS_CCF_CCY_SIGN        VARCHAR2(1),
    EAD_OFF_BS_CCF_CCY             NUMBER(15, 2),
    EAD_OFF_BS_CCF_LCL_SIGN        VARCHAR2(1),
    EAD_OFF_BS_CCF_LCL             NUMBER(15, 2),
    OUTSTANDING_ON_BS_CCY_SIGN     VARCHAR2(1),
    OUTSTANDING_ON_BS_CCY          NUMBER(15, 2),
    OUTSTANDING_ON_BS_LCL_SIGN     VARCHAR2(1),
    OUTSTANDING_ON_BS_LCL          NUMBER(15, 2),
    OUTSTANDING_OFF_BS_CCY_SIGN    VARCHAR2(1),
    OUTSTANDING_OFF_BS_CCY         NUMBER(15, 2),
    OUTSTANDING_OFF_BS_LCL_SIGN    VARCHAR2(1),
    OUTSTANDING_OFF_BS_LCL         NUMBER(15, 2),
    UNAMORT_FEE_CCY_SIGN           VARCHAR2(1),
    UNAMORT_FEE_CCY                NUMBER(15, 2),
    UNAMORT_FEE_LCL_SIGN           VARCHAR2(1),
    UNAMORT_FEE_LCL                NUMBER(15, 2),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED_CCY_SIGN      VARCHAR2(1),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED_CCY           NUMBER(15, 2),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED_LCL_SIGN      VARCHAR2(1),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED_LCL           NUMBER(15, 2),
    UNWINDING_INTEREST_CCY_SIGN    VARCHAR2(1),
    UNWINDING_INTEREST_CCY         NUMBER(15, 2),
    UNWINDING_INTEREST_LCL_SIGN    VARCHAR2(1),
    UNWINDING_INTEREST_LCL         NUMBER(15, 2),
    AMORTISASI_FEE_CCY_SIGN        VARCHAR2(1),
    AMORTISASI_FEE_CCY             NUMBER(15, 2),
    AMORTISASI_FEE_LCL_SIGN        VARCHAR2(1),
    AMORTISASI_FEE_LCL             NUMBER(15, 2),
    CADANGAN_KOLEKTIF_CCY_SIGN     VARCHAR2(1),
    CADANGAN_KOLEKTIF_CCY          NUMBER(15, 2),
    CADANGAN_KOLEKTIF_LCL_SIGN     VARCHAR2(1),
    CADANGAN_KOLEKTIF_LCL          NUMBER(15, 2),
    CADANGAN_INDIVIDUAL_CCY_SIGN   VARCHAR2(1),
    CADANGAN_INDIVIDUAL_CCY        NUMBER(15, 2),
    CADANGAN_INDIVIDUAL_LCL_SIGN   VARCHAR2(1),
    CADANGAN_INDIVIDUAL_LCL        NUMBER(15, 2),
    CADANGAN_KOLEKTIF_COM_CCY_SIGN VARCHAR2(1),
    CADANGAN_KOLEKTIF_COM_CCY      NUMBER(15, 2),
    CADANGAN_KOLEKTIF_COM_LCL_SIGN VARCHAR2(1),
    CADANGAN_KOLEKTIF_COM_LCL      NUMBER(15, 2),
    CADANGAN_INDIV_COM_CCY_SIGN    VARCHAR2(1),
    CADANGAN_INDIV_COM_CCY         NUMBER(15, 2),
    CADANGAN_INDIV_COM_LCL_SIGN    VARCHAR2(1),
    CADANGAN_INDIV_COM_LCL         NUMBER(15, 2),
    AMORT_FEE_AMT_ILS_CCY_SIGN     VARCHAR2(1),
    AMORT_FEE_AMT_ILS_CCY          NUMBER(15, 2),
    AMORT_FEE_AMT_ILS_LCL_SIGN     VARCHAR2(1),
    AMORT_FEE_AMT_ILS_LCL          NUMBER(15, 2)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.PK_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_LBU
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_LBU (PKID)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_LBU
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_LBU (REPORT_DATE)
/

create index IFRS.IDX2_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_LBU
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_LBU (APLIKASI, REPORT_DATE)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_LBU
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_LBU
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_LBU."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_TRANSACTION_DAILYY
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE        DATE         not null,
    EFFECTIVE_DATE       DATE,
    MATURITY_DATE        DATE,
    MASTERID             VARCHAR2(100),
    FEE_COST_ID          VARCHAR2(100),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER       VARCHAR2(50) not null,
    FACILITY_NUMBER      VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER      VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE          VARCHAR2(20),
    DATA_SOURCE          VARCHAR2(20),
    PRD_TYPE             VARCHAR2(20),
    PRD_CODE             VARCHAR2(20),
    TRX_CODE             VARCHAR2(20),
    CCY                  VARCHAR2(5),
    EVENT_CODE           VARCHAR2(50),
    TRX_REFERENCE_NUMBER VARCHAR2(100),
    ORG_CCY_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    EQV_LCY_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    DEBET_CREDIT_FLAG    VARCHAR2(1),
    TRX_SOURCE           VARCHAR2(50),
    INTERNAL_NO          VARCHAR2(70),
    REVOLVING_FLAG       NUMBER(1),
    CREATED_DATE         DATE,
    primary key (DOWNLOAD_DATE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER)
)
/

(

)

create table IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_AMORT_RPT_REKON
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE DATE,
    MASTERID      NUMBER(18),
    DATA_SOURCE   VARCHAR2(20),
    JOURNAL_ID    VARCHAR2(25),
    SEQ           VARCHAR2(20),
    BRANCH_CODE   VARCHAR2(50),
    JOURNAL_CODE  VARCHAR2(50),
    CURRENCY      VARCHAR2(5),
    AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMOUNT_IDR    NUMBER(32, 6),
    GLNO          VARCHAR2(100),
    DRCR          VARCHAR2(10),
    REVERSE       VARCHAR2(5),
    CREATEDDATE   DATE default SYSDATE,
    PRODUCT_TYPE  VARCHAR2(15),
    PRODUCT_CODE  VARCHAR2(10)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_ACCT_AMORT_RPT_REKON
    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_AMORT_RPT_REKON (DOWNLOAD_DATE)
/

create index IFRS.IDX3_IFRS_ACCT_AMORT_RPT_REKON
    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_AMORT_RPT_REKON (LAST_DAY("DOWNLOAD_DATE"))
/

create index IFRS.IDX2_IFRS_ACCT_AMORT_RPT_REKON
    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_AMORT_RPT_REKON (DOWNLOAD_DATE, JOURNAL_CODE, REVERSE)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_TEST_1
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_TEST (REPORT_DATE, MASTERID)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_TEST_2
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_TEST (REPORT_DATE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER)
/

create unique index IFRS.PK_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_TEST
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_TEST (PKID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_TEST
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_TEST
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_TEST."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE    DATE,
    MASTERID         NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),

    TIMES_USED       NUMBER(10),

    DATE_END         DATE,

)

create table IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_COST_FEE_SUMM
(
    ID            NUMBER(18) not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_ACCT_COST_FEE_SUMM
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE DATE,
    MASTERID      NUMBER(18),
    BRCODE        VARCHAR2(20),
    CIFNO         VARCHAR2(50),
    FACNO         VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCTNO        VARCHAR2(50),
    DATASOURCE    VARCHAR2(20),
    CCY           VARCHAR2(5),
    AMOUNT_FEE    NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMOUNT_COST   NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMORT_FEE     NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMORT_COST    NUMBER(32, 6),
    SW_MASTERID   VARCHAR2(70),
    CREATEDDATE   DATE,
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(50)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_ACCT_COST_FEE_SUMM
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_COST_FEE_SUMM
    for each row
    when (NEW.ID IS NULL OR NEW.ID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_ACCT_COST_FEE_SUMM."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.ID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT
(
    PKID                      NUMBER(18)    not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE             DATE          not null,
    MASTERID                  NUMBER(18)    not null,
    MASTER_ACCOUNT_CODE       VARCHAR2(100) not null,
    DATA_SOURCE               VARCHAR2(20),
    GLOBAL_CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME             VARCHAR2(150),
    FACILITY_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER            VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    PREVIOUS_ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS            VARCHAR2(20),
    INTEREST_RATE             NUMBER,
    MARKET_RATE               NUMBER,
    PRODUCT_GROUP             VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_ENTITY            CHAR,
    GL_CONSTNAME              VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE               VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE_OPEN          VARCHAR2(50),
    CURRENCY                  VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE             NUMBER,
    INITIAL_OUTSTANDING       NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING               NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_IDC           NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_JF            NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_BANK          NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_PASTDUE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND                   NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND_CASH              NUMBER(32, 6),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED          NUMBER(32, 6),
    INSTALLMENT_AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    DOWN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    JF_FLAG                   NUMBER(1),
    LOAN_START_DATE           DATE,
    LOAN_DUE_DATE             DATE,
    LOAN_START_AMORTIZATION   DATE,
    LOAN_END_AMORTIZATION     DATE,
    INSTALLMENT_GRACE_PERIOD  DATE,
    NEXT_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE     DATE,
    LAST_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    FIRST_INSTALLMENT_DATE    DATE,
    TENOR                     NUMBER(10),
    REMAINING_TENOR           NUMBER(10),
    PAYMENT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PAYMENT_TERM              VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_CALCULATION_CODE VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_PAYMENT_TERM     VARCHAR2(2),
    RESTRUCTURE_DATE          DATE,
    RESTRUCTURE_FLAG          NUMBER(1),
    POCI_FLAG                 NUMBER(1),
    STAFF_LOAN_FLAG           NUMBER(1),
    BELOW_MARKET_FLAG         NUMBER(1),
    BTB_FLAG                  NUMBER(1),
    COMMITTED_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    REVOLVING_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    IAS_CLASS                 VARCHAR2(10),
    IFRS9_CLASS               VARCHAR2(50),
    BM_RESULT                 VARCHAR2(50),
    SPPI_RESULT               VARCHAR2(50),
    AMORT_TYPE                VARCHAR2(10),
    EIR_STATUS                CHAR,
    ECF_STATUS                CHAR,
    EIR                       NUMBER,
    EIR_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    FAIR_VALUE_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_TXN_COST  NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_ORG_FEE   NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    DAILY_AMORT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_BENEFIT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_AMT_TOTAL_JF      NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_JF        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT_JF       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ORIGINAL_COLLECTABILITY   CHAR,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY         CHAR,
    ORIGINAL_DAY_PAST_DUE     NUMBER(10),
    DAY_PAST_DUE              NUMBER(10),
    DPD_START_DATE            DATE,
    DPD_ZERO_COUNTER          NUMBER(10),
    NPL_DATE                  DATE,
    NPL_FLAG                  NUMBER(1),
    DEFAULT_DATE              DATE,
    DEFAULT_FLAG              NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_FLAG             NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_DATE             DATE,
    OUTSTANDING_WO            NUMBER(32, 6),
    IMPAIRED_FLAG             CHAR,
    IS_IMPAIRED               NUMBER(1),
    GROUP_SEGMENT             VARCHAR2(50),
    SEGMENT                   VARCHAR2(100),
    SUB_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(50),
    CR_STAGE                  CHAR,
    CCF_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    CCF_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    LIFETIME_RULE_ID          NUMBER(18),
    LIFETIME_SEGMENT          VARCHAR2(100),
    LIFETIME                  NUMBER(10),
    EAD_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    EAD_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    EAD_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    LGD_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    LGD_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    PD_RULE_ID                NUMBER(18),
    PD_SEGMENT                VARCHAR2(100),
    RATING_CODE               VARCHAR2(10),
    BUCKET_GROUP              VARCHAR2(30),
    BUCKET_ID                 NUMBER(10),
    ECL_12_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_LIFETIME_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    CA_UNWINDING_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    IA_UNWINDING_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    IA_UNWINDING_SUM_AMOUNT   NUMBER(32, 6),
    BEGINNING_BALANCE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    ENDING_BALANCE            NUMBER(32, 6),
    WRITEBACK_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),

    RESERVED_FLAG_1           NUMBER(1),

    RESERVED_DATE_2           DATE,

    RESERVED_DATE_5           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_6           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_7           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_8           DATE,

    CREATEDDATE               DATE          not null,

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTERID)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT2
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT (DOWNLOAD_DATE, DATA_SOURCE)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT3
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTER_ACCOUNT_CODE)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT4
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT (DOWNLOAD_DATE, CUSTOMER_NUMBER)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT5
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT (DOWNLOAD_DATE, PRODUCT_CODE)
/

create unique index IFRS.PK_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT (PKID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_MONTH."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    PKID          NUMBER(19)    not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE DATE          not null,

    MAINTAIN_DATE TIMESTAMP(3)  not null,
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36)  not null,
    CREATEDDATE   DATE          not null,
    CREATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30)  not null,
    UPDATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE   DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30)
)

create table IFRS.TMP_BRANCH_LIST
(
    PKID        NUMBER(18),
    BRANCH_CODE VARCHAR2(10),
    BRANCH_NAME VARCHAR2(50),
    KCU_CODE    VARCHAR2(10),
    KCU_NAME    VARCHAR2(50)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TMP_BRANCH_LIST
    before insert
    on IFRS.TMP_BRANCH_LIST
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_TMP_BRANCH_LIST."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

    PKID        NUMBER(18),
    DATA_SOURCE VARCHAR2(10)

    on IFRS.TMP_DATA_SOURCE (DATA_SOURCE)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TMP_DATA_SOURCE
    before insert
    on IFRS.TMP_DATA_SOURCE
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_TMP_DATA_SOURCE."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE_H_HIST
(
    PKID            NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE_H_HIST
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE   DATE,
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER VARCHAR2(100)                    not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME   VARCHAR2(150)                    not null,
    OVERRIDE_DATE   DATE                             not null,
    IGNORE_OVERRIDE NUMBER(1)                        not null,
    CREATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE     DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE     DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE_H_HIST
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE_H_HIST
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE_H_HIST."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE_D_HIST
(
    PKID              NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE_D_HIST
            primary key,
    MASTERID          NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(100),
    DATA_SOURCE       VARCHAR2(20),
    DAY_PAST_DUE      NUMBER(10),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY CHAR,
    STAGE             CHAR,
    STAGE_OVERRIDE    CHAR,
    REMARKS           VARCHAR2(4000),
    CREATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE       DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(30) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE       DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE_D_HIST
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE_D_HIST
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_STAGE_OVERRIDE_D_HIST."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    EFF_DATE        DATE,
    PD_RULE_ID      NUMBER(18),
    RULE_ID         NUMBER(18),
    BUCKET_GROUP    VARCHAR2(30),
    MASTERID        NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER  VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME   VARCHAR2(150),
    PD_UNIQUE_ID    VARCHAR2(50),
    PD_METHOD       VARCHAR2(50),
    CALC_METHOD     VARCHAR2(5),
    CALC_AMOUNT     NUMBER(32, 6),
    BUCKET_ID       NUMBER,
    OUTSTANDING     NUMBER(32, 6),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS  VARCHAR2(20),
    IMPAIRED_FLAG   CHAR,
    IS_IMPAIRED     NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_FLAG   NUMBER(1),
    DEFAULT_FLAG    NUMBER(1),
    LIFETIME        NUMBER,
    CREATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE     DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE     DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_PD_MIGRATION_DETAIL
(
    PKID          NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    EFF_DATE      DATE                             not null,
    BASE_DATE     DATE                             not null,
    PD_RULE_ID    NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    BUCKET_GROUP  VARCHAR2(30)                     not null,
    PD_UNIQUE_ID  VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME VARCHAR2(150),
    BUCKET_FROM   NUMBER(10),
    BUCKET_TO     NUMBER(10),
    CALC_AMOUNT   NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING   NUMBER(32, 6),
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE   DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE   DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_PD_MIGRATION_DETAIL
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_PD_MIGRATION_DETAIL
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_PD_MIGRATION_DETAIL."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    PKID              NUMBER(18),

    CREATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPDATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE       DATE,

)
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_VARCHAR_1 is 'ASET_KEUANGAN'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_VARCHAR_2 is 'TRA'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_VARCHAR_3 is 'BUCKET_GROUP'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_VARCHAR_4 is 'STAGE ORIGINAL'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_VARCHAR_5 is 'ASET_KEUANGAN_VER_2'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_VARCHAR_6 is 'RATING INTERNAL'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_VARCHAR_7 is 'RATING EKSTERNAL'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_AMOUNT_1 is 'NJUM'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_AMOUNT_2 is 'ECL_ON_BS_FINAL_CCY'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_AMOUNT_3 is 'ECL_ON_BS_FINAL_LCL'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_AMOUNT_4 is 'ECL_TOTAL_FINAL_CCY'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_AMOUNT_5 is 'ECL_TOTAL_FINAL_LCL'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_AMOUNT_6 is 'NILAI_TERCATAT_ON'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_AMOUNT_7 is 'NILAI_TERCATAT_OFF'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_AMOUNT_8 is 'PLAFOND'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_RATE_1 is 'TENOR'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_FLAG_1 is 'FLAG_COVID 0 = N, 1 = Y'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE.RESERVED_FLAG_2 is 'FLAG_RESTRUCTURE 0 = N, 1 = Y'
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_NOMINATIVE
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE (REPORT_DATE, MASTERID)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_2
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE (REPORT_DATE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_3
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE (REPORT_DATE, DATA_SOURCE, BRANCH_CODE)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_4
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE (ACCOUNT_STATUS)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_5
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE (SEGMENTATION, DATA_SOURCE, BI_COLLECTABILITY, CUSTOMER_NUMBER)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_NOMINATIVE
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_NOMINATIVE."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_ACCOUNT_MATURE
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE  DATE,
    MASTERID       NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER VARCHAR2(50),
    DATA_SOURCE    VARCHAR2(20),
    SEGMENT        VARCHAR2(100),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS VARCHAR2(20)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_ACCOUNT_MATURE
    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCOUNT_MATURE (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTERID)
/

create table IFRS.FRATE_ACCOUNT
(
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER VARCHAR2(50) not null,
    MARKET_RATE    NUMBER,
    GOL_DEB        VARCHAR2(20)
)
/

create table IFRS.FRATE_ACCOUNT_ALL
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE             DATE         not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER            VARCHAR2(50) not null,
    GOL_DEB                   VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    USER_CODE                 VARCHAR2(100),
    INTEREST_CALCULATION_CODE VARCHAR2(2),
    MARKET_RATE               NUMBER
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_FRATE_ACCOUNT_ALL
    on IFRS.FRATE_ACCOUNT_ALL (DOWNLOAD_DATE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER)
/

create table IFRS.FRATE_RPT_CF
(
    NUM            NUMBER(6),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE  DATE,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER VARCHAR2(50) not null,
    MASTERID       NUMBER(18),
    GOL_DEB        VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE   VARCHAR2(20),
    USER_CODE      VARCHAR2(100),
    DDATE_PMT      DATE,
    LAST_PMTDATE   DATE,
    PMTDATE        DATE,
    CUMDAYS        NUMBER(6),
    INTEREST_BASIS VARCHAR2(2),
    KOEF           NUMBER(12, 6),
    INTEREST       NUMBER(32, 6),
    PRINCIPAL      NUMBER(32, 6),
    MARKET_RATE    NUMBER(12, 6),
    TOTAL_CF       NUMBER(32, 6),
    DCF            NUMBER(32, 6)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_2_FRATE_RPT_CF
    on IFRS.FRATE_RPT_CF (ACCOUNT_NUMBER, PMTDATE)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_1_FRATE_RPT_CF
    on IFRS.FRATE_RPT_CF (MASTERID, NUM)
/

(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE                  DATE,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER                 VARCHAR2(50) not null,
    GOL_DEB                        VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE                   VARCHAR2(20),
    CURRENCY                       VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE                  NUMBER,
    OUTSTANDING_ON_BS_CCY          NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_ON_BS_LCL          NUMBER(32, 6),
    CONTRACTUAL_INTEREST_RATE      NUMBER(12, 6),
    MARKET_RATE                    NUMBER(12, 6),
    DEAL_DATE                      DATE,
    TENOR                          NUMBER,
    REMAINING                      NUMBER,
    MATURITY_DATE                  DATE,
    CF_SCHEDULE                    DATE,
    BASIS                          VARCHAR2(20),
    CARRYING_AMOUNT_CCY            NUMBER(32, 6),
    CARRYING_AMOUNT_LCL            NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_FEE_CCY                NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_FEE_LCL                NUMBER(32, 6),
    SALDO_OS_BASED_MARKET_RATE_CCY NUMBER(32, 6),
    SALDO_OS_BASED_MARKET_RATE_LCL NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_CCY            NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_LCL            NUMBER(32, 6),
    MV_AFTER_UNAMORT_FEE_CCY       NUMBER(32, 6),
    MV_AFTER_UNAMORT_FEE_LCL       NUMBER(32, 6)
)
/

(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE            DATE,

)

create table IFRS.IFRS_LIFETIME_HEADER_NEWC
(
    PKID                NUMBER(18),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE       DATE,
    LIFETIME_SEGMENT    VARCHAR2(100),
    LIFETIME_SEGMENT_ID NUMBER(18),
    LIFETIME_CONFIG_ID  NUMBER(18),
    LIFETIME_PERIOD     NUMBER,
    REVOLVING_FLAG      NUMBER(1),
    CREATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    CREATEDDATE         DATE         not null,
    CREATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPDATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE         DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create global temporary table IFRS.GTMP_SCENARIO_SEGMENT_GENQUERY
(
    RULE_ID       NUMBER(18) not null,
    GROUP_SEGMENT VARCHAR2(50),
    SEGMENT       VARCHAR2(50),
    SUB_SEGMENT   VARCHAR2(100),
    SEGMENT_TYPE  VARCHAR2(50),
    SEQUENCE      NUMBER(10),
    TABLE_NAME    VARCHAR2(30),
    CONDITION     VARCHAR2(4000),
    PRC_CODE      CHAR,
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36),
    CREATEDDATE   DATE,
    CREATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30),
    UPDATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE   DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30)
)
    on commit preserve rows
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_CUSTOMER_RATING
(
    PKID                   NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE          DATE,
    GLOBAL_CUSTOMER_NUMBER VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER        VARCHAR2(50),

    RATING_AGENCY_1        VARCHAR2(50),
    RATING_TYPE_1          VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_CODE_1          VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_SOURCE_2        VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_AGENCY_2        VARCHAR2(50),
    RATING_TYPE_2          VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_CODE_2          VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_SOURCE_3        VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_AGENCY_3        VARCHAR2(50),
    RATING_TYPE_3          VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_CODE_3          VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_SOURCE_4        VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_AGENCY_4        VARCHAR2(50),
    RATING_TYPE_4          VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_CODE_4          VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_SOURCE_5        VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_AGENCY_5        VARCHAR2(50),
    RATING_TYPE_5          VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_CODE_5          VARCHAR2(10),
    GOL_DEB                VARCHAR2(10),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY      VARCHAR2(10),
    BANK_IND               VARCHAR2(10),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_1     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_2     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_3     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_4     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_5     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_6     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_7     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_8     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_9     VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_10    VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_1      NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_2      NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_3      NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_4      NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_5      NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_RATE_1        NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_2        NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_3        NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_4        NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_5        NUMBER,
    RESERVED_FLAG_1        NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_2        NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_3        NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_4        NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_5        NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_DATE_1        DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_2        DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_3        DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_4        DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_5        DATE,
    CREATEDBY              VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE            DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST            VARCHAR2(30) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY              VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE            DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST            VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_MASTER_CUST_RATING
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_CUSTOMER_RATING (CUSTOMER_NUMBER, RATING_TYPE_1)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_MASTER_CUST_RATING
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_CUSTOMER_RATING
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_MASTER_CUST_RATING."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create global temporary table IFRS.GTMP_IFRS_MSTR_CUSTOMER_RATING
(
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER VARCHAR2(50),
    RATING_TYPE_1   VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_CODE_1   VARCHAR2(10)
)
    on commit preserve rows
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_PREPAYMENT_HEADER_NEW
(
    PKID                 NUMBER(18)    not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE        DATE          not null,
    SEGMENTATION_ID      NUMBER(18)    not null,
    SEGMENTATION_NAME    VARCHAR2(100) not null,
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_ID   NUMBER(18)    not null,
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_NAME VARCHAR2(150) not null,
    AVERAGE_SMM          NUMBER(32, 6) not null,
    PREPAYMENT_RATE      NUMBER        not null,
    DURATION             NUMBER(10)    not null,
    CREATEDBY            VARCHAR2(36)  not null,
    CREATEDDATE          DATE          not null,
    CREATEDHOST          VARCHAR2(30)  not null,
    UPDATEDBY            VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE          DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST          VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    START_DATE                DATE,
    MATURITY_DATE             DATE,
    DAY_PAST_DUE              NUMBER(10),

    SUB_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(50),

    STAGE                     CHAR,

    EAD_AMOUNT_LCL            NUMBER(32, 6),

    ECL_TOTAL_LCL             NUMBER(32, 6),

    ECL_ON_BS_FINAL_LCL       NUMBER(32, 6),

)

(
    ABORT_STEP              NUMBER,
    ANCESTOR_PROCESS_ORDER  NUMBER,
    BASE_OBJECT_NAME        VARCHAR2(30),
    BASE_OBJECT_SCHEMA      VARCHAR2(30),
    BASE_OBJECT_TYPE        VARCHAR2(30),

    BLOCK_SIZE              NUMBER,
    CLUSTER_OK              NUMBER,
    COMPLETED_BYTES         NUMBER,
    COMPLETED_ROWS          NUMBER,
    COMPLETION_TIME         DATE,

    DUMP_FILEID             NUMBER,
    DUMP_LENGTH             NUMBER,
    DUMP_ORIG_LENGTH        NUMBER,
    DUMP_POSITION           NUMBER,
    DUPLICATE               NUMBER,
    ELAPSED_TIME            NUMBER,
    ERROR_COUNT             NUMBER,
    EXTEND_SIZE             NUMBER,
    FILE_MAX_SIZE           NUMBER,
    FILE_NAME               VARCHAR2(4000),
    FILE_TYPE               NUMBER,
    FLAGS                   NUMBER,
    GRANTOR                 VARCHAR2(30),
    GRANULES                NUMBER,
    GUID                    RAW(16),
    IN_PROGRESS             CHAR,
    INSTANCE                VARCHAR2(60),
    INSTANCE_ID             NUMBER,
    IS_DEFAULT              NUMBER,
    JOB_MODE                VARCHAR2(21),
    JOB_VERSION             VARCHAR2(60),
    LAST_FILE               NUMBER,
    LAST_UPDATE             DATE,
    LOAD_METHOD             NUMBER,
    METADATA_BUFFER_SIZE    NUMBER,
    METADATA_IO             NUMBER,
    NAME                    VARCHAR2(30),
    OBJECT_INT_OID          VARCHAR2(32),
    OBJECT_LONG_NAME        VARCHAR2(4000),
    OBJECT_NAME             VARCHAR2(200),
    OBJECT_NUMBER           NUMBER,
    OBJECT_PATH_SEQNO       NUMBER,
    OBJECT_ROW              NUMBER,
    OBJECT_SCHEMA           VARCHAR2(30),
    OBJECT_TABLESPACE       VARCHAR2(30),
    OBJECT_TYPE             VARCHAR2(30),
    OBJECT_TYPE_PATH        VARCHAR2(200),
    OLD_VALUE               VARCHAR2(4000),
    OPERATION               VARCHAR2(8),
    OPTION_TAG              VARCHAR2(30),
    ORIG_BASE_OBJECT_SCHEMA VARCHAR2(30),
    ORIGINAL_OBJECT_NAME    VARCHAR2(128),
    ORIGINAL_OBJECT_SCHEMA  VARCHAR2(30),
    PACKET_NUMBER           NUMBER,
    PARALLELIZATION         NUMBER,
    PARENT_PROCESS_ORDER    NUMBER,
    PARTITION_NAME          VARCHAR2(30),
    PHASE                   NUMBER,
    PLATFORM                VARCHAR2(101),
    PROCESS_NAME            VARCHAR2(30),
    PROCESS_ORDER           NUMBER,
    PROCESSING_STATE        CHAR,
    PROCESSING_STATUS       CHAR,
    PROPERTY                NUMBER,
    QUEUE_TABNUM            NUMBER,
    REMOTE_LINK             VARCHAR2(128),
    SCN                     NUMBER,
    SEED                    NUMBER,
    SERVICE_NAME            VARCHAR2(64),
    SIZE_ESTIMATE           NUMBER,
    START_TIME              DATE,
    STATE                   VARCHAR2(12),
    STATUS_QUEUE            VARCHAR2(30),
    SUBPARTITION_NAME       VARCHAR2(30),
    TARGET_XML_CLOB         CLOB,
    TDE_REWRAPPED_KEY       RAW(2000),
    TEMPLATE_TABLE          VARCHAR2(30),
    TIMEZONE                VARCHAR2(64),
    TOTAL_BYTES             NUMBER,
    TRIGFLAG                NUMBER,
    UNLOAD_METHOD           NUMBER,
    USER_DIRECTORY          VARCHAR2(4000),
    USER_FILE_NAME          VARCHAR2(4000),
    USER_NAME               VARCHAR2(30),
    VALUE_N                 NUMBER,
    VALUE_T                 VARCHAR2(4000),
    VERSION                 NUMBER,
    WORK_ITEM               VARCHAR2(21),
    XML_CLOB                CLOB,
    unique (PROCESS_ORDER, DUPLICATE)
)

    on IFRS.SYS_EXPORT_SCHEMA_01 (OBJECT_SCHEMA, OBJECT_NAME, OBJECT_TYPE)

)
    on commit preserve rows

    on commit preserve rows

create table IFRS.IFRS_EAD_RESULT
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE      DATE                             not null,
    MASTERID           NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    CURRENCY           VARCHAR2(5)                      not null,
    EXCHANGE_RATE      NUMBER       default 1           not null,
    ECL_MODEL_ID       NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    CR_STAGE           CHAR,
    EAD_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    EAD_SEGMENT        VARCHAR2(100)                    not null,
    CCF_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18),
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_ID NUMBER(18),
    UNUSED_AMOUNT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    REVOLVING_FLAG     NUMBER(1),
    MARKET_AMOUNT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED   NUMBER(32, 6),
    CCF_RATE           NUMBER,
    CCF_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    PREPAYMENT_RATE    NUMBER,
    PREPAYMENT_AMOUNT  NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_COST   NUMBER(32, 6),
    FAIRVALUE          NUMBER(32, 6),
    PMTDATE            DATE,
    EAD_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    COUNTER            NUMBER(10),
    MAX_COUNTER        NUMBER(10),
    SOURCE             VARCHAR2(100),
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_EAD_RESULT
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_EAD_RESULT
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_EAD_RESULT."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

    UNAMORT_FEE_CCY_SIGN           VARCHAR2(1),

    CADANGAN_KOLEKTIF_COM_CCY_SIGN VARCHAR2(1),
    CADANGAN_KOLEKTIF_COM_CCY      NUMBER(15, 2),
    CADANGAN_KOLEKTIF_COM_LCL_SIGN VARCHAR2(1),
    CADANGAN_KOLEKTIF_COM_LCL      NUMBER(15, 2),
    CADANGAN_INDIV_COM_CCY_SIGN    VARCHAR2(1),
    CADANGAN_INDIV_COM_CCY         NUMBER(15, 2),
    CADANGAN_INDIV_COM_LCL_SIGN    VARCHAR2(1),
    CADANGAN_INDIV_COM_LCL         NUMBER(15, 2),
    AMORT_FEE_AMT_ILS_CCY_SIGN     VARCHAR2(1),
    AMORT_FEE_AMT_ILS_CCY          NUMBER(15, 2),
    AMORT_FEE_AMT_ILS_LCL_SIGN     VARCHAR2(1),
    AMORT_FEE_AMT_ILS_LCL          NUMBER(15, 2)
)

create index IFRS.IDX_GTMP_IFRS_NOMI
    on IFRS.GTMP_IFRS_NOMINATIVE (MASTERID)
/

create index IFRS.IDX2_GTMP_IFRS_NOMI
    on IFRS.GTMP_IFRS_NOMINATIVE (REPORT_DATE, ACCOUNT_STATUS)
/

create index IFRS.IDX3_GTMP_IFRS_NOMI
    on IFRS.GTMP_IFRS_NOMINATIVE (IFRS9_CLASS, DATA_SOURCE)
/

create index IFRS.IDX4_GTMP_IFRS_NOMI
    on IFRS.GTMP_IFRS_NOMINATIVE (ASSESSMENT_IMP, SPECIAL_REASON)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_JRNL_DATA_REC
(
    ID                 NUMBER(18) not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE      DATE,
    MASTERID           NUMBER(18),
    FACNO              VARCHAR2(50),
    CIFNO              VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCTNO             VARCHAR2(70),
    DATASOURCE         VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDTYPE            VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDCODE            VARCHAR2(20),
    TRXCODE            VARCHAR2(20),
    CCY                VARCHAR2(10),
    JOURNALCODE        VARCHAR2(20),
    JOURNALCODE2       VARCHAR2(10),
    STATUS             VARCHAR2(20),
    REVERSE            VARCHAR2(3),
    FLAG_CF            VARCHAR2(3),
    DRCR               VARCHAR2(2),
    GLNO               VARCHAR2(20),
    N_AMOUNT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMOUNT_IDR       NUMBER(32, 6),
    SOURCEPROCESS      VARCHAR2(20),
    INTMID             NUMBER(18),
    BRANCH             VARCHAR2(20),
    NOREF              VARCHAR2(20),
    VALCTR_CODE        VARCHAR2(50),
    JOURNAL_DESC       VARCHAR2(200),
    CREATEDDATE        DATE,
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(30),
    GL_INTERNAL_CODE   VARCHAR2(100),
    METHOD             VARCHAR2(10),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_1 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_2 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_3 VARCHAR2(100),
    GL_COSTCENTER      VARCHAR2(10)
)
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_ACV.RESERVED_VARCHAR_1 is 'ASET_KEUANGAN'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_ACV.RESERVED_VARCHAR_2 is 'TRA'
/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_ACV.RESERVED_VARCHAR_3 is 'BUCKET_GROUP'
/

/

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_ACV.RESERVED_VARCHAR_5 is 'ASET_KEUANGAN_VER_2'

comment on column IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_ACV.RESERVED_AMOUNT_1 is 'NJUM'

create table IFRS.TBLU_LGD_EXCLUDED_LOAN
(
    PKID           NUMBER(18)     not null
        constraint PK_TBLU_LGD_EXCLUDED_LOAN
            primary key,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER VARCHAR2(100)  not null,
    NOTES          VARCHAR2(4000) not null,
    UPLOADID       NUMBER(18),
    UPLOADBY       VARCHAR2(36)   not null,
    UPLOADDATE     DATE           not null,
    UPLOADHOST     VARCHAR2(30)   not null,
    APPROVEDBY     VARCHAR2(36),
    APPROVEDDATE   DATE,
    APPROVEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_TBLU_LGD_EXCLUDED_LOAN
    on IFRS.TBLU_LGD_EXCLUDED_LOAN (ACCOUNT_NUMBER)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TBLU_LGD_EXCLUDED_LOAN
    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLU_LGD_EXCLUDED_LOAN
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_TBLU_LGD_EXCLUDED_LOAN."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

)

    on IFRS.TBLU_LGD_ADJ_REC_AMOUNT_BF_NPV (ACCOUNT_NUMBER)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TBLU_LGD_ADJ_REC_AMT_BFNPV
    before insert

END;
/

(
    PKID                     NUMBER(18)   not null,

    BI_COLLECTABILITY_NPL    VARCHAR2(10),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY_CLOSED VARCHAR2(10),
    TOTAL_LOSS_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOV_AMT_BF_NPV         NUMBER(32, 6),

    DISCOUNT_RATE            NUMBER(32, 6),
    LOSS_RATE                NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOVERY_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),

    CREATEDBY                VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    CREATEDDATE              DATE         not null,

create table IFRS.IFRS_LGD
(
    PKID                     NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    EFF_DATE                 DATE,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE            DATE,
    PRODUCT_CODE             VARCHAR2(10),
    PRODUCT_NAME             VARCHAR2(255),
    MASTER_ID                NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(30),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER          VARCHAR2(30),
    CUSTOMER_NAME            VARCHAR2(150),
    LGD_CUSTOMER_TYPE        VARCHAR2(100),
    SEGMENTATION_ID          NUMBER(18),
    SEGMENTATION_NAME        VARCHAR2(200),
    CURRENCY                 VARCHAR2(5),
    ORIGINAL_CURRENCY        VARCHAR2(5),
    NPL_DATE                 DATE,
    CLOSED_DATE              DATE,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY_NPL    VARCHAR2(10),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY_CLOSED VARCHAR2(10),
    TOTAL_LOSS_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOV_AMT_BF_NPV         NUMBER(32, 6),
    LAST_RECOV_DATE          DATE,
    RECOV_PERCENTAGE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    DISCOUNT_RATE            NUMBER(32, 6),
    LOSS_RATE                NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOVERY_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    DATA_SOURCE              VARCHAR2(20),
    CREATEDBY                VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE              DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST              VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY                VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE              DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST              VARCHAR2(30),
    LGD_RULE_ID              NUMBER(18),
    LGD_RULE_NAME            VARCHAR2(150),
    LGD_FLAG                 VARCHAR2(2),
    SPECIAL_REASON           VARCHAR2(20)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.PK_IFRS_LGD
    on IFRS.IFRS_LGD (PKID)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_LGD
    on IFRS.IFRS_LGD (EFF_DATE, DOWNLOAD_DATE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, CUSTOMER_NUMBER, SEGMENTATION_ID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_LGD
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_LGD
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_LGD."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    PKID                  NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_LGD_EXPECTED_RECOVERY
            primary key,
    EFF_DATE              DATE                             not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE         DATE                             not null,
    LGD_RULE_ID           NUMBER(18),
    LGD_RULE_NAME         VARCHAR2(150),
    SEGMENTATION_ID       NUMBER(18),
    CALC_METHOD           VARCHAR2(50),
    OUTSTANDING_NPL       NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOVERY_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    PV_RECOVERY_AMOUNT    NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOVERY_RATE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    LGD_EXPECTED_RECOVERY NUMBER(32, 6),
    COLLATERAL            NUMBER(32, 6),
    CREATEDBY             VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE           DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST           VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY             VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE           DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST           VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_LGD_EXPECTED_RECOVERY (EFF_DATE, DOWNLOAD_DATE, LGD_RULE_ID)

  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_LGD_EXPECTED_RECOVERY."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;

create global temporary table IFRS.GTMP_IFRS_ACCT_JOURNAL_INTM
(
    ID            NUMBER(18),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE DATE,
    MASTERID      NUMBER(18),
    FACNO         VARCHAR2(50),
    CIFNO         VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCTNO        VARCHAR2(70),
    DATASOURCE    VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDTYPE       VARCHAR2(20),
    PRDCODE       VARCHAR2(20),
    TRXCODE       VARCHAR2(20),
    CCY           VARCHAR2(5),
    JOURNALCODE   VARCHAR2(10),
    JOURNALCODE2  VARCHAR2(10),
    STATUS        VARCHAR2(20),
    REVERSE       VARCHAR2(3),
    FLAG_CF       VARCHAR2(3),
    N_AMOUNT      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMOUNT_IDR  NUMBER(32, 6),
    SOURCEPROCESS VARCHAR2(20),
    CREATEDDATE   DATE,
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH        VARCHAR2(20),
    IS_PNL        VARCHAR2(3),
    CF_ID         NUMBER(18),
    FLAG_AL       VARCHAR2(3),
    METHOD        VARCHAR2(10)
)
    on commit preserve rows
/

(
    ID                  NUMBER(18) not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE       DATE,
    MASTERID            NUMBER(18),

    CIFNO               VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCTNO              VARCHAR2(70),
    DATASOURCE          VARCHAR2(20),
    N_UNAMORT_COST      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_FEE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMORT_COST        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMORT_FEE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_ACCRU_COST        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_ACCRU_FEE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_ACCRUFULL_COST    NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_ACCRUFULL_FEE     NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECFDATE             DATE,
    CREATEDDATE         DATE,
    CREATEDBY           VARCHAR2(30),
    N_ACCRU_PREV_COST   NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_ACCRU_PREV_FEE    NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMORT_ADJ_COST    NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_AMORT_ADJ_FEE     NUMBER(32, 6),
    DO_AMORT            VARCHAR2(2),
    BRANCH              VARCHAR2(30),
    ACF_CODE            VARCHAR2(2),
    FLAG_AL             VARCHAR2(2),
    N_ACCRU_NOCF        NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_NOCF      NUMBER(32, 6),
    N_UNAMORT_PREV_NOCF NUMBER(32, 6)
)
    on commit preserve rows

create table IFRS.IFRS_ECL_MULTIPLIER
(
    PKID           NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_ECL_MULTIPLIER
            primary key,
    EFFECTIVE_DATE DATE,
    DATA_SOURCE    VARCHAR2(10),
    SUB_SEGMENT    VARCHAR2(50),
    RULE_ID        NUMBER(10),
    MULTIPLIER     NUMBER,
    REMARKS        VARCHAR2(100),
    CREATEDBY      VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE    DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST    VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY      VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE    DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST    VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_ECL_MULTIPLIER
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_ECL_MULTIPLIER
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_ECL_MULTIPLIER."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    PKID                      NUMBER(18)    not null,

    PREVIOUS_ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS            VARCHAR2(20),

    MARKET_RATE               NUMBER,

    BUCKET_ID                 NUMBER(10),

    ECL_LIFETIME_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),

    IA_UNWINDING_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    IA_UNWINDING_SUM_AMOUNT   NUMBER(32, 6),

    PKID                      NUMBER(18)    not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE             DATE          not null,
    MASTERID                  NUMBER(18)    not null,
    MASTER_ACCOUNT_CODE       VARCHAR2(100) not null,
    DATA_SOURCE               VARCHAR2(20),
    GLOBAL_CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME             VARCHAR2(150),
    FACILITY_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER            VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    PREVIOUS_ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS            VARCHAR2(20),
    INTEREST_RATE             NUMBER,
    MARKET_RATE               NUMBER,
    PRODUCT_GROUP             VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_ENTITY            CHAR,
    GL_CONSTNAME              VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE               VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE_OPEN          VARCHAR2(50),
    CURRENCY                  VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE             NUMBER,
    INITIAL_OUTSTANDING       NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING               NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_IDC           NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_JF            NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_BANK          NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_PASTDUE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND                   NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND_CASH              NUMBER(32, 6),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED          NUMBER(32, 6),
    INSTALLMENT_AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    DOWN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    JF_FLAG                   NUMBER(1),
    LOAN_START_DATE           DATE,
    LOAN_DUE_DATE             DATE,
    LOAN_START_AMORTIZATION   DATE,
    LOAN_END_AMORTIZATION     DATE,
    INSTALLMENT_GRACE_PERIOD  DATE,
    NEXT_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE     DATE,
    LAST_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    FIRST_INSTALLMENT_DATE    DATE,
    TENOR                     NUMBER(10),
    REMAINING_TENOR           NUMBER(10),
    PAYMENT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PAYMENT_TERM              VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_CALCULATION_CODE VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_PAYMENT_TERM     VARCHAR2(2),
    RESTRUCTURE_DATE          DATE,
    RESTRUCTURE_FLAG          NUMBER(1),
    POCI_FLAG                 NUMBER(1),
    STAFF_LOAN_FLAG           NUMBER(1),
    BELOW_MARKET_FLAG         NUMBER(1),
    BTB_FLAG                  NUMBER(1),
    COMMITTED_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    REVOLVING_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    IAS_CLASS                 VARCHAR2(10),
    IFRS9_CLASS               VARCHAR2(50),
    BM_RESULT                 VARCHAR2(50),
    SPPI_RESULT               VARCHAR2(50),
    AMORT_TYPE                VARCHAR2(10),
    EIR_STATUS                CHAR,
    ECF_STATUS                CHAR,
    EIR                       NUMBER,
    EIR_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    FAIR_VALUE_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_TXN_COST  NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_ORG_FEE   NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    DAILY_AMORT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_BENEFIT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_AMT_TOTAL_JF      NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_JF        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT_JF       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ORIGINAL_COLLECTABILITY   CHAR,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY         CHAR,
    ORIGINAL_DAY_PAST_DUE     NUMBER(10),
    DAY_PAST_DUE              NUMBER(10),
    DPD_START_DATE            DATE,
    DPD_ZERO_COUNTER          NUMBER(10),
    NPL_DATE                  DATE,
    NPL_FLAG                  NUMBER(1),
    DEFAULT_DATE              DATE,
    DEFAULT_FLAG              NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_FLAG             NUMBER(1),
    WRITEOFF_DATE             DATE,
    OUTSTANDING_WO            NUMBER(32, 6),
    IMPAIRED_FLAG             CHAR,
    IS_IMPAIRED               NUMBER(1),
    GROUP_SEGMENT             VARCHAR2(50),
    SEGMENT                   VARCHAR2(100),
    SUB_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(50),
    CR_STAGE                  CHAR,
    CCF_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    CCF_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    LIFETIME_RULE_ID          NUMBER(18),
    LIFETIME_SEGMENT          VARCHAR2(100),
    LIFETIME                  NUMBER(10),
    EAD_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    EAD_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    EAD_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    LGD_RULE_ID               NUMBER(18),
    LGD_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(100),
    PD_RULE_ID                NUMBER(18),
    PD_SEGMENT                VARCHAR2(100),
    RATING_CODE               VARCHAR2(10),
    BUCKET_GROUP              VARCHAR2(30),
    BUCKET_ID                 NUMBER(10),
    ECL_12_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_LIFETIME_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    CA_UNWINDING_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    IA_UNWINDING_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    IA_UNWINDING_SUM_AMOUNT   NUMBER(32, 6),
    BEGINNING_BALANCE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    ENDING_BALANCE            NUMBER(32, 6),
    WRITEBACK_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    CHARGE_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_1        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_2        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_3        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_4        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_5        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_6        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_7        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_8        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_9        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_10       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_11       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_12       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_13       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_14       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_15       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_16       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_17       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_18       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_19       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_20       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_21       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_22       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_23       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_24       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_25       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_26       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_27       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_28       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_29       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_30       VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_1         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_2         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_3         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_4         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_5         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_6         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_7         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_8         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_9         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_10        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_11        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_12        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_13        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_14        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_15        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_16        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_17        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_18        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_19        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_20        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_RATE_1           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_2           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_3           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_4           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_5           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_6           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_7           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_8           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_9           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_10          NUMBER,
    RESERVED_FLAG_1           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_2           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_3           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_4           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_5           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_6           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_7           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_8           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_9           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_10          NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_DATE_1           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_2           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_3           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_4           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_5           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_6           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_7           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_8           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_9           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_10          DATE,
    CREATEDBY                 VARCHAR2(36)  not null,
    CREATEDDATE               DATE          not null,
    CREATEDHOST               VARCHAR2(30)  not null,
    UPDATEDBY                 VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE               DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST               VARCHAR2(30),
    SEGMENT_RULE_ID           NUMBER(18),
    PREPAYMENT_SEGMENT        VARCHAR2(100),
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18)
)
/

create table IFRS.T_IBA_VALUATION_BCHT
(
    CUSTOMER_NR    VARCHAR2(30),
    ENTITY         VARCHAR2(3),
    VALUATION_TYPE VARCHAR2(25),
    VALUATION_DATE DATE,
    CURRENCY       VARCHAR2(3),
    AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 8)
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_LGD_20201116
(
    PKID                     NUMBER(18)   not null,
    EFF_DATE                 DATE,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE            DATE,
    PRODUCT_CODE             VARCHAR2(10),
    PRODUCT_NAME             VARCHAR2(255),
    MASTER_ID                NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(30),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER          VARCHAR2(30),
    CUSTOMER_NAME            VARCHAR2(150),
    LGD_CUSTOMER_TYPE        VARCHAR2(100),
    SEGMENTATION_ID          NUMBER(18),
    SEGMENTATION_NAME        VARCHAR2(200),
    CURRENCY                 VARCHAR2(5),
    ORIGINAL_CURRENCY        VARCHAR2(5),
    NPL_DATE                 DATE,
    CLOSED_DATE              DATE,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY_NPL    VARCHAR2(10),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY_CLOSED VARCHAR2(10),
    TOTAL_LOSS_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOV_AMT_BF_NPV         NUMBER(32, 6),
    LAST_RECOV_DATE          DATE,
    RECOV_PERCENTAGE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    DISCOUNT_RATE            NUMBER(32, 6),
    LOSS_RATE                NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOVERY_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    DATA_SOURCE              VARCHAR2(20),
    CREATEDBY                VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    CREATEDDATE              DATE         not null,
    CREATEDHOST              VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPDATEDBY                VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE              DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST              VARCHAR2(30),
    LGD_RULE_ID              NUMBER(18),
    LGD_RULE_NAME            VARCHAR2(150),
    VALUATION_TYPE           VARCHAR2(50)
)
/

(
    PKID                     NUMBER(18)   not null,
    EFF_DATE                 DATE,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE            DATE,
    PRODUCT_CODE             VARCHAR2(10),

    CUSTOMER_NUMBER          VARCHAR2(30),
    CUSTOMER_NAME            VARCHAR2(150),

    NPL_DATE                 DATE,

    DISCOUNT_RATE            NUMBER(32, 6),

    RECOVERY_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    DATA_SOURCE              VARCHAR2(20),

create table IFRS.IFRS_LGD_20201117
(
    PKID                     NUMBER(18)   not null,
    EFF_DATE                 DATE,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE            DATE,
    PRODUCT_CODE             VARCHAR2(10),
    PRODUCT_NAME             VARCHAR2(255),
    MASTER_ID                NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(30),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER          VARCHAR2(30),
    CUSTOMER_NAME            VARCHAR2(150),
    LGD_CUSTOMER_TYPE        VARCHAR2(100),
    SEGMENTATION_ID          NUMBER(18),
    SEGMENTATION_NAME        VARCHAR2(200),
    CURRENCY                 VARCHAR2(5),
    ORIGINAL_CURRENCY        VARCHAR2(5),
    NPL_DATE                 DATE,
    CLOSED_DATE              DATE,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY_NPL    VARCHAR2(10),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY_CLOSED VARCHAR2(10),
    TOTAL_LOSS_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOV_AMT_BF_NPV         NUMBER(32, 6),
    LAST_RECOV_DATE          DATE,
    RECOV_PERCENTAGE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    DISCOUNT_RATE            NUMBER(32, 6),
    LOSS_RATE                NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOVERY_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    DATA_SOURCE              VARCHAR2(20),
    CREATEDBY                VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    CREATEDDATE              DATE         not null,
    CREATEDHOST              VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPDATEDBY                VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE              DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST              VARCHAR2(30),
    LGD_RULE_ID              NUMBER(18),
    LGD_RULE_NAME            VARCHAR2(150),
    VALUATION_TYPE           VARCHAR2(50)
)
/

create table IFRS.TBLU_LGD_EXCLUDED_CARD
(
    PKID           NUMBER(18)     not null
        constraint PK_TBLU_LGD_EXCLUDED_CARD
            primary key,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER VARCHAR2(100)  not null,
    NOTES          VARCHAR2(4000) not null,
    UPLOADID       NUMBER(18),
    UPLOADBY       VARCHAR2(36)   not null,
    UPLOADDATE     DATE           not null,
    UPLOADHOST     VARCHAR2(30)   not null,
    APPROVEDBY     VARCHAR2(36),
    APPROVEDDATE   DATE,
    APPROVEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_TBLU_LGD_EXCLUDED_CARD
    on IFRS.TBLU_LGD_EXCLUDED_CARD (ACCOUNT_NUMBER)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TBLU_LGD_EXCLUDED_CARD
    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLU_LGD_EXCLUDED_CARD
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_TBLU_LGD_EXCLUDED_CARD."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_UAT_BU
(
    PKID                      NUMBER(18)    not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE             DATE          not null,
    MASTERID                  NUMBER(18)    not null,
    MASTER_ACCOUNT_CODE       VARCHAR2(100) not null,
    DATA_SOURCE               VARCHAR2(20),
    GLOBAL_CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME             VARCHAR2(150),
    FACILITY_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER            VARCHAR2(50)  not null,
    PREVIOUS_ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS            VARCHAR2(20),
    INTEREST_RATE             NUMBER,
    MARKET_RATE               NUMBER,
    PRODUCT_GROUP             VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_ENTITY            CHAR,
    GL_CONSTNAME              VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE               VARCHAR2(50),
    BRANCH_CODE_OPEN          VARCHAR2(50),
    CURRENCY                  VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE             NUMBER,
    INITIAL_OUTSTANDING       NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING               NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_IDC           NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_JF            NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_BANK          NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_PASTDUE       NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND                   NUMBER(32, 6),
    PLAFOND_CASH              NUMBER(32, 6),
    INTEREST_ACCRUED          NUMBER(32, 6),
    INSTALLMENT_AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    DOWN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT       NUMBER(32, 6),
    JF_FLAG                   NUMBER(1),
    LOAN_START_DATE           DATE,
    LOAN_DUE_DATE             DATE,
    LOAN_START_AMORTIZATION   DATE,
    LOAN_END_AMORTIZATION     DATE,

    NEXT_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE     DATE,
    LAST_PAYMENT_DATE         DATE,
    FIRST_INSTALLMENT_DATE    DATE,
    TENOR                     NUMBER(10),
    REMAINING_TENOR           NUMBER(10),
    PAYMENT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    PAYMENT_TERM              VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_CALCULATION_CODE VARCHAR2(2),
    INTEREST_PAYMENT_TERM     VARCHAR2(2),
    RESTRUCTURE_DATE          DATE,
    RESTRUCTURE_FLAG          NUMBER(1),
    POCI_FLAG                 NUMBER(1),
    STAFF_LOAN_FLAG           NUMBER(1),
    BELOW_MARKET_FLAG         NUMBER(1),
    BTB_FLAG                  NUMBER(1),
    COMMITTED_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    REVOLVING_FLAG            NUMBER(1),
    IAS_CLASS                 VARCHAR2(10),
