    AMORT_TYPE                VARCHAR2(10),
    EIR_STATUS                CHAR,
    ECF_STATUS                CHAR,
    EIR                       NUMBER,
    EIR_AMOUNT                NUMBER(32, 6),
    FAIR_VALUE_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_TXN_COST  NUMBER(32, 6),
    INITIAL_UNAMORT_ORG_FEE   NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    DAILY_AMORT_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_BENEFIT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_AMT_TOTAL_JF      NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_JF        NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_COST_AMT_JF       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ORIGINAL_COLLECTABILITY   CHAR,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY         CHAR,
    ORIGINAL_DAY_PAST_DUE     NUMBER(10),
    DAY_PAST_DUE              NUMBER(10),
    DPD_START_DATE            DATE,

create table IFRS.IFRS_LGD_DATA_DETAIL
(
    PKID            NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_LGD_DATA_DETAIL
            primary key,
    EFF_DATE        DATE                             not null,
    MASTER_ID       NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER  VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS  VARCHAR2(20),
    SEGMENTATION_ID VARCHAR2(100),
    PAYMENT_DATE    DATE,
    CURRENCY        VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE   NUMBER,
    RECOVERY_AMOUNT NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOVERY_TYPE   VARCHAR2(10),
    IS_EFFECTIVE    NUMBER(1),
    DATA_SOURCE     VARCHAR2(20),
    CREATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE     DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE     DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_LGD_DATA_DETAIL
    on IFRS.IFRS_LGD_DATA_DETAIL (EFF_DATE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, CUSTOMER_NUMBER, PAYMENT_DATE, SEGMENTATION_ID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_LGD_DATA_DETAIL
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_LGD_DATA_DETAIL
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_LGD_DATA_DETAIL."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_CCF_HEADER_BACKUP
(
    PKID            NUMBER(18),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE   DATE,
    SEGMENTATION    VARCHAR2(100),
    SEGMENTATION_ID NUMBER(18),
    CCF_RULE_ID     NUMBER(18),
    CCF_RATE        NUMBER,
    AVERAGE_METHOD  VARCHAR2(30),
    CREATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    CREATEDDATE     DATE         not null,
    CREATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPDATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE     DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(36)
)
/

create table IFRS.TBLU_ADJUSTMENT_COVID
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)   not null
        constraint PK_TBLU_ADJUSTMENT_COVID
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE      DATE         not null,
    NO_REKENING        VARCHAR2(30) not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER     VARCHAR2(50),
    PERSEN_PENCADANGAN NUMBER       not null,
    UPLOADID           NUMBER(18),
    UPLOADBY           VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPLOADDATE         DATE         not null,
    UPLOADHOST         VARCHAR2(30) not null,
    APPROVEDBY         VARCHAR2(36),
    APPROVEDDATE       DATE,
    APPROVEDHOST       VARCHAR2(30),
    FLAG               CHAR
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_TBLU_ADJUSTMENT_COVID
    on IFRS.TBLU_ADJUSTMENT_COVID (DOWNLOAD_DATE, NO_REKENING, ACCOUNT_NUMBER)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TBLU_ADJUSTMENT_COVID
    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLU_ADJUSTMENT_COVID
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_TBLU_ADJUSTMENT_COVID."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.BCA_LGD_20210316
(
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER VARCHAR2(50),
    NOTES          CLOB,
    LGD_FLAG       CLOB,

    LAST_OS        CLOB
)

(

		constraint PK_TBLT_API_LOGS_PKID
			primary key,
    URL_API        VARCHAR2(200)                    not null,

    EMAIL_ADDRESS  VARCHAR2(100),

    FREETEXT       VARCHAR2(4000),
    ERROR_CODE     VARCHAR2(5)                      not null,
    ERROR_MESSAGE  VARCHAR2(4000)                   not null,
    CREATEDBY      VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE    DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST    VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY      VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE    DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST    VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    MASTER_ACCOUNT_CODE VARCHAR2(100),

    CUSTOMER_NUMBER     VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME       VARCHAR2(150),
    FACILITY_NUMBER     VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER      VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS      VARCHAR2(20),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY   CHAR,
    RATING_CODE         VARCHAR2(10),
    GROUP_SEGMENT       VARCHAR2(50),
    SEGMENT             VARCHAR2(100),
    SUB_SEGMENT         VARCHAR2(50),
    SEGMENT_RULE_ID     NUMBER(18),
    INTEREST_RATE       NUMBER,
    PRODUCT_CODE        VARCHAR2(20),
    CURRENCY            VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE       NUMBER,
    FIRST_NPL_DATE      DATE,
    FIRST_NPL_OS        NUMBER(32, 6),
    CREATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE         DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY           VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE         DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST         VARCHAR2(30)
)

(
    PKID                        NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_LGD_ER_NPL_ACCT
            primary key,
    EFF_DATE                    DATE                             not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE               DATE                             not null,
    MASTER_ID                   NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER              VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER             VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME               VARCHAR2(150),
    NPL_DATE                    DATE,
    CLOSED_DATE                 DATE,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY_NPL       CHAR,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY_CLOSED    CHAR,
    OUTSTANDING_DEFAULT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    LGD_CUSTOMER_TYPE           VARCHAR2(100),
    SEGMENTATION_ID             VARCHAR2(100),
    SEGMENTATION_NAME           VARCHAR2(100),
    LGD_RULE_ID                 NUMBER(18),
    LGD_RULE_NAME               VARCHAR2(150),
    PLAFOND                     NUMBER(32, 6),
    PRODUCT_CODE                VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE                VARCHAR2(20),
    CURRENCY                    VARCHAR2(5),
    ORIGINAL_CURRENCY           VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE               NUMBER,
    INTEREST_RATE               NUMBER,
    COLLATERAL_VALUE_FOR_IMPAIR NUMBER(32, 6),
    CREATEDBY                   VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE                 DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST                 VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY                   VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE                 DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST                 VARCHAR2(30),
    VALUATION_TYPE              VARCHAR2(50),
    DATA_SOURCE                 VARCHAR2(20),
    LGD_FLAG                    VARCHAR2(2)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_LGD_ER_NPL_ACCT
    on IFRS.IFRS_LGD_ER_NPL_ACCT (EFF_DATE, DOWNLOAD_DATE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, CUSTOMER_NUMBER, DATA_SOURCE,
                                  SEGMENTATION_ID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_LGD_ER_NPL_ACCT
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_LGD_ER_NPL_ACCT
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_LGD_ER_NPL_ACCT."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_PRC_DATE_AMORT
(
    CURRDATE             DATE,
    PREVDATE             DATE,
    RUNNING_FLAG_FROM_DW CHAR,
    BATCH_STATUS         VARCHAR2(50),
    REMARK               VARCHAR2(4000),
    LAST_PROCESS_DATE    DATE,
    SESSIONID            VARCHAR2(50),
    PRC_NAME             VARCHAR2(100)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_PRC_DATE_AMORT_01
    before update of CURRDATE
    on IFRS.IFRS_PRC_DATE_AMORT
    for each row
DECLARE
BEGIN
  IF :new.CURRDATE < SYSDATE - 40 THEN
    RAISE_APPLICATION_ERROR (-20002, 'ERROR MESSAGE : CURRDATE MUST BE GREATER THAN LAST 10 DAYS ' || DBMS_UTILITY.FORMAT_ERROR_BACKTRACE);
  END IF;
END;
/

create table IFRS.SYS_EXPORT_TABLE_01
(
    ABORT_STEP              NUMBER,
    ANCESTOR_PROCESS_ORDER  NUMBER,
    BASE_OBJECT_NAME        VARCHAR2(30),
    BASE_OBJECT_SCHEMA      VARCHAR2(30),
    BASE_OBJECT_TYPE        VARCHAR2(30),
    BASE_PROCESS_ORDER      NUMBER,
    BLOCK_SIZE              NUMBER,
    CLUSTER_OK              NUMBER,
    COMPLETED_BYTES         NUMBER,
    COMPLETED_ROWS          NUMBER,
    COMPLETION_TIME         DATE,
    CONTROL_QUEUE           VARCHAR2(30),
    CREATION_LEVEL          NUMBER,
    CUMULATIVE_TIME         NUMBER,
    DATA_BUFFER_SIZE        NUMBER,
    DATA_IO                 NUMBER,
    DATAOBJ_NUM             NUMBER,
    DB_VERSION              VARCHAR2(60),
    DEGREE                  NUMBER,
    DOMAIN_PROCESS_ORDER    NUMBER,
    DUMP_ALLOCATION         NUMBER,
    DUMP_FILEID             NUMBER,
    DUMP_LENGTH             NUMBER,
    DUMP_ORIG_LENGTH        NUMBER,
    DUMP_POSITION           NUMBER,
    DUPLICATE               NUMBER,
    ELAPSED_TIME            NUMBER,
    ERROR_COUNT             NUMBER,
    EXTEND_SIZE             NUMBER,
    FILE_MAX_SIZE           NUMBER,
    FILE_NAME               VARCHAR2(4000),
    FILE_TYPE               NUMBER,
    FLAGS                   NUMBER,
    GRANTOR                 VARCHAR2(30),
    GRANULES                NUMBER,
    GUID                    RAW(16),
    IN_PROGRESS             CHAR,
    INSTANCE                VARCHAR2(60),
    INSTANCE_ID             NUMBER,
    IS_DEFAULT              NUMBER,
    JOB_MODE                VARCHAR2(21),
    JOB_VERSION             VARCHAR2(60),
    LAST_FILE               NUMBER,
    LAST_UPDATE             DATE,
    LOAD_METHOD             NUMBER,
    METADATA_BUFFER_SIZE    NUMBER,
    METADATA_IO             NUMBER,
    NAME                    VARCHAR2(30),
    OBJECT_INT_OID          VARCHAR2(32),
    OBJECT_LONG_NAME        VARCHAR2(4000),
    OBJECT_NAME             VARCHAR2(200),
    OBJECT_NUMBER           NUMBER,
    OBJECT_PATH_SEQNO       NUMBER,
    OBJECT_ROW              NUMBER,
    OBJECT_SCHEMA           VARCHAR2(30),
    OBJECT_TABLESPACE       VARCHAR2(30),
    OBJECT_TYPE             VARCHAR2(30),
    OBJECT_TYPE_PATH        VARCHAR2(200),
    OLD_VALUE               VARCHAR2(4000),
    OPERATION               VARCHAR2(8),
    OPTION_TAG              VARCHAR2(30),
    ORIG_BASE_OBJECT_SCHEMA VARCHAR2(30),
    ORIGINAL_OBJECT_NAME    VARCHAR2(128),
    ORIGINAL_OBJECT_SCHEMA  VARCHAR2(30),
    PACKET_NUMBER           NUMBER,
    PARALLELIZATION         NUMBER,
    PARENT_PROCESS_ORDER    NUMBER,
    PARTITION_NAME          VARCHAR2(30),
    PHASE                   NUMBER,
    PLATFORM                VARCHAR2(101),
    PROCESS_NAME            VARCHAR2(30),
    PROCESS_ORDER           NUMBER,
    PROCESSING_STATE        CHAR,
    PROCESSING_STATUS       CHAR,
    PROPERTY                NUMBER,
    QUEUE_TABNUM            NUMBER,
    REMOTE_LINK             VARCHAR2(128),
    SCN                     NUMBER,
    SEED                    NUMBER,
    SERVICE_NAME            VARCHAR2(64),
    SIZE_ESTIMATE           NUMBER,
    START_TIME              DATE,
    STATE                   VARCHAR2(12),
    STATUS_QUEUE            VARCHAR2(30),
    SUBPARTITION_NAME       VARCHAR2(30),
    TARGET_XML_CLOB         CLOB,
    TDE_REWRAPPED_KEY       RAW(2000),
    TEMPLATE_TABLE          VARCHAR2(30),
    TIMEZONE                VARCHAR2(64),
    TOTAL_BYTES             NUMBER,
    TRIGFLAG                NUMBER,
    UNLOAD_METHOD           NUMBER,
    USER_DIRECTORY          VARCHAR2(4000),
    USER_FILE_NAME          VARCHAR2(4000),
    USER_NAME               VARCHAR2(30),
    VALUE_N                 NUMBER,
    VALUE_T                 VARCHAR2(4000),
    VERSION                 NUMBER,
    WORK_ITEM               VARCHAR2(21),
    XML_CLOB                CLOB,
    unique (PROCESS_ORDER, DUPLICATE)
)

    CUSTOMER_NAME               VARCHAR2(150),
    NPL_DATE                    DATE,
    CLOSED_DATE                 DATE,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY_NPL       CHAR,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY_CLOSED    CHAR,
    OUTSTANDING_DEFAULT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    LGD_CUSTOMER_TYPE           VARCHAR2(100),
    SEGMENTATION_ID             VARCHAR2(100),
    SEGMENTATION_NAME           VARCHAR2(100),
    LGD_RULE_ID                 NUMBER(18),
    LGD_RULE_NAME               VARCHAR2(150),
    PLAFOND                     NUMBER(32, 6),
    PRODUCT_CODE                VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE                VARCHAR2(20),

    INTEREST_RATE               NUMBER,
    COLLATERAL_VALUE_FOR_IMPAIR NUMBER(32, 6),
    CREATEDBY                   VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE                 DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST                 VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY                   VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE                 DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST                 VARCHAR2(30),
    VALUATION_TYPE              VARCHAR2(50),
    DATA_SOURCE                 VARCHAR2(20),
    LGD_FLAG                    VARCHAR2(2)
)

create unique index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_LGD_ER_NPL_WORKOUT
    on IFRS.IFRS_LGD_ER_NPL_ACCT_WORKOUT (EFF_DATE, DOWNLOAD_DATE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, CUSTOMER_NUMBER, DATA_SOURCE)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_LGD_ER_NPL_WORKOUT
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_LGD_ER_NPL_ACCT_WORKOUT
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_LGD_ER_NPL_WORKOUT."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

    OUTSTANDING_ON_BS_LCL     NUMBER(32, 6),

    LIMIT_AMT_CCY             NUMBER(32, 6),
    CCF_RATE                  NUMBER,

    CCF_AMOUNT_LCL            NUMBER(32, 6),

    PREPAYMENT_AMOUNT_LCL     NUMBER(32, 6),
    EAD_AMOUNT_CCY            NUMBER(32, 6),
    EAD_AMOUNT_LCL            NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_ON_BS_CCY             NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_ON_BS_LCL             NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_OFF_BS_CCY            NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_OFF_BS_LCL            NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_TOTAL_CCY             NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_TOTAL_LCL             NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_ON_BS_FINAL_CCY       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_ON_BS_FINAL_LCL       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_TOTAL_FINAL_CCY       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_TOTAL_FINAL_LCL       NUMBER(32, 6),

)

create table IFRS.TMP_LGD_IMA
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_TMP_LGD_IMA
            primary key,
    PROCESS_DATE       DATE                             not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE      DATE                             not null,
    MASTERID           NUMBER(18),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME      VARCHAR2(150),
    FACILITY_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER     VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS     VARCHAR2(20),
    INTEREST_RATE      NUMBER,
    EIR                NUMBER,
    PRODUCT_CODE       VARCHAR2(20),
    CURRENCY           VARCHAR2(5),
    OUTSTANDING        NUMBER(32, 6),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY  CHAR,
    FIRST_NPL_DATE     DATE,
    FIRST_NPL_OS       NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOVERY_AMOUNT    NUMBER(32, 6),
    CLOSED_DATE        DATE,
    LGD_FLAG           VARCHAR2(2),
    GROUP_SEGMENT      VARCHAR2(50),
    SEGMENT            VARCHAR2(100),
    SUB_SEGMENT        VARCHAR2(50),
    LGD_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18),
    LGD_SEGMENT        VARCHAR2(100),
    SEGMENT_RULE_ID    NUMBER(18),
    DATA_SOURCE        VARCHAR2(10),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_1 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_2 VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_DATE_1    DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_2    DATE,
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TMP_LGD_IMA
    before insert
    on IFRS.TMP_LGD_IMA
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_TMP_LGD_IMA."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_PPYMT_HEADER_RAL
(
    PKID                 NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_PPYMT_HEADER_RAL
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE        DATE                             not null,
    SEGMENTATION_ID      NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    SEGMENTATION_NAME    VARCHAR2(100)                    not null,
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_ID   NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_NAME VARCHAR2(150)                    not null,
    AVERAGE_SMM          NUMBER(32, 6)                    not null,
    PREPAYMENT_RATE      NUMBER                           not null,
    DURATION             NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    CREATEDBY            VARCHAR2(36) default 'ADMIN'     not null,
    CREATEDDATE          DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST          VARCHAR2(30) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY            VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE          DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST          VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_PPYMT_HEADER_RAL
    on IFRS.IFRS_PPYMT_HEADER_RAL (DOWNLOAD_DATE, SEGMENTATION_ID, DURATION)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_PPYMT_HEADER_RAL
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_PPYMT_HEADER_RAL
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_PPYMT_HEADER_RAL."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

    RECOV_PERCENTAGE         NUMBER(32, 6),

    LOSS_RATE                NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOVERY_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    DATA_SOURCE              VARCHAR2(20),
    CREATEDBY                VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    CREATEDDATE              DATE         not null,
    CREATEDHOST              VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPDATEDBY                VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE              DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST              VARCHAR2(30),
    LGD_RULE_ID              NUMBER(18),
    LGD_RULE_NAME            VARCHAR2(150),
    LGD_FLAG                 VARCHAR2(2),
    SPECIAL_REASON           VARCHAR2(20)
)
/

create table IFRS.TBLU_LGD_AFL_OVERRIDE
(
    PKID          NUMBER(18)   not null
        constraint PK_TBLU_LGD_AFL_OVERRIDE
            primary key,
    EFF_DATE      DATE,
    LGD_RULE_NAME VARCHAR2(150),
    FL_YEAR       NUMBER(10),
    LGD_OVERRIDE  NUMBER,

    UPLOADHOST    VARCHAR2(30) not null,

    APPROVEDDATE  DATE,
    APPROVEDHOST  VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

    on IFRS.TBLU_LGD_AFL_OVERRIDE (EFF_DATE, LGD_RULE_NAME, FL_YEAR)
/

    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLU_LGD_AFL_OVERRIDE
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_TBLU_LGD_AFL_OVERRIDE."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

    DATA_SOURCE            VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_GROUP          VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE           VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE           VARCHAR2(20),
    CURRENCY               VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE          NUMBER,
    EIR                    NUMBER,
    INTEREST_RATE          NUMBER,
    OUTSTANDING            NUMBER(32, 6),
    FAIR_VALUE_AMOUNT      NUMBER(32, 6),

    UNUSED_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),

    BUCKET_GROUP           VARCHAR2(30),
    BUCKET_ID              NUMBER(10),

    ECL_AMOUNT_ON_BS       NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_AMOUNT_OFF_BS      NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_AMOUNT             NUMBER(32, 6),
    SPECIAL_REASON         VARCHAR2(4000),
    CREATEDBY              VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE            DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST            VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY              VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE            DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST            VARCHAR2(30),
    ECL_AMOUNT_ON_BS_FINAL NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_AMOUNT_FINAL       NUMBER(32, 6),
    MULTIPLIER             NUMBER(32, 6)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_ECL_RESULT_DETAIL_PR
    on IFRS.IFRS_ECL_RESULT_DETAIL_PR (DOWNLOAD_DATE, ECL_MODEL_ID, MASTERID)
/

create unique index IFRS.PK_IFRS_ECL_RESULT_DETAIL_PR
    on IFRS.IFRS_ECL_RESULT_DETAIL_PR (PKID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_ECL_RESULT_DETAIL_PR
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_ECL_RESULT_DETAIL_PR
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_ECL_RESULT_DETAIL."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_PARTIAL_RUN_DETAIL
(
    PKID            NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_PARTIAL_RUN_DETAIL
            primary key,
    HEADERID        NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER  VARCHAR2(50)                     not null,
    REASON          VARCHAR2(4000)                   not null,
    CREATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE     DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY       VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE     DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST     VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_PARTIAL_RUN_DETAIL
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_PARTIAL_RUN_DETAIL
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_PARTIAL_RUN_DETAIL."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_PARTIAL_RUN_HEADER
(
    PKID          NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_PARTIAL_RUN_HEADER
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE DATE                             not null,
    RUN_SEQUENCE  NUMBER(10)                       not null,
    REASON        VARCHAR2(4000)                   not null,
    RUN_STATUS    NUMBER(10)   default 1           not null,
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE   DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE   DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_PARTIAL_RUN_HEADER
    on IFRS.IFRS_PARTIAL_RUN_HEADER (DOWNLOAD_DATE, RUN_SEQUENCE)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_PARTIAL_RUN_HEADER
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_PARTIAL_RUN_HEADER
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_PARTIAL_RUN_HEADER."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

)

    on IFRS.TBLU_ADJUSTMENT_COVID_HIST (DOWNLOAD_DATE, NO_REKENING, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, UPLOADID)

    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLU_ADJUSTMENT_COVID_HIST
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)

END;

create table IFRS.TBLU_REKON_REGLA_VS_TB
(
    PKID          NUMBER(18)   not null
        constraint PK_TBLU_REKON_REGLA_VS_TB
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE DATE,
    DATA_SOURCE   VARCHAR2(30),
    PRODUCT_CODE  VARCHAR2(50),
    COA_GL_SUBGL  VARCHAR2(50),
    UPLOADID      NUMBER(18),
    UPLOADBY      VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPLOADDATE    DATE         not null,
    UPLOADHOST    VARCHAR2(30) not null,
    APPROVEDBY    VARCHAR2(36),
    APPROVEDDATE  DATE,
    APPROVEDHOST  VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_TBLU_REKON_REGLA_VS_TB
    on IFRS.TBLU_REKON_REGLA_VS_TB (DOWNLOAD_DATE, DATA_SOURCE, PRODUCT_CODE, COA_GL_SUBGL)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TBLU_REKON_REGLA_VS_TB
    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLU_REKON_REGLA_VS_TB
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_TBLU_REKON_REGLA_VS_TB."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.TMP_SUBTOTAL_RONA
(
    SUBTOTAL_SOURCE        VARCHAR2(50),
    DATA_SOURCE            VARCHAR2(20),
    BRANCH_CODE            VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_CODE           VARCHAR2(20),

    OUTSTANDING_OFF_BS_CCY NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_OFF_BS_CCY         NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING            NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_2      NUMBER(32, 6)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX1_TMP_SUBTOTAL_RONA
    on IFRS.TMP_SUBTOTAL_RONA (DATA_SOURCE, PRODUCT_CODE, CURRENCY, BRANCH_CODE, SUBTOTAL_SOURCE)
/

(

create index IFRS.IDX1_GTMP_IMA_UPD
    on IFRS.GTMP_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_UPD (DOWNLOAD_DATE, CUSTOMER_NUMBER, DATA_SOURCE, PRODUCT_GROUP, PRODUCT_CODE)
/

create index IFRS.IDX2_GTMP_IMA_UPD
    on IFRS.GTMP_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_UPD (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTERID)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_IMP_JOURNAL_DATA_RAL
(
    PKID             NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE    DATE,
    MASTERID         NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),
    FACILITY_NUMBER  VARCHAR2(25),
    JOURNAL_REF_NUM  VARCHAR2(100),
    JOURNAL_TYPE     VARCHAR2(10),
    REVERSAL_FLAG    VARCHAR2(1),
    DATA_SOURCE      VARCHAR2(20),
    PRD_TYPE         VARCHAR2(20),
    PRD_CODE         VARCHAR2(20),
    PRD_GROUP        VARCHAR2(20),
    BRANCH_CODE      VARCHAR2(7),
    CURRENCY         VARCHAR2(3),
    TXN_TYPE         VARCHAR2(2),
    AMOUNT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMOUNT_IDR       NUMBER(32, 6),
    GL_ACCOUNT       VARCHAR2(100),
    GL_CORE          VARCHAR2(10),
    JOURNAL_DESC     VARCHAR2(255),
    REMARKS          VARCHAR2(255),
    SEGMENT          VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER  VARCHAR2(50),
    RESTRUCTURE_FLAG NUMBER(1),
    CREATEDBY        VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE      DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST      VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY        VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE      DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST      VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_IMP_JOURNAL_DATA_RAL
    on IFRS.IFRS_IMP_JOURNAL_DATA_RAL (LAST_DAY("DOWNLOAD_DATE"))
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_IMP_JOURNAL_DATA_RAL
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_IMP_JOURNAL_DATA_RAL
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_IMP_JOURNAL_DATA_RAL."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE DATE,
    MASTERID      NUMBER(18),
    DATA_SOURCE   VARCHAR2(20),
    JOURNAL_ID    VARCHAR2(25),
    SEQ           VARCHAR2(20),
    BRANCH_CODE   VARCHAR2(50),
    JOURNAL_CODE  VARCHAR2(50),
    CURRENCY      VARCHAR2(5),
    AMOUNT        NUMBER(32, 6),
    AMOUNT_IDR    NUMBER(32, 6),
    GLNO          VARCHAR2(100),
    DRCR          VARCHAR2(10),
    REVERSE       VARCHAR2(5),
    CREATEDDATE   DATE,
    PRODUCT_TYPE  VARCHAR2(15)
)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_AMORT_RPT_RAL (DOWNLOAD_DATE)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_ACCT_AMORT_RPT_RAL (LAST_DAY("DOWNLOAD_DATE"))
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_FS_ACCT_AMORT_RPT_RAL
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE  DATE,
    MASTERID       NUMBER(18),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER VARCHAR2(30),
    DATA_SOURCE    VARCHAR2(20),
    PRODUCT_TYPE   VARCHAR2(15),

create table IFRS.TBLU_REKON_CRD_VS_TB
(
    PKID          NUMBER(18)   not null
        constraint PK_TBLU_REKON_CRD_VS_TB
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE DATE,
    DATA_SOURCE   VARCHAR2(30),
    COA           VARCHAR2(50),
    UPLOADID      NUMBER(18),
    UPLOADBY      VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPLOADDATE    DATE         not null,
    UPLOADHOST    VARCHAR2(30) not null,
    APPROVEDBY    VARCHAR2(36),
    APPROVEDDATE  DATE,
    APPROVEDHOST  VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create unique index IFRS.IDX_TBLU_REKON_CRD_VS_TB
    on IFRS.TBLU_REKON_CRD_VS_TB (DOWNLOAD_DATE, DATA_SOURCE, COA)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TBLU_REKON_CRD_VS_TB
    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLU_REKON_CRD_VS_TB
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
   SELECT SEQ_TBLU_REKON_CRD_VS_TB."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

    LOSS_RATE                NUMBER(32, 6),

    DATA_SOURCE              VARCHAR2(20),

    CREATEDHOST              VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPDATEDBY                VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE              DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST              VARCHAR2(30),

)

(
    PKID                     NUMBER(18)                       not null,
    EFF_DATE                 DATE,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE            DATE,

    PRODUCT_NAME             VARCHAR2(255),

    ACCOUNT_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(30),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER          VARCHAR2(30),
    CUSTOMER_NAME            VARCHAR2(150),
    LGD_CUSTOMER_TYPE        VARCHAR2(100),
    SEGMENTATION_ID          NUMBER(18),
    SEGMENTATION_NAME        VARCHAR2(200),
    CURRENCY                 VARCHAR2(5),
    ORIGINAL_CURRENCY        VARCHAR2(5),
    NPL_DATE                 DATE,
    CLOSED_DATE              DATE,
    BI_COLLECTABILITY_NPL    VARCHAR2(10),
    BI_COLLECTABILITY_CLOSED VARCHAR2(10),
    TOTAL_LOSS_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOV_AMT_BF_NPV         NUMBER(32, 6),
    LAST_RECOV_DATE          DATE,
    RECOV_PERCENTAGE         NUMBER(32, 6),
    DISCOUNT_RATE            NUMBER(32, 6),
    LOSS_RATE                NUMBER(32, 6),
    RECOVERY_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    DATA_SOURCE              VARCHAR2(20),
    CREATEDBY                VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE              DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST              VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY                VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE              DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST              VARCHAR2(30),
    LGD_RULE_ID              NUMBER(18),
    LGD_RULE_NAME            VARCHAR2(150),
    LGD_FLAG                 VARCHAR2(2),
    SPECIAL_REASON           VARCHAR2(20)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_LGD_CARD_ADJ_2022
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_LGD_CARD_ADJ_2022
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_LGD_CARD_ADJ_2022."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

    RECOVERY_AMOUNT          NUMBER(32, 6),
    DATA_SOURCE              VARCHAR2(20),

    UPDATEDDATE              DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST              VARCHAR2(30),
    LGD_RULE_ID              NUMBER(18),
    LGD_RULE_NAME            VARCHAR2(150),

    SPECIAL_REASON           VARCHAR2(20)
)

create table IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_KOMPARASI
(
    PKID                   NUMBER default "IFRS"."SEQ_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_KOMPARASI"."NEXTVAL" not null
        constraint IFRS_NOMINATIVE_KOMPARASI_PK
            primary key,
    REPORT_DATE            DATE,
    SEGMENT                VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER        VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME          VARCHAR2(150),
    STAGE_PAST             VARCHAR2(50),
    STAGE_CURRENT          VARCHAR2(50),
    RATING_PAST            VARCHAR2(50),
    RATING_CURRENT         VARCHAR2(50),
    CASH_FLOW_PAST         VARCHAR2(50),
    CASH_FLOW_CURRENT      VARCHAR2(50),
    WORST_CASE_PAST        VARCHAR2(50),
    WORST_CASE_CURRENT     VARCHAR2(50),
    TARGET_DATE_PAST       VARCHAR2(50),
    TARGET_DATE_CURRENT    VARCHAR2(50),
    SPECIAL_REASON_PAST    VARCHAR2(50),
    SPECIAL_REASON_CURRENT VARCHAR2(50),
    OS_ON_PAST             NUMBER,
    OS_ON_CURRENT          NUMBER,
    OS_ON_SELISIH          NUMBER,
    OS_OFF_PAST            NUMBER,
    OS_OFF_CURRENT         NUMBER,
    OS_OFF_SELISIH         NUMBER,
    YADIT_PAST             NUMBER,
    YADIT_CURR             NUMBER,
    YADIT_SELISIH          NUMBER,
    ECL_PAST               NUMBER,
    ECL_CURR               NUMBER,
    ECL_SELISIH            NUMBER,
    KETERANGAN             VARCHAR2(200)
)
/

create index IFRS.REPORTDATE_SEGMENT_INK
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_KOMPARASI (REPORT_DATE, SEGMENT)
/

create index IFRS.REPORTDATE_SEGMENT_CUST_NO_INK
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_KOMPARASI (REPORT_DATE, SEGMENT, CUSTOMER_NUMBER)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_INK
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_NOMINATIVE_KOMPARASI
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
    SELECT SEQ_IFRS_NOMINATIVE_KOMPARASI."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.CR_ECL_MOVE_NOMI
(
    PKID                       NUMBER(18)   not null,
    SESSIONID                  NUMBER(18),
    MASTERID                   NUMBER(18)   not null,
    REPORT_DATE                DATE         not null,

create table IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_WO_CRD_CHARGE
(
    DOWNLOAD_DATE    DATE,
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER  VARCHAR2(50),
    CHARGEOFF_DATE   DATE,
    CHARGEOFF_AMOUNT NUMBER(32, 6),
    CHARGEOFF_STATUS VARCHAR2(10),
    CORP_ID          VARCHAR2(11),
    WRITEOFF_DATE    DATE,
    WRITEOFF_AMOUNT  NUMBER(32, 6)
)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_MASTER_WO_CRD_CHARGE
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_WO_CRD_CHARGE (DOWNLOAD_DATE, SUBSTR("CUSTOMER_NUMBER", 6, 11))
/

create table IFRS.TEMP_RPT_NOMINATIVE_CURR_PREV
(
    REPORT_DATE               DATE       not null,
    MASTERID                  NUMBER(18) not null,
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME             VARCHAR2(150),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER            VARCHAR2(50),
    FACILITY_NUMBER           VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS            CHAR,
    DATA_SOURCE               VARCHAR2(20),
    SUB_SEGMENT               VARCHAR2(50),
    POCI_FLAG                 VARCHAR2(5),
    STAGE                     CHAR,
    CURRENCY                  VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE             NUMBER,
    WRITEOFF_FLAG             VARCHAR2(5),
    IMPAIRED_FLAG             CHAR,
    SPECIAL_REASON            VARCHAR2(50),
    OUTSTANDING_ON_BS_CCY     NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_TOTAL_CCY             NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_OFF_BS_LCL            NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_OFF_BS_CCY            NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_2         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_3         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_4         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_5         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_6         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_6_CCY     NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMT_CCY            NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMT_LCL            NUMBER(32, 6),
    PRODUCT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_2        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_5        VARCHAR2(100),
    BI_CODE                   VARCHAR2(20),
    RESERVED_FLAG_1           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_2           NUMBER(1),
    OUTSTANDING_ON_BS_LCL     NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    OUTSTANDING_OFF_BS_LCL    NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    OUTSTANDING_OFF_BS_CCY    NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_CCY       NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_LCL       NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_ILS_CCY   NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_ILS_LCL   NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    IA_UNWINDING_INTEREST_CCY NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    IA_UNWINDING_INTEREST_LCL NUMBER(32, 6) default 0
)
/

create table IFRS.TBLU_WO_TREASURY
(
    PKID           NUMBER(18)    not null
        constraint PK_TBLU_WO_TREASURY
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE  DATE          not null,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER VARCHAR2(100) not null,
    WO_AMOUNT      NUMBER(32, 6) not null,
    WO_AMOUNT_IDR  NUMBER(32, 6) not null,
    CURRENCY       VARCHAR2(5)   not null,
    EXCHANGE_RATE  NUMBER        not null,
    UPLOADID       NUMBER(18),
    UPLOADBY       VARCHAR2(36)  not null,
    UPLOADDATE     DATE          not null,
    UPLOADHOST     VARCHAR2(30)  not null,
    APPROVEDBY     VARCHAR2(36),
    APPROVEDDATE   DATE,
    APPROVEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

comment on column IFRS.TBLU_WO_TREASURY.WO_AMOUNT is 'AMOUNT ORIGINAL'
/

comment on column IFRS.TBLU_WO_TREASURY.WO_AMOUNT_IDR is 'AMOUNT EKUIVALEN IDR'
/

create unique index IFRS.UK_TBLU_WO_TREASURY
    on IFRS.TBLU_WO_TREASURY (DOWNLOAD_DATE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TBLU_RWO_TREASURY
    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLU_WO_TREASURY
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
SELECT SEQ_TBLU_WO_TREASURY."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.TBLU_JOURNAL_BRANCH
(
    PKID               NUMBER       not null
        constraint TBLU_JOURNAL_BRANCH_PKID
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE      DATE,
    BRANCH_SOURCE      VARCHAR2(10),
    BRANCH_DESTINATION VARCHAR2(10),
    UPLOADID           NUMBER,
    UPLOADBY           VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPLOADDATE         DATE         not null,
    UPLOADHOST         VARCHAR2(30) not null,
    APPROVEDBY         VARCHAR2(36),
    APPROVEDDATE       DATE,
    APPROVEDHOST       VARCHAR2(30),
    constraint "TBLU_JOURNAL_BRANCH_pk"
        unique (DOWNLOAD_DATE, BRANCH_SOURCE, BRANCH_DESTINATION)
)
/

    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLU_JOURNAL_BRANCH

    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_TBLU_JOURNAL_BRANCH."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;

create table IFRS.IFRS_PRC_DATE_FR
(
    PKID              NUMBER(18)   not null
        constraint "IFRS_PRC_DATE_FR_pk"
            primary key,
    CURRDATE          DATE         not null,
    PREVDATE          DATE         not null,
    BATCH_STATUS      VARCHAR2(50),
    REMARK            VARCHAR2(250),
    LAST_PROCESS_DATE DATE,
    SESSIONID         VARCHAR2(50),
    CREATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    CREATEDDATE       DATE         not null,
    CREATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPDATEDBY         VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE       DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST       VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_STG_FR_MIS
(
    PKID             NUMBER not null
        constraint "IFRS_STG_FR_MIS_pk"
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE    DATE,
    DEB_ID           VARCHAR2(2),
    KATEGORI_DEBITUR VARCHAR2(20),
    GOLDEB           CHAR,
    CUSTOMER_NAME    VARCHAR2(100),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER  VARCHAR2(25),
    COMM_NO          VARCHAR2(10),
    ACC_NO           VARCHAR2(50),
    LN_NO            VARCHAR2(10),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER   VARCHAR2(50),
    PRODUCT_CODE     VARCHAR2(3),
    PRODUCT_NAME     VARCHAR2(100),
    CURRENCY         VARCHAR2(3),
    SALDO_CCY        NUMBER,
    SALDO_LCL        NUMBER,
    PERBUNGA         NUMBER,
    LN_EFF_DATE      DATE,
    LN_MATURITY_DATE DATE,
    FNX_RATEC        DATE,
    LN_INT_RATE_TYPE CHAR
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_STG_FR_MIS
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_STG_FR_MIS
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
    SELECT SEQ_IFRS_STG_FR_MIS."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_YG
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_YG (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTERID)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_YG (DOWNLOAD_DATE, DATA_SOURCE)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT3_YG
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_YG (DOWNLOAD_DATE, MASTER_ACCOUNT_CODE)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT4_YG
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_YG (DOWNLOAD_DATE, CUSTOMER_NUMBER)
/

create index IFRS.IDX_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT5_YG
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_YG (DOWNLOAD_DATE, PRODUCT_CODE)
/

create unique index IFRS.PK_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_YG
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_YG (PKID)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_YG
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_YG
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT_MONTH."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

)

    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_CHECK_AUTOMATE_EOM
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
   SELECT SEQ_IFRS_CHECK_AUTOMATE_EOM."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;

    OUTSTANDING_ON_BS_CCY     NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_TOTAL_CCY             NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_OFF_BS_LCL            NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_OFF_BS_CCY            NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_2         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_3         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_4         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_5         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_6         NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_6_CCY     NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMT_CCY            NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNUSED_AMT_LCL            NUMBER(32, 6),
    PRODUCT_CODE              VARCHAR2(20),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_2        VARCHAR2(100),
    RESERVED_VARCHAR_5        VARCHAR2(100),
    BI_CODE                   VARCHAR2(20),
    RESERVED_FLAG_1           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_2           NUMBER(1),
    OUTSTANDING_ON_BS_LCL     NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_OFF_BS_LCL    NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_OFF_BS_CCY    NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_CCY       NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_LCL       NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_ILS_CCY   NUMBER(32, 6),
    UNAMORT_FEE_AMT_ILS_LCL   NUMBER(32, 6),
    IA_UNWINDING_INTEREST_CCY NUMBER(32, 6),
    IA_UNWINDING_INTEREST_LCL NUMBER(32, 6)
)

create table IFRS.IFRS_REPORT_ECL_MOVE_VALAS_DTL
(
    REPORT_DATE          DATE                              not null,
    MASTERID             NUMBER(18)                        not null,
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER      VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME        VARCHAR2(150),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER       VARCHAR2(50),
    DATA_SOURCE          VARCHAR2(20),
    SUB_SEGMENT          VARCHAR2(100),
    PRODUCT_CODE         VARCHAR2(20),
    SEQ_NO               NUMBER(10)                        not null,
    IMP_CHANGE_REASON    VARCHAR2(250)                     not null,
    ECL_ON_BS            NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_OFF_BS           NUMBER(32, 6),
    ECL_TOTAL            NUMBER(32, 6),
    CARRY_AMOUNT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    CURRENCY             VARCHAR2(5),
    EXCHANGE_RATE        NUMBER,
    STAGE                VARCHAR2(10),
    TRA                  VARCHAR2(100),
    ASET_KEUANGAN        VARCHAR2(100),
    WRITEOFF_FLAG        VARCHAR2(5),
    SPECIAL_REASON       VARCHAR2(250),
    CREATEDBY            VARCHAR2(36)  default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE          DATE          default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST          VARCHAR2(30)  default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY            VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE          DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST          VARCHAR2(30),
    UNUSED_AMT           NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING_ON_BS    NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    OUTSTANDING_OFF_BS   NUMBER(32, 6) default 0,
    NILAI_TERCATAT_ON_BS NUMBER(32, 6) default 0
)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_REPORT_ECL_MOVE_VALAS_DTL (REPORT_DATE)

    on IFRS.IFRS_REPORT_ECL_MOVE_VALAS_DTL (REPORT_DATE, TRA, SUB_SEGMENT, SEQ_NO)
/

create table IFRS.T24_IFRS_PD_MIGRATION_DETAIL
(
    PKID          NUMBER(18)   not null,
    EFF_DATE      DATE         not null,
    BASE_DATE     DATE         not null,
    PD_RULE_ID    NUMBER(18)   not null,
    BUCKET_GROUP  VARCHAR2(30) not null,
    PD_UNIQUE_ID  VARCHAR2(50) not null,
    CUSTOMER_NAME VARCHAR2(150),
    BUCKET_FROM   NUMBER(10),
    BUCKET_TO     NUMBER(10),
    CALC_AMOUNT   NUMBER(32, 6),
    OUTSTANDING   NUMBER(32, 6),
    CREATEDBY     VARCHAR2(36) not null,

    UPDATEDDATE   DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST   VARCHAR2(30)
)

create table IFRS.IFRS_CCF_DETAIL_6
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_CCF_DETAIL_6
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE      DATE                             not null,
    CURRENT_DATE       DATE                             not null,
    PREVIOUS_DATE      DATE,
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER     VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME      VARCHAR2(150),
    FACILITY_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS     VARCHAR2(1),
    SEGMENTATION_ID    NUMBER,
    CCF_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18),
    FIRST_NPL_DATE     DATE,
    CURRENCY           VARCHAR2(10),
    OS_CUR             NUMBER(32, 6),
    OS_PREV            NUMBER(32, 6),
    LIMIT_CUR          NUMBER,
    LIMIT_PREV         NUMBER,
    USED_AMOUNT_CUR    NUMBER,
    USED_AMOUNT_PREV   NUMBER,
    AVAILABLE_AMT_CUR  NUMBER,
    AVAILABLE_AMT_PREV NUMBER,
    REVOLVING_FLAG_L   NUMBER(1),
    REVOLVING_FLAG_I   NUMBER(1),
    PRODUCT_CODE_L     VARCHAR2(50),
    PRODUCT_CODE_I     VARCHAR2(50),
    OS_SELISIH         NUMBER(32, 6),
    LIMIT_SELISIH      NUMBER(32, 6),
    CCF_RESULT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_IFRS_CCF_DETAIL_6
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_CCF_DETAIL_6
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_CCF_DETAIL_6."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_CCF_DETAIL_PROCESS_6
(
    PKID               NUMBER(18)                       not null
        constraint PK_IFRS_CCF_DETAIL_PROCESS_6
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE      DATE                             not null,
    CURRENT_DATE       DATE                             not null,
    PREVIOUS_DATE      DATE,
    FACILITY_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME      VARCHAR2(150),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS     VARCHAR2(1),
    SEGMENTATION_ID    NUMBER(18),
    CCF_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18),
    FIRST_NPL_DATE     DATE,
    CURRENCY           DATE,
    OS_CUR             NUMBER(32, 6),
    OS_PREV            NUMBER(32, 6),
    LIMIT_CUR          NUMBER,
    LIMIT_PREV         NUMBER,
    USED_AMOUNT_CUR    NUMBER,
    USED_AMOUNT_PREV   NUMBER,
    AVAILABLE_AMT_CUR  NUMBER,
    AVAILABLE_AMT_PREV NUMBER,
    REVOLVING_FLAG_L   NUMBER(1),
    REVOLVING_FLAG_I   NUMBER(1),
    PRODUCT_CODE_L     VARCHAR2(50),
    PRODUCT_CODE_I     VARCHAR2(50),
    OS_SELISIH         NUMBER(32, 6),
    LIMIT_SELISIH      NUMBER(32, 6),
    CCF_RESULT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    DAY_PAST_DUE_DATE  DATE,
    SICR_DATE          DATE,
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36)
)
/

    before insert

  SELECT SEQ_IFRS_CCF_DETAIL_PROCESS_6."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;

create global temporary table IFRS.GTMP_NOMI_CURR_2
(
    PKID                       NUMBER(18)   not null,
    SESSIONID                  NUMBER(18),
    MASTERID                   NUMBER(18)   not null,
    REPORT_DATE                DATE         not null,
    SOURCE_TYPE                VARCHAR2(20),
    DATA_SOURCE                VARCHAR2(20),
    ACCOUNT_STATUS             CHAR,
    BRANCH_CODE                VARCHAR2(20),
    LBU_FORM                   VARCHAR2(50),
    NOREK_LBU                  VARCHAR2(50),
    FACILITY_NUMBER            VARCHAR2(50),
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER             VARCHAR2(50),

(
    REPORT_DATE              DATE,
    REPORT_SEGMENT           VARCHAR2(50),

)

    on IFRS.IFRS_REPORT_BIAYA_CKPN_SUMM (REPORT_DATE, REPORT_SEGMENT)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_REPORT_BIAYA_CKPN_SUMM (REPORT_DATE)
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_REPORT_BIAYA_CKPN
(
    REPORT_DATE                     DATE,
    REPORT_SEGMENT                  VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER                 VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME                   VARCHAR2(150),
    ASS_IMP_PAST                    CHAR,
    ASS_IMP_CURRENT                 CHAR,
    STAGE_PAST                      VARCHAR2(50),
    STAGE_CURRENT                   VARCHAR2(50),
    RATING_PAST                     VARCHAR2(50),
    RATING_CURRENT                  VARCHAR2(50),
    CASH_FLOW_PAST                  VARCHAR2(50),
    CASH_FLOW_CURRENT               VARCHAR2(50),
    WORST_CASE_PAST                 VARCHAR2(50),
    WORST_CASE_CURRENT              VARCHAR2(50),
    TARGET_DATE_PAST                VARCHAR2(50),
    TARGET_DATE_CURRENT             VARCHAR2(50),
    SPECIAL_REASON_PAST             VARCHAR2(50),
    SPECIAL_REASON_CURRENT          VARCHAR2(50),
    BUCKET_PAST                     VARCHAR2(50),
    BUCKET_CURRENT                  VARCHAR2(50),
    OS_ON_PAST                      NUMBER,
    OS_ON_CURRENT                   NUMBER,
    OS_ON_MOVEMENT                  NUMBER,
    OS_OFF_PAST                     NUMBER,
    OS_OFF_CURRENT                  NUMBER,
    OS_OFF_MOVEMENT                 NUMBER,
    ECL_ON_PAST                     NUMBER,
    ECL_ON_CURRENT                  NUMBER,
    ECL_OFF_PAST                    NUMBER,
    ECL_OFF_CURRENT                 NUMBER,
    ECL_TOTAL_PAST                  NUMBER,
    ECL_TOTAL_CURRENT               NUMBER,
    ECL_WO                          NUMBER,
    ECL_FOREIGN_CURRENCY_EFFECT_ON  NUMBER,
    ECL_FOREIGN_CURRENCY_EFFECT_OFF NUMBER,
    BIAYA_CADANGAN_BULAN_INI_ON     NUMBER,
    BIAYA_CADANGAN_BULAN_INI_OFF    NUMBER,
    BIAYA_CADANGAN_BULAN_INI_TOTAL  NUMBER,
    REASON                          VARCHAR2(200)
)
/

create index IFRS.IFRS_REP_BY_CKPN_1_IDX
    on IFRS.IFRS_REPORT_BIAYA_CKPN (CUSTOMER_NUMBER)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_REPORT_BIAYA_CKPN (REPORT_DATE, REPORT_SEGMENT, CUSTOMER_NUMBER)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_REPORT_BIAYA_CKPN (REPORT_DATE, REPORT_SEGMENT)
/

    on IFRS.IFRS_REPORT_BIAYA_CKPN (REPORT_DATE)
/

(
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER                 VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME                   VARCHAR2(150),
    ASS_IMP_PAST                    CHAR,
    ASS_IMP_CURRENT                 CHAR,
    STAGE_PAST                      VARCHAR2(50),
    STAGE_CURRENT                   VARCHAR2(50),
    RATING_PAST                     VARCHAR2(50),
    RATING_CURRENT                  VARCHAR2(50),
    CASH_FLOW_PAST                  VARCHAR2(50),
    CASH_FLOW_CURRENT               VARCHAR2(50),
    WORST_CASE_PAST                 VARCHAR2(50),
    WORST_CASE_CURRENT              VARCHAR2(50),
    TARGET_DATE_PAST                VARCHAR2(50),
    TARGET_DATE_CURRENT             VARCHAR2(50),
    SPECIAL_REASON_PAST             VARCHAR2(50),
    SPECIAL_REASON_CURRENT          VARCHAR2(50),
    BUCKET_PAST                     VARCHAR2(50),
    BUCKET_CURRENT                  VARCHAR2(50),
    OS_ON_PAST                      NUMBER,
    OS_ON_CURRENT                   NUMBER,
    OS_ON_MOVEMENT                  NUMBER,
    OS_OFF_PAST                     NUMBER,
    OS_OFF_CURRENT                  NUMBER,
    OS_OFF_MOVEMENT                 NUMBER,
    ECL_ON_PAST                     NUMBER,
    ECL_ON_CURRENT                  NUMBER,
    ECL_OFF_PAST                    NUMBER,
    ECL_OFF_CURRENT                 NUMBER,
    ECL_TOTAL_PAST                  NUMBER,
    ECL_TOTAL_CURRENT               NUMBER,
    ECL_WO                          NUMBER,
    ECL_FOREIGN_CURRENCY_EFFECT_ON  NUMBER,
    ECL_FOREIGN_CURRENCY_EFFECT_OFF NUMBER,
    BIAYA_CADANGAN_BULAN_INI_ON     NUMBER,
    BIAYA_CADANGAN_BULAN_INI_OFF    NUMBER,
    BIAYA_CADANGAN_BULAN_INI_TOTAL  NUMBER,
    REASON                          VARCHAR2(200)
)
    on commit preserve rows
/

create table IFRS.IFRS_ASMR_RATING
(
    PKID            NUMBER(18)                       not null
        primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE   TIMESTAMP(6),
    CUSTOMER_NUMBER VARCHAR2(50),
    RATING_CODE     VARCHAR2(10),
    RATING_SOURCE   VARCHAR2(10),
    GOL_DEB         VARCHAR2(10),
    CREATED_BY      VARCHAR2(36) default 'SYSTEM'    not null,
    CREATED_DATE    DATE         default SYSDATE     not null,
    CREATED_HOST    VARCHAR2(30) default 'LOCALHOST' not null,
    UPDATED_BY      VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATED_DATE    DATE,
    UPDATED_HOST    VARCHAR2(30)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.IFRS_ASMR_RATING_ON_INSERT
    before insert
    on IFRS.IFRS_ASMR_RATING
    for each row
BEGIN
  SELECT IFRS.IFRS_ASMR_RATING_SEQ.nextval
  INTO :new.PKID
  FROM dual;
END;
/

)

)

    ACCOUNT_STATUS     VARCHAR2(1),
    SEGMENTATION_ID    NUMBER(18),
    CCF_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18),
    FIRST_NPL_DATE     DATE,
    CURRENCY           DATE,
    OS_CUR             NUMBER(32, 6),
    OS_PREV            NUMBER(32, 6),
    LIMIT_CUR          NUMBER,
    LIMIT_PREV         NUMBER,
    USED_AMOUNT_CUR    NUMBER,
    USED_AMOUNT_PREV   NUMBER,
    AVAILABLE_AMT_CUR  NUMBER,
    AVAILABLE_AMT_PREV NUMBER,
    REVOLVING_FLAG_L   NUMBER(1),
    REVOLVING_FLAG_I   NUMBER(1),
    PRODUCT_CODE_L     VARCHAR2(50),
    PRODUCT_CODE_I     VARCHAR2(50),
    OS_SELISIH         NUMBER(32, 6),
    LIMIT_SELISIH      NUMBER(32, 6),
    CCF_RESULT         NUMBER(32, 6),
    DAY_PAST_DUE_DATE  DATE,
    SICR_DATE          DATE,
    CREATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    CREATEDDATE        DATE         not null,
    CREATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPDATEDBY          VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE        DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST        VARCHAR2(36)
)
/

create table IFRS.APP_LOG
(
    LOG_ID          NUMBER       default "IFRS"."ISEQ$$_19115942".nextval generated by default on null as identity
		constraint PK_APP_LOG
			primary key,
    LOG_TIMESTAMP   TIMESTAMP(6) default SYSTIMESTAMP,
    LOG_LEVEL       VARCHAR2(20),
    PROCESS_NAME    VARCHAR2(100),
    LOG_MESSAGE     VARCHAR2(4000),
    ERROR_CODE      NUMBER,
    ERROR_BACKTRACE CLOB
)
/

    RESERVED_AMOUNT_18        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_19        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_AMOUNT_20        NUMBER(32, 6),
    RESERVED_RATE_1           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_2           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_3           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_4           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_5           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_6           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_7           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_8           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_9           NUMBER,
    RESERVED_RATE_10          NUMBER,
    RESERVED_FLAG_1           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_2           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_3           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_4           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_5           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_6           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_7           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_8           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_9           NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_FLAG_10          NUMBER(1),
    RESERVED_DATE_1           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_2           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_3           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_4           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_5           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_6           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_7           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_8           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_9           DATE,
    RESERVED_DATE_10          DATE,
    CREATEDBY                 VARCHAR2(36)  not null,
    CREATEDDATE               DATE          not null,
    CREATEDHOST               VARCHAR2(30)  not null,
    UPDATEDBY                 VARCHAR2(36),
    UPDATEDDATE               DATE,
    UPDATEDHOST               VARCHAR2(30),
    SEGMENT_RULE_ID           NUMBER(18),
    PREPAYMENT_SEGMENT        VARCHAR2(100),
    PREPAYMENT_RULE_ID        NUMBER(18)
)
/

create table IFRS.TBLU_CKPN365_PARAM
(
    PKID            NUMBER       not null
        constraint TBLU_CKPN365_PARAM_PKID
            primary key,
    DOWNLOAD_DATE   DATE,
    EFFECTIVE_DATE  DATE,
    OPTION_GROUPING VARCHAR2(30),
    SEGMENT         VARCHAR2(100),
    PRODUCT_CODE    VARCHAR2(20),
    DPD             NUMBER(10),
    DLQ             NUMBER(10),
    CKPN365         NUMBER,
    UPLOADID        NUMBER,
    UPLOADBY        VARCHAR2(36) not null,
    UPLOADDATE      DATE         not null,
    UPLOADHOST      VARCHAR2(30) not null,
    APPROVEDBY      VARCHAR2(36),
    APPROVEDDATE    DATE,
    APPROVEDHOST    VARCHAR2(30),
    constraint "TBLU_CKPN365_PARAM_pk"
        unique (DOWNLOAD_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, OPTION_GROUPING, SEGMENT, PRODUCT_CODE, CKPN365)
)
/

create or replace trigger IFRS.TRG_TBLU_CKPN365_PARAM
    before insert
    on IFRS.TBLU_CKPN365_PARAM
    for each row
    when (NEW.PKID IS NULL OR NEW.PKID = 0)
BEGIN
    SELECT IFRS.SEQ_TBLU_CKPN365_PARAM."NEXTVAL" INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL;
END;





/

create table IFRS.TMP_IMA_CKPN365
(
    PKID            NUMBER(18),
    DOWNLOAD_DATE   DATE,
    MASTERID        NUMBER(18),

    ACCOUNT_STATUS  VARCHAR2(20),
    SEGMENT         VARCHAR2(100),
    PRODUCT_CODE    VARCHAR2(20),
    CR_STAGE        CHAR,
    OUTSTANDING     NUMBER(32, 6),
    SPECIAL_REASON  VARCHAR2(10),
    OPTION_GROUPING VARCHAR2(30),
    DAY_PAST_DUE    NUMBER(10),
    DELINQUENCY     VARCHAR2(10),
    CKPN365         NUMBER
)

create global temporary table IFRS.MBP_IFRS_MASTER_ACCOUNT
(
    NOMOR_FASILITAS    VARCHAR2(50),
    CUSTOMER_NAME      VARCHAR2(100),
    PERIODE            DATE,
    SEGMEN             VARCHAR2(50),
    CRF                VARCHAR2(10),
    TIPE_FASILITAS     VARCHAR2(50),
    PLAFOND            NUMBER,
    OUTSTANDING        NUMBER,
    KOLEKTIBILITAS     NUMBER,
    DPD                NUMBER,
    JANGKA_WAKTU_BULAN NUMBER,
    BUNGA              NUMBER,
    BTB                VARCHAR2(2),
    CKPN               NUMBER,
    RESTRUKTURISASI    VARCHAR2(2)
)
    on commit preserve rows
/
